RESUMEN AUTOMATICO

Resumen automático

'Insm1' ( 'IA-1)' encodes a 'Zn-finger' factor that is expressed in the developing nervous system. 'We' demonstrate here that the development of the 'sympatho-adrenal' lineage is severely impaired in 'Insm1' mutant mice. 'The' transcription factors 'Mash1' ( 'Ascl1),' 'Phox2a,' 'Gata3' and 'Hand2' ( previously 'dHand)' control the differentiation of 'sympatho-adrenal' precursor 'cells,' and their deregulated expression in 'Insm1' mutant mice demonstrates that 'Insm1' acts in the transcriptional network that controls differentiation of this lineage. 'Noradrenaline' is the major catecholamine produced by developing 'sympatho-adrenal' cells and is required for fetal survival. 'Newly' generated 'Gata3' hypomorphic mutant mice exhibited neonatal lethality associated with severe renal hypoplasia. 'These' results demonstrate a critical role for 'GATA3' in the maintenance of mesangial cells and its absolute requirement for prevention of glomerular disease. 'Development' of human placenta involves the invasion of trophoblast cells from anchoring villi into the maternal decidua. 'The' regulation of trophoblastic invasion by 'GCM1' may involve novel cellular factors. 'Here' we show that 'GATA3' interacts with 'GCM1' and inhibits its activity to suppress trophoblastic invasion. 'Interestingly,' 'GATA3' interacts with 'GCM1,' but not the 'GCM2' 'homologue,' through the 'DNA-binding' domain and first transcriptional activation domain in 'GCM1' and the transcriptional activation domains and zinc finger 1 domain in 'GATA3'. 'This' study uncovered a new 'GATA3' function in placenta as a negative regulator of 'GCM1' activity and trophoblastic invasion. 'GATA-3,' a member of the 'GATA' family of 'zinc-finger' 'DNA' binding 'proteins,' and 'FOXA1,' a member of the forkhead transcription factor 'family,' are both associated with estrogen receptor expression. 'Primary' and metastatic melanomas and mesotheliomas were also evaluated. 'GATA-3' and 'FOXA1' staining of estrogen 'receptor-positive' breast carcinomas was seen in 96.6 '%' and 96.2 '%', respectively. 'Direct' sequencing of 'GATA3' gene revealed a novel heterozygous missense mutation at codon 299 ( p. 'The' structure prediction showed that it caused a conformation change in this junction 'area,' affecting the spatial position of the zinc fingers. 'GATA' transcription factors are zinc finger 'DNA' binding proteins that regulate transcription during development and cell differentiation. 'GATA1' is required for the erythroid and megakaryocytic commitment during hematopoiesis. 'Conventional' 'T' cells that ectopically express 'PLZF' spontaneously acquire an 'activated,' effector phenotype. 'An' 'SP1-binding' element ( 'GC' 'box)' located within the 'PTH-promoter' proximal region was critical for activating transcription by 'Gata3'. 'GATA3' immunohistochemistry was performed on 33 'placentas,' one atypical placental site 'nodule,' 25 hydatidiform moles ( 'HMs),' and 13 gestational trophoblastic tumours ( 'GTTs)'. 'Immature' placentas were characterized by 'strong,' diffuse nuclear 'GATA3' staining. 'Some' studies suggest that 'PQ' has effects on the immune system. 'Moreover,' previous studies have shown that 'PQ' imparted some immunosuppressive effects. 'The' impaired 'IL-4' production by 'SAP-deficient' 24 & 'alpha;β' 'T' cells was associated with reduced 'IFN' regulatory factor 4 and 'GATA-3' induction following 'TCR' stimulation. 'Collectively,' these data suggest that 'SAP' is critical for regulating type 'II' 'NKT' cell responses. 'ChIP-seq' analysis reveals that the majority of 'ZNF217' binding sites are located at distal regulatory regions associated with the chromatin marks 'H3K27ac' and 'H3K4me1'. 'ERalpha' expression highly correlates with 'ZNF217' in lysates from breast tumors ( n = 15), and 'ERalpha' 'co-precipitates' 'ZNF217' and its binding partner 'CtBP2' from nuclear extracts. 'Transcriptome' profiling following 'ZNF217' depletion identifies differentially expressed genes 'co-bound' by 'ZNF217' and 'ERalpha;' gene ontology suggests a role for 'ZNF217-ERalpha' in expression programs associated with 'ER+' breast cancer studies found in the 'Molecular' 'Signature' 'Database'. 'The' maintenance of pluripotency of 'CSCs' under various pathophysiological conditions requires a complex interaction between various cellular pathways including those involved in homeostasis and energy metabolism. 'However,' the exact mechanisms that maintain the 'CSC' pluripotency remain poorly understood. 'In' this 'report,' using both human and murine models of 'CSCs,' we demonstrate that basal levels of autophagy are required to maintain the pluripotency of 'CSCs,' and that this process is differentially regulated by the rate limiting enzyme in the 'NAD(+)' synthesis pathway 'NAMPT' ( nicotinamide 'phosphoribosyltransferase)' and the transcription factor 'POU5F1/OCT4' ( 'POU' class 5 homeobox 1). 'Interestingly,' these 'pluripotency-regulating' effects of 'NAMPT' and 'POU5F1' were accompanied by contrasting levels of 'autophagy,' wherein 'NAMPT' 'KD' promoted while 'POU5F1' 'KD' inhibited the autophagy machinery. 'Most' 'importantly,' any deviation from the basal level of 'autophagy,' either increase ( via 'rapamycin,' serum starvation or 'Tat-beclin' 1['Tat-BECN1]' 'peptide)' or decrease ( via 'ATG7' or 'ATG12' 'KD),' strongly decreased the pluripotency and promoted the differentiation 'and/or' senescence of 'CSCs'. 'An' 'N-terminal' region of 'Ams2' acts as a 'self-interaction' domain. 'Intriguingly,' 'N-terminally' truncated 'Ams2' binds to the histone gene 'promoters,' but does not fully activate histone gene transcription. 'To' gain insight into the transcriptional regulatory networks of 'SCN5A,' we surveyed the promoter and first intronic regions of the 'SCN5A' 'gene,' predicting the presence of several binding sites for 'GATA' transcription factors ( 'TFs)'. verbo([targeted]), complemento([genome, engineering, enable, molecular, biologists, to, generate, sequence, specific, modifications, with, greater, efficiency, and, higher, specificity, in, complex, eukaryotic, genomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Programmable', 'site-specific', 'DNA', cleavage, reagents, and, cellular, 'DNA', repair, mechanisms]), verbo([have]), complemento([made, this, possible])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', reagents]), verbo([have]), complemento([become, powerful, tools, for, delivering, a, 'site-specific', genomic, 'double-strand', break, '(', 'DSB)', at, the, desired, the, introduction, of, desired, sequence, modifications, at, the, predetermined, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, summarize, the, role, of, three, classes, of, 'nucleases;', zinc, finger, complemento([the, lowest, 'off-target', effects, to, protect, the, human, genome, from, deleterious, mutations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Zinc', finger, 'nucleases,', transcription, 'activator-like', the, site, of, origin, could, not, be, determined])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rarely,', similar, cases]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, previously, as, inverted, transitional, papilloma, of, results, from, 'E2F', and, 'GATA', switches, is, required, for, cellular, differentiation, of, erythroid, and, lung, epithelial, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', the, present, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, novel, molecular, mechanism, by, which, 'WDR77', is, regulated, during, erythroid, and, lung, development, and, lung, tumorigenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([evidence, demonstrated, that, deregulation, of, 'mircoRNA-503', '(', 'miRNA-503)', contributes, to, 'tumorigenesis,', little, is, relacion([sujeto(['Although', other, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, how, 'T', cell, receptor, '(', 'TcR)', signals, induce, the, 'up-regulation', of, 'GATA3', expression, in, 'Treg', subjects])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'summary,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, 'USP21-mediated', pathway, that, promotes, 'GATA3', stabilization, and, expression, at, the, relacion([sujeto(['GATA3', labeling, was, overwhelmingly]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([in, paired, metastases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Notably,', 'GATA3', was]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([between, matched, primary, and, metastatic, carcinomas, including, 'ER-negative', cases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Early', 'T-cell', precursor, acute, lymphoblastic, leukemia, '(', must, correspond, to, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([specificity, of, the, profiled, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['However', this, approach, often, 'fails:', many]), verbo([bound]), complemento([regions, do, not, contain, the, '\'', 'expected\'', motif])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is, because]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['DNA', directly, at, its, recognition, site, is, different, 'co-factors,', it, can, bind, 'DNA', 'indirectly,', through, 'intermediaries,', or, even, enforce, its, function, through, 'long-range', chromosomal, interactions])]). to, characterize, such, diverse, modes, of, 'protein-DNA', binding, and, binding, specificities])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', present, a, novel, 'Bayesian', method, that, identifies, distinct, 'protein-DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([mechanisms, without, relying, on, any, motif, database])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', method, successfully, identifies, 'co-factors', of, proteins, that, do, not]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['DNA', 'directly,', such, as, mediator, and, p300])]). relacion([sujeto(['Even', for, 'well-studied', 'direct-binding', 'proteins,', this, method]), differentiation, 'state,', in, which, cells, 'co-express', 'basal-', and, 'luminal-lineage', markers])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, human, 'basal-like', breast, cancers, contain, a, relacion([sujeto(['Bi-lineage', cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([genes, that, are, active, in, normal, luminal, 'progenitors,', and, possess, increased, 'colony-formation', 'capacity,', cluster, with, supratentorial, 'PNETs,', rather, than, with, 'DIPGs,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, these, tumors, should, be, treated, with, a, 'PNET', 'regimen,', not, with, 'DIPG', therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Many', of, these, factors, are, mutated, in, cancer, or, are, putative, cancer, biomarkers, and, could, potentially, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, 'HPV', early, gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mRNA, expression, of, 'GNLY', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, prognosis, of, patients, with, gastric, proliferation, 'rates,', whereas, mutant, 'TP53', was, associated, with, the, opposite, pattern])]). relacion([sujeto(['Distinct', phenotypes, in, 'oestrogen-receptor-positive', breast, cancer, are]), cytotoxic, 'T', lymphocyte, '(', 'CTL)', 'responses,', and, antitumor, immunity, in, 'WT', 'C57BL/6', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclusively, demonstrate, that, 'GATA-3-expressing', 'Th2', cells]), verbo([enhance]), complemento(['DC(OVA)-induced', 'CTL', responses, via, 'IL-6', secretion])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, show, that, 'IL-6', and, 'IL-10', gene, deficient, 'Th2(IL-6', complement, and, 'anti-DNA', antibody, 'titer,', while, that, of, 'MCP-1,', 'IL-17,', and, 'GATA3', began, to, change, 4, weeks, prior, to, a, flare])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, the, 'FOXC1,', and, that, 'GATA3', interacts, with, a, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'BRCA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'FOXC1', is, an, essential, survival, factor]), 'beta-arrestin', 2, on, the, cytokine, production, of, 'CD4+', 'T', lymphocytes, and, the, mechanism]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, a, mouse, model, for, asthma])]). relacion([sujeto(['CD4+', relacion([sujeto(['beta-arrestin', 2, 'RNAi']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['IL-4', '(', 43.16, '%', ')', and, 'GATA3', '(', protein, 77.21, '%', ',', mRNA, 62.98, '%', ')', expression, after, are, zinc, finger, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, that, control, the, development, of, diverse, tissues, by, activating, or, repressing, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA', 'subtype-specific', risk, 'signatures,', identify, early, genomic, events, in, cancer, 'development,', and, locate]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, prevention, and, therapy])]). 'GATA3,', 'TCF7L2', and, 'MAF)', in, the, 'miR-302', cluster, promoter, region])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cord', blood, 'IgE', '(', 'CBIgE)', is, a]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([risk, factor, for, the, subsequent, development, of, allergic, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', contrast, with, numerous, genetic, studies, of, total, serum, 'IgE', in, children, and, 'adults,', limited, genetic, studies, on, 'CBIgE']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, conducted])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, demonstrated, that, multiple, 'SNPs', were, individually, and, jointly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'CBIgE,', with, evidence, of, 'gene-gene', interactions, and, ethnic, heterogeneity])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, genetic, regulation, of, 'IgE', may, begin, in, utero])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', previously, regarded, as, being]), verbo([required]), complemento([only, during, early, 'T', cell, 'development,', recent, studies, demonstrate, an, important, role, for, 'TCF-1', in, 'T', helper, 2, '(', 'Th2)', cell, polarization])]). relacion([sujeto(['TCF-1', was, shown, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'Th2', transcription, factor, 'GATA-binding', protein, 3, '(', 'GATA3)', and, thus, to, promote, the, development, of, 'IL-4-producing', 'Th2', cells, independent, of, 'STAT6', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'down-regulation', is, largely, due, to, the, polarizing, cytokine, 'IL-4', because, 'IL-4', alone, is, sufficient, to, substantially]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['TCF-1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'IL-4-induced', suppression, of, 'TCF-1', is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'STAT6,', as, shown, by, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, 'assays,', chromatin, 'immunoprecipitation,', and, 'STAT6', knockdown, experiments])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'IL-4/STAT6', predominantly, inhibits, the, 'shorter,', 'dominant-negative', 'TCF-1', 'isoforms,', which, were, reported, to, inhibit, 'IL-4', transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', this, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, model, for, an, 'IL-4/STAT6-dependent', fine, tuning, mechanism, of, 'TCF-1-driven', 'T', helper, cell, polarization])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA', family, transcription, factors, play, multiple, vital, roles, in, hematopoiesis, in, many, cell, 'lineages,', and, in, 'particular,', 'T', cells]), verbo([require]), complemento(['GATA-3', for, execution, of, several, developmental, steps])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, described, as, a, master, regulator, of, 'T-helper', 2, '(', 'Th2)', cell, differentiation, in, mature, 'CD4(+)', 'T', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', its, importance, prior, to, &, 'beta;-selection']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, obscured, both, by, the, developmental, analysis, of, 'Gata3', mutant, 'mice,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, demonstrated, that, 'GATA-3', is, additionally, required, at, the, earliest, stage, of, thymopoiesis, for, the, development, of, the, 'ETP', population])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, review, the, characterized, functions, of, 'GATA-3', at, each, stage, of, 'T-cell', development, and, discuss, hypothetical, molecular, pathways, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([these, functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', two, complexes, analyzed, focused, on, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([proteins, and, individual, protein, 'coverage,', particularly, for, target, proteins, expressed, at, low, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['Naturally', occurring, regulatory, 'T', '(', 'nTreg)', cells]), were]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'OVA', in, both, mouse, genotypes])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-binding', 'protein-3', '(', 'GATA-3)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, 'T', helper, type, 2, '(', 'Th2)', cytokine, locus, through, induction, of, chromatin, remodelling])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', understand, this, mechanism, 'better,', we, screened, 'GATA-3']), verbo([interacting]), complemento([proteins, using, affinity, purification, and, mass, spectrometry])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-3', bound, to, 'metastasis-associated', protein, 2, '(', 'MTA-2),', a, component, of, the, 'NuRD', chromatin, remodelling, complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', and, 'MTA-2', in, turn]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, several, regulatory, regions, of, the, 'Th2', cytokine, locus, and, the, ifng, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cell', transfection, assay, showed, that, 'MTA-2']), verbo([acted]), complemento([as, an, antagonist, with, 'GATA-3', in, the, expression, of, 'Th2', 'cytokines,', but, 'co-operated', with, 'GATA-3', in, the, repression, of, the, ifng, gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'GATA-3', interacts, with, 'MTA-2', to, 'co-ordinately', regulate, 'Th2', cytokine, and, ifng, loci, during, 'T', helper, yet, been, studied])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, observed, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'CD4+', cells, and, 'T-bet', positive, cells, in, psoriatic, lesions])]). 'Th1-specific', transcription, 'factor,', 'T-bet,', may, play, an, important, role, in, the, development, and, maintenance, of, psoriasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Src', family, kinase, 'Lck']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, crucial, in, 'T', cell, signaling, and, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lck']), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, shown, to, play, a, role, in, the, cytokine, expression, of, 'Th2', 'cells,', but, the, mechanism, by, which, 'Lck', influences, 'Th2', effector, functions, is, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', a, mouse, 'model,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Lck', is, important, in, regulating, the, expression, of, 'IL-4', in, 'Th2', skewed, cells, but, is, not, as, necessary, for, the, expression, of, 'Th2', cytokines, 'IL-5,', 'IL-10,', and, 'IL-13'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', this, atypical, expression, pattern, of, 'T-bet', and, 'GATA-3', correlates, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([histone, 3, acetylation, at, the, 'Ifng', locus, and, production, of, the, 'Th1', cytokine, 'IFN-gamma'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([overexpression, of, 'GATA-3', restores, 'IL-4', expression, in, 'lck(-/-)', 'Th2', 'cells;', this, indicates, that, the, decreased, 'IL-4', expression, is, due, in, part, to, reduced, amounts, of, 'GATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, data, imply, that, 'Lck']), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['Th2', differentiation, through, effects, on, 'T-bet', and, 'GATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, transforming, growth, 'factor-beta', receptor, 'III', '(', 'TbetaRIII)', correlates, with]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, transforming, growth, 'factor-beta', '(', to, positively, regulate, 'TbetaRIII', expression, in, human, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', localize, 'GATA3\'s']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, a, 10, -, bp, region, of, the, 'TbetaRIII', not])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'GATA-3', expression, inversely]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'pN1-2', compared, with, 'pN0(mol+)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', though, further, work, in, vivo, to, determine, the, physiological, nature, of, these, effects, is, warranted])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sinomenine']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, used, to, treat, autoimmune, diseases, for, centuries])]). relacion([sujeto(['Increasing', recognition, of, the, importance, of, the, 'Th1/Th2', imbalance, in, nephritis]), verbo([has]), complemento([raised, the, imbalance])]). relacion([sujeto(['Results']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'PBMCs', from, 'MsPGN', patients, expressed, high, levels, of, 'T-bet', mRNA, and, low, levels, of, 'GATA-3', 'mRNA,', complemento([to, have, simultaneously, elevated, 'IFN-gamma', values, and, decreased, 'IL-10', values])]). relacion([sujeto(['Immunohistochemistry', revealed]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['T-bet', and, decreased, 'GATA-3', expression, in, renal, tissues, from, 'MsPGN', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', sinomenine, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, cause, a, decrease, in, 'T-bet', mRNA, 'expression,', resulting, in, a, drop, in, the, 'T-bet/GATA-3', ratio])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sinomenine', was, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, elicit, a, decrease, in, the, serum, levels, of, 'IFN-gamma'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, shift, toward, the, 'Th1', pathway, of, 'Th', cell, activation, occurs, in, 'MsPGN', 'patients,', and, that, sinomenine, has, the, potential, to, counter, this, shift, in, the, 'Th1/Th2', balance, and, thereby, produce, therapeutic, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Delayed', development, of, 'virus-specific', immune, response]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, observed, in, pigs, infected, with, the, porcine, reproductive, and, respiratory, syndrome, virus, '(', 'PRRSV)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', studies, support, the, hypothesis, that, the, 'PRRSV', is, capable, of]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([porcine, immune, 'system,', but, the, mechanisms, involved, are, yet, to, be, defined])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, showed, that, 'PRRSV-infected', 'DCs', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, 'IL-4,', 'Th2', cytokine, production, in, 'OVA-sensitized', and, -, challenged, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', other, 'side,', it]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['IFN-gamma,', 'Th1', cytokine, production, in, 'Quercetin', administrated, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Accordingly,', this, study, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, of, the, immunopharmacological, functions, of, 'Quercetin'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, case, of, 43, -, 'year-old', 'Japanese', man, with, 'PTH-deficient', hypoparathyroidism, introduced, to, an, endocrinologist, in, our, hospital])]). relacion([sujeto(['As']), verbo([he]), complemento([had, complained, of, hearing, disturbance, since, the, age, of, 20, ',', we, decided, to, investigate, the, 'GATA3', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mutation, introduces, a, premature, stop, codon, at, exon, 4, '(', 'K302X),', which, results, in, a]), of, inflammatory, infiltrates, and, were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, stimulation, of, hepatocyte, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Pegylated', granulocyte, 'colony-stimulating', 'thymocytes,', our, findings, indicate, that, 'GATA3', establishes, a, positive, feedback, loop, that, increases, 'TCR', surface, expression, in, developing, 'CD4', lineage, cells])]). '(', 'Th2)', cells, upon, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', molecular, basis, for, this, preferential, 'expression,', 'however,']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, elucidated, to, date])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, gene, for, fucosyltransferase, 'VII', '(', 'FUT7),', the, 'rate-limiting', enzyme, for, sialyl, 'Lewis', 'X', 'synthesis,', is, a, unique, example, of, the, human, genes, with]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, both, 'GATA-3', and, 'T-bet,', two, opposing, factors, for, 'Th1', and, 'Th2', 'development,', and, is, regulated, significantly, interferes, with, the, binding, of, 'T-bet', to, the, 'FUT7', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['T-bet']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, binding, ability, to, 'GATA-3,', 'CBP/P300,', and, 'Sp1', to, form, a, transcription, factor, 'complex,', and, 'GATA-3', regulates, 'FUT7', transcription, by, 'phosphorylation-dependently', recruiting, histone, deacetylase, '(', 'HDAC)-3/HDAC-5', and, significant, 'up-regulation', of, proinflammatory, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, macrophage, activation, at, day, 10, 'postinfection,', followed, by, a, gradual, increase, in, 'transcription-PCR', revealed, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'Th1', cytokine, '(', 'Ifng', and, 'Il12)', and, 'Th1-specific', transcription, factor, 'Tbx21', expression, during, infection, in, both, the, 129, 'S6', and, 129, 'S6-Slc11a1(tm1Mcg)', strains])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, expression, of, 'Gata3,', a, transcription, factor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Th2', 'polarization,', 'Cd28,', and, 'Il4', was, markedly, increased, in, 'Slc11a1-deficient', mice, during, 'infection,', suggesting, a, predominant, 'Th2', phenotype, in, 129, 'S6-Slc11a1(tm1Mcg)', animals, following, 'S'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', presence, of, a, 'Th2', bias, in, 'Slc11a1-deficient', mice, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, improved, bacterial, clearance])]). but, decreased, in, mice, overexpressing, 'T-bet', after, repeated, allergen, exposure])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lung', transforming, growth, 'factor-beta', and, eotaxin, levels, were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, degree, of, subepithelial, fibrosis, and, eosinophilic, airway, 'inflammation,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Frequent', users, of, smokeless, tobacco, '(', 'ST)']), verbo([have]), complemento([an, increased, risk, for, developing, oral, cancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nicotine', and, its, derivatives, may, contribute, to, tumorigenesis, through, stimulation, of, nicotinic, acetylcholine, receptors, '(', 'nAChRs)', in]), verbo([target]), complemento([cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Emerging', evidence, indicates, that, nAChRs, can, that, can, induce, oral, cavity, tumors, in, laboratory, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', used, 'Het-1A', cells, that, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, express, 'alpha3,', 'alpha5,', 'alpha7,', 'alpha9,', beta2, and, beta4, nAChR, subunits])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'NNK', and, 'NNN', competed, with, nicotinic, radioligands, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'Het-1A', 'H]epibatidine-sensitive', nAChRs])]). relacion([sujeto(['NNK', and, 'NNN']), verbo([increased]), complemento([proliferative, potential, of, 'Het-1A', cells, and, produced, an, 'anti-apoptotic', capability, of, anchorage, independent, growth, and, ability, to, produce, tumors, in, nude, 'mice,', both, of, which, can, be, by, inhibited, by, antagonists])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Het-1A', observed, in, neonates])]). relacion([sujeto(['Antigen-specific', 'IFN-gamma', production, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([50, -, 100, -, fold, in, 'STAT6-deficient', 'neonates,', achieving, and, thyrotropes])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, secretion, of, gonadotropins, basally, and, in, response, to, castration, 'challenge,', although, the, mice, are, fertile])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutants']), verbo([have]), complemento([fewer, thyrotrope, cells, at, 'birth,', male, 'Gata2-deficient', mice, exhibit, growth, delay, from, 3, -, 9, wk, of, 'age,', and, adult, mutants, produce, less, 'TSH', in, response, to, severe, hypothyroidism, after, radiothyroidectomy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gata2-deficient', mice, exhibit, elevated, levels, of, 'Gata3', transcripts, in, the, pituitary, 'gland,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'GATA3', can, compensate, for, 'GATA2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', various, transcription, factors, were, defined, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento(['IL-10,', the, molecular, mechanism, for, the, initiation, of, 'Il-10', 'transcription,', remains, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', showed, that, ectopic, expression, of, 'GATA-3', in, naive, primary, 'CD4+', 'T', cells]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([expression, of, 'IL-10', by, these, cells, and, uncovered, a, possible, mechanism, for, this, effect])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-3', induced, changes, of, the, chromatin, structure, at, the, 'Il-10', locus, and, that, these, changes, become, acetylated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', being]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([in, vivo, to, two, locations, on, the, 'Il-10', 'locus,', 'GATA-3', did, not, transactivate, the, 'IL-10', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', therefore]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, key, role, of, 'GATA-3', in, instructing, 'Il-10', gene, expression, in, primary, 'CD4+', 'T', 'cells,', possibly, by, switching, and, stabilizing, the, 'Il-10', locus, into, a, transcriptionally, competent, status])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([new, biologic, aged, mice, and, 'humans,', such, as, on, the, production, of, 'Th1', and, 'Th2', 'cytokines,', but, the, results, show, considerable, variation, and, contradictions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Chromatin', remodeling, of, the, 'Th2', cytokine, gene, locus, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, impaired])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, levels, of, 'Th2', cell, differentiation, and, resulting, 'Th2-dependent', immune, 'responses,', including, allergic, airway, 'inflammation,', decline, during, aging, through, relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, evidence, indicating, that, a, 'chromatin-remodeling', event, in, 'T', cells, is, impaired, by, aging])]). relacion([sujeto(['Opioids', and, cannabinoids, are, both]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'analgetic,', 'psychotropic,', and, immunomodulatory, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, that, both, systems, interact, on, multiple, levels])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that, cannabinoids]), verbo([induce]), complemento([opioid, receptors, and, investigated, 'cannabinoid-dependent', expression, of, the, 'mu-opioid', receptor, subtype, in, a, human, 'T', cell, model])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, activation, of, the, peripheral, cannabinoid, receptor, type, 2, leads, to, a, de, novo, induction, of, 'mu-opioid', receptor, polarization])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, 'Stat6', is, critical, for, the, expression, of, 'IL-5,', 'IL-10,', and, 'IL-13', by, 'NKT', cells])]). in, 'NKT', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'NFAT', family, member, 'NFAT2', is, selectively, increased, in, 'CD4+', 'NKT', cells])]). complemento([in, modulating, the, 'anti-tumor', immune, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, explanation, for, the, poor, prognosis, and, of, 305, patients, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA3', was, one, of, the, top, genes, with, low, expression, in, invasive, carcinomas, with, poor, clinical, outcome])]). ',', larger, tumor, size, '(', 'P', =, 0.03, ')', ',', negative, estrogen, receptor, and, progesterone, receptor, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.001, for, 'both),', and, 'HER2-neu', overexpression, '(', 'P', complemento([between, basal, and, luminal, samples])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', 'BCL', 'basal/luminal', signature, correctly, 're-classified', the, published, series, of, tumour, samples, that, originally, served, to, identify, the, molecular, 'subtypes,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, identified, markers, should, be, useful, for, tumour, classification, and, might, complemento([in, the, 'biosynthesis,', 'transport,', and, secretion, of, noradrenaline, and, is, dependent, on, the, sequential, and, combinatorial, expression, of, numerous, transcription, verbo([target]), complemento([genes, of, the, 'Phox2', proteins, and, dHAND])]). relacion([sujeto(['All', three, proteins, are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'DBH', and, 'PHOX2B', promoter, regions, in, 'SH-SY5Y', neuroblastoma, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', interaction, between, 'Phox2a', and, dHAND, is, analyzed, by, fluorescent, 'anisotropy,', which, demonstrates, that, dHAND]), verbo([causes]), complemento([an, eightfold, increase, in, the, affinity, of, 'Phox2a', for, its, recognition, sites, on, the, 'DBH', promoter, region])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Phox2', proteins, are, not]), verbo([found]), complemento([on, the, genes, encoding, other, noradrenergic, enzymatic, or, transport, proteins, but, are, reciprocally, bound, to, each, 'other\'s', promoters, in, 'SH-SY5Y', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together', with, 'Phox2a', and, 'Phox2b,', dHAND, is]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'PHOX2B', promoter, and, is, also, associated, with, the, 'GATA2', and, eHAND, genes, in, the, absence, of, the, 'Phox2', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Phox2', proteins, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, share, all, target, 'genes,', whereas, dHAND, binds, to, genes, independently, of, 'Phox2a'])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', was, shown, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, two, sites, of, the, 'IL-4', gene, promoter, in, human, 'T-cell', lines, 'PER-117', and, 'Jurkat'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', motif, located, in, the, region, of, position, -, 860, and, responsible, for, 'GATA-3']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, detected, for, the, first, time])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutation', or, deletion, of, this, site]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, direct, involvement, of, 'GATA-3', in, regulation, of, the, human, 'IL-4', gene, transcription, as, a, repressor, of, the, promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', effects, of, 17, 'beta-estradiol', '(', 'E2)', on, immune, function]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, extensively, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['Through', the, use, of, 'ER-deficient', 'mice,', we, and, others]), verbo([have]), complemento([begun, to, demonstrate, the, role, of, the, two, known, receptors, in, modulating, immune, functional, activities])]). 'Th', cell, polarization])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, signature, cytokines, and, cytokine, signaling, events, of, 'Th1', rather, than, 'Th2', cells, relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, 'GATA-3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, this, sequence, in, a, 'position-', and, 'orientation-dependent', 'manner,', in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Deletion', of, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([element, by, replacement, of, the, first, exon, and, part, of, the, first, intron, of, the, il4, gene, with, gfp, leads, to, a, defect, in, the, establishment, of, memory, for, expression, of, 'IL-4,', in, that, reexpression, of, 'IL-4', still, requires, costimulation, by, exogenous, 'IL-4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), relacion([sujeto(['Anti-inflammatory', effects, of, pharmacological, agents]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([at, tyrosine, 'kinases,', 'Syk,', 'Itk,', signal, transducer, and, activator, of, relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', development, of, inhibitors]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([at, the, tyrosine, kinase, signaling, cascade, is, an, attractive, strategy, for, the, treatment, of, asthma])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identified, and, characterized, a, new, 'C/T', substitution, at, position, -, 689, '(', -, 689, 'C>T)', in, the, 'P2', promoter, of, 'PPARgamma', in, a, putative, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', electrophoretic, mobility, shift, 'assay,', both, 'GATA2', and, 'GATA3', proteins, could]), verbo([bind]), complemento([weakly, to, the, 'wild-type', 'P2', -, 689, 'GATA', binding, site, but, not, to, the, mutated, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['Neither', 'GATA2', nor, 'GATA3', was, able, to]), 689, putative, 'GATA', site, was, probably, not, a, functional, target, for, 'GATAs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'P3', -, 681, 'C>G,', 'P2', -, 689, 'C>T,', and, 'Pro12Ala', polymorphisms, and, -, 'fold,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, were, confirmed, by, band, shift, studies, using, different, oligonucleotides, containing, variations, of, the, potential]), complemento([to, reflect, the, capacity, of, 'SAP', to, associate, with, 'SLAM', family, receptors, and, enable, tyrosine, phosphorylation, signaling, by, these, receptors, through, 'SAP-mediated', 'T(H)2', functions, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, imply, that, 'SAP', is, necessary, for, 'T(H)2', cytokine, regulation, primarily, as, a, result, of, its, capacity, expression, of, 'IL-4', and, 'IL-13'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Naive', 'CD4', 'T', cells, did, not, exhibit, any, 'DNase', 'I', hypersensitivity, in, this, 'region,', but, stimulation, under, either, 'Th1', or, 'Th2', conditions]), verbo([caused]), complemento([rapid, development, of, three, hypersensitive, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, point, to, a, physical, separation, in, the, complemento([only, in, the, vicinity, of, the, 'IL-4', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'RAD50', 'LCR', has, a, complex, and, dual, role, in, 'Th1', and, 'Th2', 'differentiation,', communicating, early, 'T', cell, antigen, receptor, and, cytokine, signals, to, the, 'IL-4/IL-13', locus, in, both, differentiating, cell, types])]). 'Spar-Dawley', '(', 'SD)', rats])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', development, of, 'ACAID', can, reduce, the, ocular, inflammation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'LPS,', that, is, related, to, the, verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, that]), verbo([induce]), complemento([rapid, transactivation, of, the, 'IL-13', gene, in, response, to, of, 'IL-4-mediated', signaling, in, a, transgenic, 'mouse,']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([human, 'IL-4R', on, a, mouse, 'IL-4alphaR-deficient', background])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', complemento([condensation, state])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', definitive, genetic, evidence, for, these, roles]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, lacking])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, relacion([sujeto(['The', 'C-terminal', zinc, finger, '(', 'ZnF2)']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['DNA,', whereas, the, 'N-terminal', finger, '(', 'ZnF1)', stabilizes, this, 'DNA', binding, and, interacts, with, other, zinc, finger, 'proteins,', such, as, the, 'Friends', of, 'GATA', '(', 'FOG)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, seven, 'HDR', probands, and, their, families, for, 'GATA3', abnormalities, and, have, identified, two, nonsense, mutations, '(', 'Glu-228', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'Stop', and, 'Arg-367', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'Stop);', two, intragenic, multipotency, and, plasticity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', peripheral, 'blood-derived', and, 'fibroblast-like', cell, line, 'V54/2']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([high, levels, of, 'CD10', and, 'CD105', and, showed, only, a, very, low, level, expression, of, 'CD34', '(', &, 'lt;1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', the, entire, 'CD34(-)CD105(+)', cell, population, that]), verbo([transcribed]), complemento([factors, such, as, 'Myb,', 'Tie-1,', and, 'VEGF,', there, was, a, small, 'Rh123(low)CD34(+)', subpopulation, that, transcribed, significant, levels, of, several, members, of, the, 'GATA', controlling, cell, 'proliferation,', 'differentiation,', 'migration,', and, survival, in, multiple, tissues])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'Smad', proteins, are, known, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, a, number, of, general, transcription, 'factors,', these, are, insufficient, to, explain, the, 'tissue-specific', biology, of, 'TGF-beta', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Through', relacion([sujeto(['Peroxisome', proliferator, activator, receptor, '(', 'PPAR)-binding', protein, '(', 'PBP)', is, an, important, coactivator, for, 'PPARgamma', and, other]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, an, integral, component, of, a, multiprotein, thyroid, hormone, 'receptor-associated', verbo([cause]), complemento([of, embryonic, lethality, at, embryonic, day11])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', was, a, paucity, of, retinal, 'pigment,', defective, lens, 'formation,', excessive, relacion([sujeto(['Phenotypic', changes, in, four, organ, systems, observed, in, 'PBP', null, mice, overlapped, with, those, in, mice, deficient, in, members, of, 'GATA,', a, family, of, verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, all, five, 'GATA', factors, 'analyzed,', 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2,', 'GATA-3,', 'GATA-4,', and, 'GATA-6,', and, show, that, the, binding, of, 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-4,', and, 'GATA-6', to, 'PBP', is, not, dependent, on, the, nuclear, receptor, recognition, sequence, motif, 'LXXLL', '(', where, 'L', is, leucine, and, 'X', is, any, amino, 'acid)', in, 'PBP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Coexpression', of, 'PBP', with, 'GATA-3', markedly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([transcriptional, activity, of, 'GATA-3', in, nonhematopoietic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', observations, identify, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcription, factors, as, a, new]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([partner, of, 'PBP', and, demonstrate, that, 'PBP', is, essential, for, normal, development, of, vital, organ, systems])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'Rlk-/-Itk-/-', cells, showed, impaired, 'TCR-induced', repression, of, the, 'TH2-inducing', transcription, factor, 'GATA-3,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, potential, mechanism, for, 'TH2', development, in, these, hyporesponsive, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', mutations, that, affect, 'Tec', kinases]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, complex, alterations, in, 'CD4+', 'TH', cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto([1, 'alpha,25-Dihydroxyvitamin', 'D3', '(', 'vitD3)', is, an, immunoregulatory, hormone, with, beneficial, effects, on, 'Th1']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([autoimmune, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, vitD3, affects, 'Th', cell, polarization, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['Th1', '(', 'IFN-gamma', 'production)', and, augmenting, 'Th2', cell, development, '(', 'IL-4,', 'IL-5,', and, 'IL-10', 'production)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, were, observed, in, cultures, driven, with, splenic, 'APC', and, 'Ag,', as, well, as, with, 'anti-CD3', and, 'anti-CD28', 'alone,', indicating, that, 'CD4(+)', cells, can, also, be, direct]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, vitD3])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['Th2', development, by, vitD3, was, found, in, both, 'BALB/c', and, 'C57BL/6', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['An']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, the, 'Th2-specific', transcription, factors, 'GATA-3', and, 'c-maf', correlated, with, the, increased, production, of, 'Th2', cytokines, after, vitD3, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'vitD3-induced', effects, were, largely]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([via, 'IL-4,', because, neutralization, of, 'IL-4', almost, completely, abrogated, the, augmented, 'Th2', cell, development, after, vitD3, treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, vitD3, acts, directly, on, 'Th', cells, and, 'can,', in, the, absence, of, 'APC,', enhance, the, development, of, a, 'Th2', phenotype, and, augment, the, expression, of, the, transcription, factors, 'c-maf', and, 'GATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, beneficial, effects, of, vitD3, in, autoimmune, diseases, and, transplantation, operate, through, prevention, of, strong, 'Th1', responses, via, the, action, on, the, 'APC,', while, simultaneously, directly, acting, on, the, 'T', cell, to, enhance, 'Th2', cell, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['IL-13,', a, 'Th2', 'cell-specific', 'cytokine,', is, a, major, effector, molecule]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([several, pathological, features, of, allergic, endogenous, 'GATA-3', 'proteins,', whereas, the, induction, by, 'PMA/ionomycin', is, mediated, by, distinct, 'cis-acting', elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', by]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['GATA-3', in, 'wild-type', and, 'c-maf', transgenic, 'Th1', 'cells,', we, demonstrate, that, the, expression, of, 'IL-13', is, regulated, by, a, mechanism, distinct, from, that, regulating, the, expression, of, 'IL-4,', and, that, the, expression, of, 'Th1', and, 'Th2', cytokine, genes, does, not, have, to, be, mutually, exclusive, in, effector, 'Th', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', objective, of, this, study, was, to, define, phenotypic, changes, of, 'antigen-presenting', cells, '(', 'APCs)', and, 'T', cells, in, a, murine, model, of, 'antigen-induced', airways, inflammation, that]), verbo([involves]), complemento([intraperitoneal, sensitization, with, ovalbumin, '(', 'OVA)/adjuvant', followed, by, antigen, aerosolization])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', 'sensitization,', this, expansion, was, comprised, mainly, of, 'B', 'cells,', a, considerable, proportion, of, which]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['B7'])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', this, 'time,', 'T', cells, were, markedly, expanded, and]), verbo([activated]), complemento([as, assessed, by, 'CD69', 'expression;', 'further,', although, 'GATA-3', and, signal, transducer, and, activator, of, 'transcription-6', were, expressed, at, this, time, 'point,', expression, of, interleukin, '(', 'IL)-4,', 'IL-5,', and, 'IL-13', messenger, 'RNA', '(', 'mRNA)', levels, were, marginal])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', in, vitro, stimulation, of, 'lymph-node', cells, with, 'OVA']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, cytokine, production])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', expansion, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, enhanced, expression, of, both, 'B7'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, observed, expansion, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['CD3(+)/CD4(+)', 'T', cells, expressing, the, 'T', 'helper-2-associated', marker, 'T1/ST2', in, the, 'lung,', most, notably, 5, d, after, challenge])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further,', 'IL-4,', 'IL-5,', and, 'IL-13,', but, not, 'interferon-gamma', mRNA, were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, high, levels, 3, h, after, challenge])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', a, member, of, the, 'GATA-binding', family, of, transcription, factors, was, shown, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, human, 'hypoparathyroidism,', verbo([associated]), complemento([with, decreased, levels, in, demethylation, of, the, 'IL-4', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', selective, 'megakaryocytic/erythroid', differentiation, in, 'HSC', with, enforced, 'GATA-3', expression]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, functional, redundancy, among, 'GATA', proteins, and, indicates, that, the, specific, lineage, fate, determination, by, individual, 'GATA', proteins, is, largely, regulated, at, the, level, of, expression, in, a, lineage, and, 'developmental-stage', restricted, 'fashion,', whereas, the, identity, of, the, 'GATA', factor, may, not, be, as, important])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', mice, carrying, a]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([insertion, of, a, lacZ, reporter, on, one, 'allele,', we, found, that, 'GATA-3', supports, development, of, the, 'CD4', lineage, and]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([maturation, of, 'CD8', 'SP', cells, in, the, thymus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Endothelial', vascular, cell, of, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', believe, that, transcriptional, 'up-regulation', of, rac2]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, coupling, of, both, the, p38, and, 'JNK', 'MAP', a, precocious, 'Hb', transition, was, observed, in, these, 'animals;', '(', 2, ')', an, 'RBC', population, expressing, only, adult, 'Hb', was, confirmed, by, subtracting, the, number, of, 'RBCs', complemento([both, in, the, inner, ear, and, in, afferent, and, efferent, auditory, neurons])]). relacion([sujeto(['Specifically,', 'GATA-3', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, population, ear, by, 'E13'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'GATA-3', is, involved, in, the, pathfinding, of, efferent, neuron, axons, that, navigate, to, the, ear])]). 'and,', 'simultaneously,', in, the, morphogenesis, of, the, inner, ear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, ectopic, expression, and, activation, of, 'Stat6', or, 'GATA-3', in, 'Th', cells, relacion([sujeto(['This', outcome, could, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, predicted, by, the, commonly, used, histoclinical, parameters])]). relacion([sujeto(['No', correlation, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([with, the, age, of, 'patients,', tumor, 'size,', histological, type, and, grade])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our, results, identified, new, ways, to, group, tumors, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['TGF-beta', is, an, important, immunomodulatory, cytokine, that, can]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([differentiation, of, effector, 'T', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, address, the, molecular, mechanisms, through, which, 'TGF-beta']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([differentiation, of, 'CD4(+)', cells, into, 'Th', type, 2, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'TGF-beta']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['GATA-3', expression, in, developing, 'Th', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, show, that, inhibition, of, 'GATA-3', expression, by, 'TGF-beta', is, a, major, mechanism, of, inhibition, of, 'Th2', differentiation, by, 'TGF-beta', as, ectopic, expression, of, 'GATA-3', in, developing, 'T', cells, overcomes, the, ability, of, 'TGF-beta', to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Th2', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['TGF-beta', likely]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['GATA-3', expression, at, the, transcriptional, level, and, does, so, without, interfering, with, 'IL-4', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, murine, 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', are, specifically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, white, adipocyte, precursors, and, that, their, 'down-regulation', sets, the, stage, for, terminal, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Constitutive', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', expression]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([adipocyte, differentiation, and, trapped, cells, at, the, preadipocyte, stage])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3-deficient', embryonic, stem, cells, exhibit, an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([capacity, to, differentiate, into, 'adipocytes,', and, defective, 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', expression, is, associated, with, obesity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([adipocyte, differentiation, through, molecular, control, of, the, 'preadipocyte-adipocyte', transition])]). relacion([sujeto(['Given', the, key, role, of, 'GATA-1', transcription, factor, in, fetal, globin, gene, promoter, 'activity,', we, investigated, whether, specific, 'GATA', family, members, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, prostate, and, whether, they, can, regulate, 'prostate-specific', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-2', and, -, 3, are, the, predominant, 'GATA', family, members, expressed, in, human, and, mouse, prostate, and, that, 'GATA', mRNA, levels, are, not, regulated, by, androgen])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'GATA', sites, are]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'GATA', factors, and, are, essential, for, optimal, androgen, induction, of, transfected, 'PSA', 'enhancer/promoter', plasmids, in, 'LNCaP,', a, 'PSA', and, androgen, receptor, expressing, human, prostate, cancer, cell, line])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, prostatic, 'GATA-2', and, -, 3, are, involved, in, the, androgen, regulation, of, the, 'PSA', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Acetylation', of, a, transcription, factor]), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, shown, to, play, a, significant, role, in, gene, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([have]), complemento([significant, implications, in, that, the, acetylation, state, of, 'GATA-3', affects, its, physiological, function, in, the, immune, system, 'and,', more, 'importantly,', provides, evidence, for, the, novel, role, of, 'GATA-3', in, 'T-cell', survival, and, homing, to, secondary, lymphoid, organs])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', germline, mutation, in, mice, results, in, embryonic, lethality, due, to, defective, erythroid, cell, 'maturation,', and, thus, other, hematopoietic, 'GATA', factors, do, not, compensate, for, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, transgenic, expression, of, a, 'GATA-1', cDNA, fully, abrogated, the, 'GATA-1-deficient', phenotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['Surprisingly,', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', factors]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([from, the, same, regulatory, cassette, also, rescued, the, embryonic, lethal, phenotype, of, the, 'GATA-1', mutation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Committed', 'Th1', cells, cannot, be]), verbo([induced]), complemento([to, change, their, cytokine, profiles, in, response, to, antigenic, stimulation, and, 'Th2', 'cytokine-inducing', conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, ectopic, expression, of, 'GATA-3', induced, 'Th2-specific', cytokine, expression, not, only, in, developing, 'Th1', cells, but, also, in, otherwise, irreversibly, committed, 'Th1', cells, and, a, 'Th1', 'clone,', 'HDK1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ectopic', expression, of, 'GATA-3', in, developing, 'Th1', 'cells,', but, not, in, 'Th1', clone, 'HDK1,']), verbo([induced]), complemento([endogenous, 'GATA-3,', suggesting, an, autoregulatory, mechanism, for, maintenance, of, 'GATA-3', expression, in, 'Th2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', zinc, 'fingers,', 'however,', were]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'IL-5', induction])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', is, a, novel, transcription, factor, recently, shown, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['IL-5', 'and,', 'possibly,', 'IL-4', gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'GATA-3', is, increased, within, the, bronchial, mucosa, of, allergic, asthmatic, subjects, compared, with, control, subjects])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', assess, the, contribution, of, resident, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['GATA-3', 'mRNA,', we, also, performed, isolated, explant, studies, in, which, nasal, mucosal, tissue, from, subjects, with, allergic, rhinitis, and, nonatopic, control, subjects, was, cultured, in, 'allergen-treated', medium])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'summary,', the, expression, of, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-3', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([after, allergen, 'challenge,', and, this, was, evident, in, the, absence, of, de, novo, inflammatory, cell, recruitment])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', may, be, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([in, the, treatment, of, allergic, 'diseases,', such, as, rhinitis])]). relacion([sujeto([3, ')', in, 'Gata3-/-', 'mice,', we, hypothesized, that, a, neuroendocrine, deficiency, in, the, sympathetic, nervous, system, '(', 'SNS)', might]), verbo([cause]), complemento([embryonic, lethality, in, these, mutants])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([here, that, null, mutation, of, 'Gata3', leads, to, reduced, accumulation, of, 'Th', '(', encoding, tyrosine, 'hydroxylase,', 'Th)', and, 'Dbh', '(', dopamine, 'beta-hydroxylase,', 'Dbh)', 'mRNA,', whereas, several, other, 'SNS', genes, are, unaffected])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, 'Th', and, 'Dbh', deficiencies]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, reduced, noradrenaline, in, the, 'SNS,', and, that, noradrenaline, deficiency, is, a, proximal, cause, of, death, in, mutants, by, feeding, catechol, intermediates, to, pregnant, 'dams,', thereby, partially, averting, 'Gata3', 'mutation-induced', lethality])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'Gata3', has, a, role, in, the, differentiation, of, multiple, cell, lineages, during, embryogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gamma', delta, 'T', cells, secrete, 'Th1-', and, 'Th2-like', cytokines, that, help]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([innate, and, acquired, immunity])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([addressed, the, mechanism, whereby, murine, gamma, delta, 'T', cells, acquire, the, capacity, to, differentially, produce, such, cytokines])]). relacion([sujeto(['Splenic', gamma, delta, 'T', cells, could, be, polarized, into, 'IFN-gamma-', or, 'IL-4-secreting', cells, in, 'vitro;', 'however,', in, contrast, to, 'CD4+', alpha, beta, 'T', 'cells,', gamma, delta, 'T', cells, predominantly, produced, 'IFN-gamma,', even, in, the, presence, of, 'IL-4,', a]), verbo([finding]), complemento([independent, of, genetic, background])]). relacion([sujeto(['Like', 'CD4+', 'Th1', 'cells,', 'IFN-gamma-producing', cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([the, 'IL-12', receptor, beta, 2, -, chain, after, activation, in, the, presence, of, 'IL-12;', 'however,', unlike, 'Th2', 'cells,', 'IL-4-primed', gamma, delta, 'T', cells, also, expressed, this, 'receptor,', even, in, the, absence, of, 'IFN-gamma', and, despite, the, presence, of, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['IL-12', also]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['IL-4-primed', gamma, delta, 'T', cells, to, proliferate, and, to, translocate, 'Stat3/Stat4,', indicating, signaling, through, the, 'IL-12', receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', further, understand, the, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, points, of, hemopoietic, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['(', 1, ')', 'Lmo2', and, 'GATA-3', are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, caudal, mesoderm, during, the, phase, of, intraembryonic, precursors, determination])]). relacion([sujeto(['(', 2, ')', 'A', highly, transient, concomitant, expression, is, observed, in, the, caudal, intraembryonic, definitive, 'endoderm,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, these, factors, are, involved, in, the, specification, of, intraembryonic, hemopoietic, precursors])]). relacion([sujeto(['(', 3, ')', 'Lmo2', and, 'GATA-3', immunocytological, analysis, strongly]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, ventral, mesodermal, 'GATA-3', patches, are, involved, in, the, process, of, intraembryonic, stem, cell, generation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, a, conventional, and, a, mitogenic, 'CD28-specific', monoclonal, antibody, to, assess, the, effect, of, polyclonal, 'T', cell, activation, through, 'CD28', alone, on, 'CD4', subset, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'vivo,', mitogenic, but, not, conventional, 'anti-CD28']), verbo([induces]), complemento([massive, 'lymphocytosis,', the, 'Th2', cytokines, interleukin, '(', 'IL)-4', and, 'IL-10,', and, 'Th2-dependent', immunoglobulin, 'isotypes,', most, notably, 'IgE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', the, molecular, 'level,', we, show, for, the, first, time, that, the, activation, of, the, &, 'quot;Th2', 'promoting"', transcription, factor, 'GATA-3']), verbo([requires]), complemento(['co-stimulation', by, 'CD28', and, is, also, induced, by, mitogenic, 'anti-CD28', alone])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CD28-dependent', induction, of, 'GATA-3', in, concert, with, other, transcription, 'factors,', which, are, preferentially, induced, by, strong, 'CD28-signals,', primes, 'CD4', 'T', cells, for, 'IL-4-dependent', 'Th2', differentiaton])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', cytokines, 'IL-4,', 'IL-5,', and, 'IL-13,', secreted, by, 'Th2', 'cells,']), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, functions, in, the, pathogenesis, of, asthma])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-3', is, expressed, in, 'Th2', but, not, 'Th1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, a, 'dominant-negative', mutant, of, 'GATA-3', in, mice, in, a, 'T', 'cell-specific', fashion]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, reduction, in, the, levels, of, all, the, 'Th2', cytokines, 'IL-4,', 'IL-5,', and, 'IL-13'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,']), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['GATA-3', activity, alone, is, sufficient, to, blunt, 'Th2', responses, in, 'vivo,', thereby, establishing, 'GATA-3', as, a, potential, therapeutic, target, in, the, treatment, of, asthma, and, allergic, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, in, detail, the,
