these, two, genes, in, developing, 'brain,', kidney, and, blood, 'islands,', this, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([several, important, novel, expression, domains, during, very, early, stages, of, development])]). relacion([sujeto([cGata2, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, area, opaca, in, 'pre-primitive', streak, 'stages,', forming, a, gradient, along, the, 'A-P', axis, '(', strongest, 'anteriorly)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', genes, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([strongly, in, the, entire, 'non-neural', ectoderm, from, stage, 4, +, ',', and, neither, is, expressed, in, prospective, neural, plate, at, any, stage])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unlike', other, previously, described, 'non-neural', 'markers,', neither, gene, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, dorsal, neural, tube])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analysis', of, gene, expression, on, a, 'medium-', or, 'large-scale', is, an, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([method, for, functional, and, clinical, investigations, based, on, the, now, extensive, catalog, of, known, or, partially, sequenced, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', accessibility, of, this, approach, can, be]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, using, readily, available, technology, '(', macroarrays, on, 'Nylon,', radioactive, 'detection)', and, the, 'IMAGE', resource, to, assemble, sets, of, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([set, up, such, a, 'medium-scale,', flexible, system, and, validated, it, by, the, study, of, quantitative, expression, levels, for, 120, genes, in, six, cell, 'lines,', including, three, mammary, carcinoma, cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', extensive, data, assembled, in, this, survey, identified, potential]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, 'carcinogenesis,', for, example, the, 'CRABP2', and, 'GATA3', transcription, factor, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', quantify, 'GATA-3', expression, during, 'T', cell, development, in, vivo, in, the, 'mouse,', the, 'GATA-3', gene, was]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([by, insertion, of, a, lacZ, reporter, by, homologous, recombination, in, embryonic, stem, '(', 'ES)', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', two, periods, of, 'TCR', alpha, and, beta, gene, 'recombination,', which, occur, in, quiescent, or, slowly, dividing, 'cells,', were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, low, proportions, of, 'GATA-3+', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', therefore, propose, that, 'GATA-3', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, expansion, of, 'T', cell, 'progenitors,', and, for, the, control, of, subsequent, proliferation, 'steps,', which, alternate, periods, of, 'TCR', recombination, in, the, thymus])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', development, and, function, of, 'T', lymphocytes, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([tightly, by, signal, transduction, pathways, that, include, specific, 'cell-surface', 'receptors,', intracellular, signaling, 'molecules,', and, nuclear, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', 1988, ',', several, families, of, functionally, important, 'T', cell, transcription, factors]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we, summarize, our, current, understanding, of, the, transcriptional, regulation, of, 'T', cell, development, and, function, with, particular, emphasis, on, the, results, of, recent, gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([and, transgenic, experiments])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([our, understanding, of, the, molecular, pathways, that, regulate, 'T', cell, development, and, 'function,', these, results, have, suggested, novel, targets, for, genetic, and, pharmacological, manipulation, of, 'T', cell, immunity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', it, is, unlikely, that, the, expression, of, effector, cytokines, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([solely, by, 'Stat', factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently', there]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, indications, that, link, other, molecular, factors, to, 'Th', subset, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'GATA-3', is, selectively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'Th2', cells, and, has, been, shown, to, induce, the, expression, of, 'Th2', cytokines, in, developing, 'Th1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', now, show, that, ectopic, expression, of, 'GATA-3', in, developing, 'Th1', cells, significantly]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['IFN-gamma,', as, well, as, enhancing, 'IL-4', and, 'IL-5', production])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'GATA-3']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([production, of, 'IFN-gamma', by, developing, 'Th1', cells, in, the, complete, absence, of, 'IL-4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', better, understand, the, molecular, basis, for, the, 'hormone-responsive', phenotype, in, breast, 'cancer,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, a, human, cDNA, array, to, compare, patterns, of, gene, expression, between, breast, carcinoma, cell, lines, discordant, for, estrogen, receptor, '(', 'ER)', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Protein', immunoprecipitation, and, gel, shift, analysis, confirmed, the, presence, of, functional, 'GATA-3', protein, in, 'MCF7', but, not, in, 'HBL-100']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'GATA-3,', in, association, with, 'ER,', is, likely, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([genes, critical, to, the, 'hormone-responsive', breast, cancer, phenotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'GATA-3', transcription, factor, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, development, of, the, 'T-cell', lineage, and, 'Th2', cytokine, gene, expression, in, 'CD4', 'T-cells'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([mapped, the, 'DNase-I-hypersensitive', '(', 'HS)', regions, of, the, human, 'GATA-3', gene, in, 'T-cells', and, 'non-T-cells', and, studied, their, transcriptional, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['HS', 'I-III,', located, 5, '\'', from, the, transcriptional, initiation, 'site,', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, hematopoietic, and, 'non-hematopoietic', 'cells,', whereas, 'HS', 'IV-VII,', located, 3, '\'', from, the, transcriptional, start, 'site,', were, exclusively, observed, in, 'T-cells'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', first, intron]), verbo([acted]), complemento([as, a, strong, transcriptional, activator, in, a, 'position-dependent', manner, and, with, no, 'cell-type', specificity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', upstream, regulatory, element, could]), verbo([confer]), complemento(['T-cell', specificity, to, the, 'GATA-3', promoter, 'activity,', and, analysis, of, this, region, revealed, a, 707, -, base, pair, silencer, that, drastically, inhibited, 'GATA-3', promoter, activity, in, 'non-T-cells'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 3, '\'', -, 'CAGGTG', 'E-box', could]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['USF', 'proteins,', the, ubiquitous, repressor, 'ZEB,', or, the, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', proteins, 'E2A', and, 'HEB,', and, we, showed, that, a, competition, between, 'ZEB', and, 'E2A/HEB', proteins, is, involved, in, the, silencer, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'GATA-3', mRNA, expression, is, significantly, increased, in, the, airways, of, asthmatic, subjects, compared, with, those, of, normal, control, subjects, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Numbers', of, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['GATA-3', transcripts, correlated, significantly, with, reduced, airway, caliber, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', density, of, 'GATA-3', 'mRNA+', cells, correlated, significantly, with, the, numbers, of, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['IL-5', mRNA, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([previously, that, neither, a, 6, -, kbp, promoter, fragment, nor, even, a, 120, -, kbp, yeast, artificial, chromosome, '(', 'YAC)', containing, the, whole, 'GATA-3', gene, was, sufficient, to, recapitulate, its, full, transcription, pattern, during, embryonic, development, in, transgenic, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', an, attempt, to, further, identify, 'tissue-specific', regulatory, elements]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, dynamic, embryonic, pattern, of, the, 'GATA-3', 'gene,', we, have, examined, the, expression, of, two, much, larger, '(', 540, -, and, 625, -, 'kbp)', 'GATA-3', 'YACs', in, transgenic, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, most, of, the, 'YAC', expression, sites, and, tissues, are, directly, reflective, of, the, endogenous, 'pattern,', and, detailed, examination, of, the, integrated, 'YAC', transgenes, allowed, the, general, localization, of, a, number, of, very, distant, transcriptional, regulatory, elements, '(', putative, central, nervous, 'system-,', 'endocardium-,', and, urogenital, 'system-specific', 'enhancers)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remarkably,', even, the, 625, -, kbp, 'GATA-3', 'YAC,', containing, approximately, 450, kbp, and, 150, kbp, of, 5, '\'', and, 3, '\'', flanking, 'sequences,', 'respectively,', does, not, contain, the, full, transcriptional, regulatory, potential, of, the, endogenous, locus, and, is, clearly, missing, regulatory, elements, that]), verbo([confer]), complemento(['tissue-specific', expression, to, 'GATA-3', in, a, subset, of, neural, 'crest-derived', cell, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', 'EKLF', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([exclusively, in, erythroid, 'cells,', 'LKLF', is, expressed, temporally, during, early, embryonic, development, and, predominantly, in, the, adult, mouse, lung])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', understand, the, role, this, novel, transcription, factor, plays, in, development, as, well, as, tissue, differentiation, and, 'function,', animals, lacking, 'LKLF', were, produced, using, gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([technology])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, demonstrate, the, 'LKLF', function, is, indispensable, during, normal, embryonic, 'development,', and, although, both, 'LKLF', and, 'EKLF']), verbo([recognize]), complemento([common, 'DNA', 'motifs,', they, do, not, substitute, for, each, other])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', screened, a, panel, of, 1, ',', 920, randomly, selected, cDNAs, to, discover, genes, that, are, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'HL60', cells, exposed, to, 60, 'Hz', magnetic, fields, '(', 2, 'mT)', or, 'X', rays, '(', 5, 'Gy)', compared, to, unexposed, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Eighteen', cDNAs, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'X-irradiated', compared, to, control, 'HL60', cells, were, recovered, from, a, panel, of, 1, ',', 920, clones])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, differential, gene, expression, is, induced, in, approximately, 1, '%', of, a, random, pool, of, cDNAs, by, ionizing, radiation, but, not, by, 60, 'Hz', magnetic, fields, under, the, present, experimental, conditions])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', study, the, regulatory, mechanism, of, gp91phox, gene, expression, in, 'eosinophils,', we, transiently, transfected, 'eosinophil-committed', 'HL-60-C15', cells, with, gp91phox, promoter, 'constructs,', and, identified, a, negative, element, from, bp, -, 267, to, -, 246, of, the, gp91phox, 'gene,', the, deletion, of, which]), verbo([caused]), complemento([an, 83, '%', increase, in, promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Electrophoresis', mobility, shift, assays, demonstrated, 'GATA-3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'GATA', consensus, site, from, bp, -, 256, to, -, 250])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', 81, '%', increment, in, promoter, activity, was, obtained, when, a, mutation, was, introduced, in, the, 'GATA-3']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, of, the, bp, -, 267, to, +, 12, 'construct,', which, is, comparable, to, that, of, the, bp, -, 245, to, +, 12, construct])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', therefore, conclude, that, 'GATA-3', specifically]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'GATA', site, negatively, regulates, the, expression, of, the, gene, in, 'HL-60-C15', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', 800, -, base, pair, proximal, promoter]), verbo([conferred]), complemento([some, 'Th2-selective', expression, in, transgenic, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', this, region, directed, extremely, low, reporter, mRNA, levels, relative, to, endogenous, 'IL-4', 'mRNA,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, full, gene, activity, requires, additional, enhancer, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', proximal, 'IL-4', promoter, is, only, moderately, augmented, by, 'GATA-3,', but, certain, genomic, regions, significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['GATA-3', promoter, transactivation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Some']), verbo([enhancing]), complemento([regions, contained, 'consensus,', 'GATA', sites, that, bound, 'Th2-specific', complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', retroviral, transduction, of, 'GATA-3', into, developing, 'T', cells]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['IL-5', to, full, 'Th2', 'levels,', but, only, partially, restored, 'IL-4', production])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', we, propose, that, 'GATA-3', is, 'permissive,', but, not, 'sufficient,', for, full, 'IL-4', enhancement, and, may]), verbo([act]), complemento([through, 'GATA', elements, surrounding, the, 'IL-13/IL-4', gene, locus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies, in, early, 'Xenopus', and, zebrafish, embryos]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'posteriorizing,', 'non-axial', signals, arising, from, outside, the, organizer, '(', or, 'shield)', contribute, to, 'A/P', patterning, of, the, neural, 'axis,', in, contradiction, to, the, classical, 'Spemann', model, in, which, such, signals, were, proposed, to, be, solely, organizer, derived])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, earliest, expression, of, 'GATA-2', and, 3, is, located, in, nonneural, ectoderm, and, is, strongly, patterned, in, a, graded, manner, along, the, 'A/P', 'axis,', being, high, anteriorly, and, absent, from, the, most, posterior, regions])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', regions, correspond, to, 'head,', trunk, and, tail, ectoderm, and, may, represent, the, beginnings, of, functional, segmentation, of, nonneural, 'ectoderm,', as]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([in, the, concept, of, the, '\'', 'ectomere\''])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'A/P', patterning, of, 'GATA', expression, in, nonneural, ectoderm, may, occur, as, early, as, late, 'blastula/early', gastrula, stages])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', investigate, which, posteriorizing, signals, might, contribute, to, such, distinct, non, axial, ectodermal, patterning, in, the, 'A/P', axis, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, both, 'FGF', and, a, 'Wnt', family, member, contribute, towards, the, final, 'A/P', pattern, of, 'GATA', expression, in, nonneural, ectoderm])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recombination']), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, accessibility, of, substrate, gene, 'segments,', and, transcriptional, enhancers, and, promoters, have, been, shown, to, regulate, the, accessible, chromatin, configuration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sequences']), verbo([required]), complemento([for, full, promoter, activity, were, identified, by, transient, transfections, of, normal, and, mutated, promoters, into, a, human, gammadelta, 'lymphoma,', and, necessary, elements, fall, between, -, 86, and, +, 66, 'nt,', relative, to, the, major, transcription, start, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gel', shift, analyses, and, in, vitro, 'DNase', 'I', footprinting, showed, that]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([proteins, bind, to, the, functionally, relevant, 'CRE,', 'Ets,', +, 1, to, +, 10, 'sequence,', and, the, +, 17, to, +, 21, sequence])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', proteins, also]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, an, 'E', box, at, -, 52, ',', and, 'GATA-3', binds, to, a, 'GATA', motif, at, -, 5, ',', as, shown, by, 'Ab', 'ablation-supershift', 'experiments,', but, mutations, that, abrogated, protein, binding, to, these, sites, failed, to, affect, 'DV101S1', promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cas-Br-E', and, 'Graffi', are, two, murine, viruses, that]), verbo([induce]), complemento([myeloid, leukemia, in, 'mice:', while, 'Cas-Br-E', induces, mostly, 'non-T,', 'non-B', leukemia, composed, of, very, immature, 'cells,', 'Graffi', causes, exclusively, a, granulocytic, leukemia, '(', 'E'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', an, attempt, to, understand, the, basis, of, the, myeloid, specificity, of, these, two, 'retroviruses,', we, used, 'DNase', 'I', footprinting, analysis, and, gel, mobility, shift, assays, to, identify, a, number, of, protein]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, within, the, 'Cas-Br-E', and, 'Graffi', 'U3', regions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', protected, regions, include, potential, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Methylation', interference, analysis, with, different, hematopoietic]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts, showed, the, importance, of, the, 'G', residues, in, these, 'GATA', 'sites,', and, supershift, assays, clearly, identified, the, binding, factors, as, 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2,', and, 'GATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Until', now, the, allantois]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, considered, as, a, hematopoietic, organ])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([experimental, evidence, demonstrating, the, in, situ, emergence, of, both, hematopoietic, and, endothelial, precursors, in, the, avian, allantoic, bud])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', the, prevascularized, allantoic, bud, from, a, quail, embryo, was, grafted, in, the, coelom, of, a, chicken, 'host,', hematopoietic, and, endothelial, cells, later, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, bone, marrow, of, the, host])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, show, by, reverse, 'transcription-PCR', that, the, allantois, region]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([very, early, the, 'GATA', genes, involved, in, hematopoiesis, and, some, 'beta-globin', chain, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Relative', affinities, of, transcriptional, regulatory, elements, for, their, respective, factor]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, essentially, studied, by, bandshift, analysis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, 'real-time', study, of, 'factor/DNA', interactions, using, a, surface, plasmon, resonance, approach, and, further, characterization, of, recovered, proteins, involved, in, this, interaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', this, 'purpose,', human, 'GATA-3,', either, recombinant, or, in]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['extracts,', and, three, natural, 'GATA', elements, of, the, 'HIV-1', long, terminal, repeat, '(', sites, 1, ',', 2, ',', and, 3, ')', were, 'chosen,', in, which, only, site, 2, is, a, noncanonical, 'GATA', site])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interactions', between, the, canonical, and, unique, 'GATA', site, 3, and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts, were, also, studied, in, real, time, and, provided, information, on, its, association, and, dissociation, rates, for, native, 'huGATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, temporally, dynamic, manner, and, fulfills, vital, functions, during, vertebrate, fetal, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Homozygous', 'mGATA-3', mutant, embryos, die, at, 'midgestation,', thus, complicating, the, analysis, of, its, contribution, to, the, development, of, specific, cell, fates, in, the, many, tissues, where, it, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, embryogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, here, that, the, elements, controlling, 'GATA-3', regulation, can, be, precisely, 'refined,', using, control, the, expression, of, 'mGATA-3', in, early, muscle, 'masses,', in, a, subset, of, 'PNS', 'neurons,', in, the, genital, 'tubercle,', and, in, the, branchial, arches])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', enhancer, contains, potential]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, many, 'well-characterized', transcription, 'factors,', suggesting, that, 'mGATA-3', 'localized,', suggesting, that, the, developmentally, transient, expression, of, individual, transcription, factors, collaboratively, contributes, to, the, temporal, and, spatial, pattern, of, cellular, differentiation, leading, to, the, formation, of, adult, anatomy])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-3', was, selectively, expressed, in, 'Th2', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, a, high, level, in, 'naive,', freshly, activated, 'T', cells, and, 'Th2', lineage, 'cells,', but, subsides, to, a, minimal, level, in, 'Th1', lineage, cells, as, naive, cells, commit, to, their, 'Th', subset])]). relacion([sujeto(['Antisense', 'GATA-3']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, expression, of, all, 'Th2', cytokine, genes, in, the, 'Th2', clone, 'D10'])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', directly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([an, 'IL-4', 'promoter-luciferase', reporter, gene, in, 'M12', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', transgenic, 'mice,', elevated, 'GATA-3', in, 'CD4', 'T', cells]), verbo([caused]), complemento(['Th2', cytokine, gene, expression, in, developing, 'Th1', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'ATL-16T', cells, which]), verbo([express]), complemento(['IL-5', 'mRNA,', we, have, identified, a, 'region,', within, the, human, 'IL-5', gene, 'promoter,', that, regulates, 'IL-5', gene, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'cis-acting', sequence, contains, the, core]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['motif,', '(', 'A/T)GATA(A/G),', for, 'GATA-binding', family, proteins, and, thus, suggests, the, involvement, of, these, family, members])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, describe, the, cloning, of, human, 'GATA-4', '(', 'hGATA-4)', and, show, that, 'hGATA-4', selectively]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, -, 70, 'GATA', site, within, the, 'IL-5', proximal, promoter, region])]). relacion([sujeto(['ATL-16T', cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([mRNA, of, three, 'GATA-binding', 'proteins,', 'hGATA-2,', 'hGATA-3', and, 'hGATA-4,', and, each, of, them, has, a, potential, to, bind, to, the, consensus, '(', 'A/T)GATA(G/', 'A)', motif])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', using, 'ATL-16T']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['extract,', we, demonstrated, that, 'GATA-4', is, the, 'GATA-binding', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', evaluate, the, functional, role, of, 'GATA', motifs, in, the, 5, '\'', -, flanking, region, of, a, 'kidney-specific', 'AQP-2', water, channel, 'gene,', we, sought, to, isolate, a, 'GATA', 'factor(s)']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, collecting, ducts, and, determined, the, role, on, the, 'AQP-2', promoter])]). expression, vector, indicated, that, rat, 'GATA-3']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, 'AQP-2', promoter, activity, about, fourfold])]). relacion([sujeto(['TAL1,', which, is, frequently]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, 'T', cell, acute, lymphoblastic, leukemia, '(', 'T-ALL),', encodes, 'lineage-specific', basic, 'helix-loop-helix', '(', 'bHLH)', proteins, that, bind, specifically, to, 'E-box', 'DNA', motif, upon, dimerization, with, ubiquitous, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', proteins, 'E47', or, 'E12'])]). relacion([sujeto(['RBTN1', and, 'RBTN2,', also, frequently]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, 'T-ALL,', encode, proteins, only, with, tandem, 'cysteine-rich', 'LIM', domains])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, aberrant, expression, of, 'TAL1', detected, in, 11, out, of, 14, 'T-ALL', cell, lines, was, invariably, accompanied, by, that, of, either, 'RBTN1', or, 'RBTN2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Forced', expression, of, 'TAL1', together, with, 'RBTN1', or, 'RBTN2,', but, not, 'TAL1', 'alone,', strongly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([artificial, reporter, genes, in, a, 'TAL1/RBTN-negative', 'T-ALL', cell, 'line,', 'HPB-ALL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Such', collaborative, transcriptional, activity, of, 'TAL1', and, 'RBTN', was, 'not,', 'however,', observed, in, 'non-T', cell, 'lines,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([further, involvement, of, some, 'T', 'cell-specific', cofactors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, showed, that, coexpression, of, 'TAL1', and, 'RBTN1', in, 'HPB-ALL', strongly]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['TALLA1,', a, highly, specific, 'T-ALL', marker, whose, positivity, correlated, 100, '%', with, ectopic, expression, of, 'TAL1', among, various, 'T-ALL', cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['Collectively,', ectopic, 'TAL1', and, 'RBTN1', or, -, 2, ',', together, with, some, endogenous, 'T', 'cell-specific', cofactors, like, 'GATA3,', constitute, a, highly, collaborative, set, of, transcription, factors, whose, aberrant, activity, in, 'T', cells, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, leukemogenesis, by, modulating, expression, of, downstream, genes, such, as, 'TALLA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Commitment', and, differentiation, of, hematopoietic, stem, cells, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, progressive, restriction, of, cellular, proliferation, and, the, progressive, expression, of, a, subset, of, genes, encoding, the, markers, of, mature, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', two, processes, are, genetically]), verbo([regulated]), complemento(['and,', in, this, 'paper,', 'I', review, the, expression, and, function, of, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcription, factors, as, an, example, of, this, genetic, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA', 'cis-acting', elements, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, most, of, the, regulatory, regions, of, 'T-lymphoid,', erythrocytic, and, megakaryocytic, restricted, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'GATA', motifs, are]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, the, members, of, a, family, of, transcriptional, 'regulators:', the, 'GATA', family])]). relacion([sujeto(['Three', members, of, this, 'family,', 'GATA-1,', 2, and, 3, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hematopoietic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Flow', cytometric, and, 'CD4-CD8-CD44+CD25-'])]). relacion([sujeto(['No', 'TCF-1-producing', cells, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, fetal, liver, '(', 'FL)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'T', cell, development, from, 'FL,', but, not, 'FT,', progenitors, in, the, 'FT', organ, culture, system, is, severely, inhibited, by, the, addition, of, antisense, oligonucleotides, for, either, 'TCF-1', or, 'GATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'TCF-1', and, 'GATA-3', play, essential, roles, in, the, initiation, of, the, earliest, steps, of, 'T', cell, development, in, the, thymus])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([distribution, of, 'GATA', transcription, factors, in, murine, haemopoietic, cells, was, examined, by, indirect, immunofluorescence])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'foci,', which, were, preferentially]), verbo([found]), complemento([adjacent, to, nucleoli, or, at, the, nuclear, 'periphery,', did, not, represent, sites, of, active, transcription, or, binding, of, 'GATA-1', to, consensus, sites, in, the, 'beta-globin', loci])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'GATA-1']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([bodies, differed, from, previously, described, nuclear, structures, and, there, was, no, 'co-localization', with, nuclear, antigens, involved, in, 'RNA', processing, or, other, ubiquitous, '(', 'Spl,', 'c-Jun', and, 'TBP)', or, haemopoietic, '(', 'NF-E2)', transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', proteins, also, localized, to, the, same]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([bodies, in, cell, lines, 'co-expressing', 'GATA-1', and, -, 2, or, 'GATA-1', and, -, 3, gene, products])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', pattern, of, distribution, 'is,', thus, 'far,', unique, to, the, 'GATA', transcription, factors, and]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, 'protein-protein', interaction, with, other, components, of, the, nuclear, bodies, via, the, 'GATA', zinc, finger, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Accumulating', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, role, for, cAMP, as, an, 'immunomodulator;', agents, that, increase, intracellular, cAMP, levels, have, been, shown, to, inhibit, production, of, cytokines, predominantly, produced, by, 'T', helper, '(', 'Th)', 1, cells, such, as, 'IL-2', and, interferon, gamma, '(', 'IFN-gamma)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, production, of, 'IL-5,', predominantly, produced, by, 'Th2', 'cells,', is, actually]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, these, agents])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([performed, transient, transfection, experiments, with, 'IL-5', 'promoter-reporter', gene, 'constructs,', 'DNase', 'I', footprinting, 'assays,', and, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assays, to, investigate, the, key, regulatory, regions, necessary, for, activation, of, the, 'IL-5', promoter, by, dibutyryl, cAMP, and, phorbol, esters, in, the, mouse, thymoma, line, 'EL-4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data, demonstrate, the, critical, importance, of, two, sequences, within, the, 'IL-5', 5, '\'', -, flanking, region, for, activation, by, these, agents, in, 'EL-4', 'cells:', 'one,', a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([15, -, base, pair, element, present, in, genes, expressed, by, 'Th2', 'cells,', called, the, conserved, lymphokine, element, 0, '(', 'CLE0;', located, between, -, 53, and, -, 39, in, the, 'IL-5', 'promoter),', and, the, 'other,', two, overlapping, binding, sites, for, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-3', '(', but, not, 'GATA-4)', between, -, 70, and, -, 59])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, activation, via, the, unique, sequence, combination, 'GATA/CLE0', results, in, selective, expression, of, the, 'IL-5', gene, in, response, to, elevated, levels, of, intracellular, cAMP])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, isolation, of, a, human, cDNA, clone, which, encodes, a, 3, '\'', segment, of, a, novel, protein, with, three, zinc, fingers])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'protein,', which, we, termed, 'G3B,', can]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'GATA-3', in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Its', mRNA, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'T', and, 'B', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', is, one, member, of, a, growing, family, of, related, transcription, factors, which, share, a, strongly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([expression, pattern, in, all, vertebrate, organisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', order, to, elucidate, 'GATA-3', function, using, a, direct, genetic, 'approach,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([disrupted, the, murine, gene, by, homologous, recombination, in, embryonic, stem, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'ATL-16T', cells, which]), verbo([express]), complemento(['IL-5', 'mRNA,', we, have, identified, a, region, within, the, human, 'IL-5', gene, promoter, that, regulates, 'IL-5', gene, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', 'cis-acting', sequence, contains, the, core]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['motif,', '(', 'A/T)GATA(A/G),', for, 'GATA-binding', family, proteins, and, thus, suggests, the, involvement, of, this, family, members])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, describe, the, cloning, of, human, 'GATA-4', '(', 'hGATA-4)', and, show, that, 'hGATA-4', selectively]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, -, 70, 'GATA', site, within, the, 'IL-5', proximal, promoter, region])]). relacion([sujeto(['ATL-16T', cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([mRNAs, of, three, 'GATA-binding', 'proteins,', 'hGATA-2,', 'hGATA-3,', and, 'hGATA-4,', and, each, of, them, has, a, potential, to, bind, to, the, consensus, '(', 'A/T)GATA(G/A)', motif])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', using, 'ATL-16T']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['extract,', we, demonstrated, that, 'GATA-4', is, the, only, 'GATA-binding', protein, that, forms, a, specific, 'DNA-protein', complex, with, the, -, 70, 'GATA', site])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, with, extracts, of, 'COS', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['GATA-binding', proteins, showed, that, 'GATA-4', has, the, highest, binding, affinity, for, the, -, 70, 'GATA', site, among, the, three, 'GATA-binding', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([rearranged, 'in-frame', the, two, alleles, of, the, heavy, 'chain,', deleted, one, light, chain, 'locus,', and, rearranged, abortively, the, two, alleles, of, the, second, light, chain, 'locus,', the, cell, line, does, not, produce, immunoglobulin, molecules, or, message])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([expresses]), complemento([a, variety, of, 'T-cell', characteristic, markers, such, as, 'Xenopus', pan, 'T-cell', 'markers,', 'CD8', equivalent, and, 'GATA3', transcription, factor])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', does, not]), verbo([express]), complemento([any, major, histocompatibility, complex, class, 'I', or, class, 'II', molecules])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, 'SCL,', 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2', are, expressed, in, multipotent, progenitors, prior, to, lineage, 'commitment,', but, are, 'down-regulated', during, 'granulocyte/monocyte', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', phenomenon, of, gene, extinction, in, cell, hybrids, may]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([negative, regulatory, mechanisms, operating, during, normal, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([therefore, analysed, the, regulation, of, 'SCL,', 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', in, cell, hybrids, formed, by, the, fusion, of, cell, lines, representing, different, haemopoietic, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, 'GATA-3', was, extinguished, in, both, human, and, murine, erythroid, x, 'T', cell, 'hybrids,', an, observation, which]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, erythroid, cells, contain, factors, capable, of, repressing, 'GATA-3', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'T', cells, and, 'B', cells, do, not, contain, 'trans-acting', factors, capable, of, 'down-regulating', expression, of, 'SCL,', 'GATA-1', or, 'GATA-2,', and, therefore, raise, the, possibility, that, a, '\'', hit, and, 'run\'', mechanism, may, repress, these, genes, during, normal, haemopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, analysis, of, 'SCL', and, 'GATA', gene, regulation, in, stable, cell, hybrids])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'GATA', family, of, transcription, factors]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([a, wide, variety, of, 'genes,', including, those, involved, in, differentiation, of, erythrocytes, and, 'T', lymphocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, creation, of, a, dominant, negative, mutant, of, 'GATA-3,', 'KRR,', which, effectively, blocks, 'wild-type', 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2,', and, 'GATA-3', transactivation, when, 'co-expressed', in, transient, assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'GATA-3', 'KRR', mutation, does, not, affect, 'expression,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['translocation,', or, the, ability, to, bind, to, a, consensus, 'GATA', sequence])]). relacion([sujeto(['KRR', can]), verbo([suppress]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, minimal, 'T', cell, receptor, '(', 'TCR)', alpha, and, beta, enhancers, by, 12, -, and, 3.4, -, 'fold,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 'KRR', did, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, significant, effect, on, the, activity, of, larger, 'TCR-alpha', and, -, beta, enhancer, fragments])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', functional, redundancy, in, the, 'TCR-alpha', and, -, beta, enhancers, can, compensate, for, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GATA-3', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', situ, hybridization, shows, that, 'mGATA-3', mRNA, accumulation, is, temporally, and, spatially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([during, early, 'development:', although, found, most, abundantly, in, the, placenta, prior, to, 10, days, of, 'embryogenesis,', 'mGATA-3', expression, becomes, restricted, to, specific, cells, within, the, embryonic, central, nervous, system, '(', in, the, 'mesencephalon,', 'diencephalon,', pons, and, inner, 'ear)', later, in, gestation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, this, distinct, pattern, in, the, nervous, 'system,', 'mGATA-3', is, also]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, embryonic, kidney, and, the, thymic, 'rudiment,', and, further, analysis, showed, that, it, is, expressed, throughout, 'T', lymphocyte, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', least, two, regulatory, elements, '(', one, positive, and, one, 'negative)', appear, to, be]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, appropriate, 'tissue-restricted', regulation, after, transfection, of, 'mGATA-3-directed', reporter, genes, into, cells, that, naturally, express, 'GATA-3', '(', 'T', lymphocytes, and, neuroblastoma, 'cells)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', this, same, region, of, the, locus]), verbo([confers]), complemento([developmentally, appropriate, expression, in, transgenic, 'mice,', but, only, in, a, subset, of, the, tissues, that, naturally, express, the, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Three', 'high-affinity']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcriptional, regulators, have, been, identified, within, the, 'T-cell', receptor, 'beta-chain', '(', 'TCR', 'beta)', transcriptional, 'enhancer,', and, their, functional, significance, has, been, determined, in, an, effort, to, understand, the, 'T-cell', specificity, of, the, enhancer, more, fully])]). relacion([sujeto(['Neither', site, 'TE1', nor, site, 'TE2', can, functionally, replace, a, mutated, 'TE4', site, in, 'T', 'cells;', 'however,', the, same, 'protein,', probably, 'GATA-3,']), verbo([binds]), complemento([all, three, 'sites,', as, judged, by, electrophoretic, mobility, 'shift,', oligonucleotide, 'competition,', and, proteolytic, clipping, assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, additional, proteins, are, critical, for, the, ability, of, 'GATA-3', to, activate, the, 'TCR', beta, enhancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'fibroblasts,', the, 'GATA', sequence, at, site, 'TE1', appears, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([a, negative, regulator])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', this, is, not, true, in, 'B', 'cells,', 'B', cells, and, fibroblasts, appear, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([different, mechanisms, for, negative, regulation, of, the, 'TCR', beta, enhancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA3,', a, member, of, the, 'GATA', family, that, is, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'T-lymphocyte', 'lineage,', is, thought, to, participate, in, 'T-cell', receptor, gene, activation, through, binding, to, enhancers])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', two, human, 'GATA3', zinc, fingers, are, encoded, by, two, separate, exons, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([with, those, of, 'GATA1,', but, no, other, structural, homologies, between, these, two, genes, can, be, found])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', promoter, sequence, analysis, of, these, two, genes, revealed, that, they, are, embedded, within, a, 'CpG', island, and, share, structural, features, often]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, promoters, of, housekeeping, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', is, a, zinc, finger, transcription, factor, which, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, highly, restricted, and, strongly, conserved, tissue, distribution, pattern, in, vertebrate, 'organisms,', 'specifically,', in, a, subset, of, hematopoietic, 'cells,', in, cells, within, the, central, and, peripheral, nervous, 'systems,', in, the, 'kidney,', and, in, placental, trophoblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tissue-specific', cellular, genes]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA-3', have, been, identified, in, 'T', lymphocytes, and, the, 'placenta,', while, 'GATA-3-regulated', genes, in, the, nervous, system, and, kidney, have, not, yet, been, defined])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, of, these, experiments, show, some, anticipated, 'phenotypes,', for, 'example,', the, definition, of, discrete, domains]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, specific, 'DNA-binding', site, recognition, '(', amino, acids, 303, to, 348, ')', and, trans, activation, '(', amino, acids, 30, to, 74, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', signaling, sequence, for]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([localization, of, human, 'GATA-3', is, a, property, conferred, by, sequences, within, and, surrounding, the, amino, finger, '(', amino, acids, 249, to, 311, ')', of, the, 'protein,', thereby, assigning, a, function, to, this, domain, and, thus, explaining, the, curious, observation, that, this, zinc, finger, is, dispensable, for, 'DNA', binding, by, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genes', encoding, the, accessory, molecules, 'CD8', and, 'CD4', are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([early, in, thymocyte, 'development,', generating, 'CD4+8+', double, positive, 'intermediates,', which, give, rise, to, two, functionally, distinct, mature, 'T', cell, subsets, that, express, either, 'CD4', or, 'CD8'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', identify, the, key, regulatory, 'factors,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([initiated, an, analysis, of, the, transcriptional, regulation, of, the, murine, 'CD8', alpha, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, three, 'CD8+', 'cell-specific', 'DNAase', 'I', hypersensitive, sites, '(', 'HSS)', located, upstream, of, the, murine, 'CD8', alpha, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, mobility, shift, analysis, of, the, -, 4.0, -, kb, 'HSS', region]), verbo([has]), complemento([revealed, multiple, binding, sites, for, the, 'T', 'cell-restricted', transcription, factor, 'GATA-3'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro]), verbo([translated]), complemento([murine, 'GATA-3', binds, specifically, to, both, 'CD8', 'GATA', 'sites,', and, coexpression, of, this, factor, in, transient, transfection, assays, transactivates, a, reporter, construct, containing, these, sequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, evidence, for, the, role, of, a, 'T', 'cell-restricted', factor, in, the, regulation, of, either, 'CD8', or, 'CD4', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'GATA-1,', -, 2, ',', and, -, 3]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, recognize, a, consensus, sequence, derived, from, regulatory, elements, in, erythroid, 'cell-specific', 'genes,', 'WGATAR', '(', in, which, 'W', indicates, 'A/T', and, 'R', indicates, 'A/G),', the, potential, for, more, subtle, differences, in, the, binding, preferences, of, each, factor, has, not, been, previously, addressed])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', employing, a]), verbo([binding]), complemento([selection, and, polymerase, chain, reaction, amplification, scheme, with, randomized, 'oligonucleotides,', we, have, determined, the, 'binding-site', specificities, of, bacterially, expressed, chicken, 'GATA-1,', -, 2, ',', and, -, 3, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', all, three, 'GATA', factors]), verbo([bind]), complemento([an, 'AGATAA', erythroid, consensus, motif, with, high, 'affinity,', a, 'second,', alternative, consensus, 'DNA', 'sequence,', 'AGATCTTA,', is, also, recognized, well, by, 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', but, only, poorly, by, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, all, three, 'GATA', factors, are, capable, of, mediating, transcriptional, effects, via, a, common, erythroid, consensus, 'DNA-binding', motif])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3,', because, of, their, distinct, expression, patterns, and, broader, 'DNA', recognition, 'properties,', may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, additional, regulatory, processes, beyond, those, of, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', definition, of, an, alternative, 'GATA-2-GATA-3', consensus, sequence, may, facilitate, the, identification, of, new]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, in, the, further, elucidation, of, the, roles, that, these, transcription, factors, play, during, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', family, of, transcriptional]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['proteins,', the, 'GATA', 'factors,', has, been, shown, to, bind, to, a, consensus, motif, through, a, highly, conserved, 'C4', zinc, finger, 'DNA', binding, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', member, of, this, multigene, 'family,', 'GATA-3,', is, most, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'T', 'lymphocytes,', a, cellular, target, for, human, immunodeficiency, virus, type, 1, '(', 'HIV-1)', infection, and, replication])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, 'DNase', 'I', footprinting, analysis, revealed, six, 'hGATA-3']), differentiation, in, an, 'estrogen-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', phenotypic, effects, are, specifically, attributable, to, the, action, of, ectopically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['GATA-2/ER', because, erythroblasts, expressing, exogenous, 'GATA-2', are, constitutively, arrested, in, differentiation, and, because, erythroid, progenitors, expressing, either, 'Gal/ER', or, 'GATA-3/ER', do, not, display, a, 'hormone-responsive', block, in, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, 'GATA-2', transcription, factor, appears, to, play, a, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, 'self-renewal', capacity, of, early, erythroid, progenitor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'GATA', family, of, 'C4', 'zinc-finger', transcription, factors]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, 'tissue-specific', gene, regulation, in, birds, and, mammals])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, the, members, of, this, 'family,', 'GATA-3,', is, reportedly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([specifically, in, the, 'T-cell', 'lineage,', where, it, interacts, with, 'GATA', motifs, in, the, 'TCR-alpha,', 'TCR-beta,', and, 'TCR-delta', documented, its, expression, pattern, during, lymphoid, differentiation, and, murine, embryogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-3', was, uniquely]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'T-lineage', lymphocytes, expressing, 'TCR', and, 'CD3', 'genes;', it, was, absent, from, 'TCR/CD3', 'mRNA-negative', prothymocytes, and, from, all, 'B-lineage', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, clues, about, the, potential, role, of, 'GATA-3', during, mouse, 'development,', and, will, aid, the, interpretation, of, currently, ongoing, gene, knockout, experiments])]). relacion([sujeto(['Proteins', that]), verbo([recognize]), complemento([the, core, sequence, 'GATA', are, important, regulators, of, 'hematopoietic-specific', gene, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, cDNAs, encoding, the, 'Xenopus', laevis, homologues, of, three, related, transcription, 'factors,', designated, 'GATA-1,', -, 2, ',', and, -, 3])]). relacion([sujeto(['Comparative', sequence, analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([strong, conservation, of, the, 'zinc-finger', 'DNA-binding', domain, among, all, vertebrate, 'GATA-binding', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', polypeptides, are, homologous, throughout, their, entire, 'sequences,', whereas, 'GATA-1', sequence, is]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([only, in, the, region, responsible, for, 'DNA', binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'Xenopus,', 'RNAs', encoding, 'GATA-binding', proteins, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, both, larval, and, adult, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', family, of, transcriptional, activators]), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, identified, in, 'chickens;', these, of, this, multigene, 'family,', 'cGATA-3,', is, most, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'T-lymphocyte', cell, lineage])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', murine, and, human, factors, are, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, variety, of, human, and, murine, 'T-cell', lines, and, can, activate, transcription, through, a, 'tissue-specific', 'GATA-binding', site, identified, within, the, human, 'T-cell', receptor, delta, gene, enhancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', infer, that, the, murine, and, human, 'GATA-3', proteins, play, a, central, and, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([role, in, vertebrate, 'T-cell-specific', transcriptional, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['Saccharomyces', cerevisiae, 'cap-binding', protein, 'Cbc1/Sto1', binds, mRNA, 'co-transcriptionally', and, acts, as, a, key, coordinator, of, mRNA, fate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', 'Cbc1']), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, implicated, in, transcription, elongation, and, 'pre-initiation', complex, '(', 'PIC)', formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previously,', we, described, 'Cbc1', to, be]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, cell, growth, under, osmotic, stress, and, to, mediate, 'osmostress-induced', translation, reprogramming])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', 'CBC1', deletion, specifically, reduces, transcription, rates, of, highly]), verbo([transcribed]), complemento([genes, under, 'non-stress', 'conditions,', such, as, ribosomal, protein, '(', 'RP)', 'genes,', while, having, low, impact, on, transcription, of, weakly, expressed, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', our, results, indicate, that]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Cbc1', to, the, capped, crops, own, gene, pool, using, 'GM', 'technology,', thereby]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([favourable, characteristics, of, established, varieties])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', developed, a, 'marker-free', transformation, pipeline, to, select, potato, plants, functionally]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([a, stack, of, late, blight, 'R', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thereby,', this, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([an, important, tool, for, the, successful, deployment, of, 'R', genes, in, agriculture, and, contributes, to, the, production, of, potentially, durable, late, blight, resistant, potatoes])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', include, the, overproduction, of, the, exopolysaccharide, alginate, and, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, complete, lipopolysaccharide, '(', 'LPS)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', grown, at, 25, &, 'deg;C,', 2192]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([serotype, 'O1', 'LPS', with, a, moderate, chain, length, and, in, reduced, amounts, relative, to, those, of, a, 'wild-type', serotype, 'O1', laboratory, strain, '(', 'stO1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 2192]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([no, 'LPS', 'O', antigen, when, grown, at, 37, &, 'deg;C'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is, the, first, time, that, a, 'temperature-sensitive', defect, in, 'O-antigen', production]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', complementation, analyses, with, a, constructed, wbpM, deletion, mutant, of, 'stO1,', we, demonstrate, that, the, 'temperature-sensitive', 'LPS', in, this, 'CF', isolate])]). relacion([sujeto(['Shortening', eukaryotic, 'poly(A)', tails, represses, mRNA, translation, and]), verbo([induces]), complemento([mRNA, turnover])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', major, cytoplasmic, 'deadenylase,', the, 'Ccr4-Not', 'complex,', is, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([multisubunit, assembly])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ccr4-Not', is, organized, around, 'Not1,', a, large, scaffold, protein, that]), verbo([recruits]), complemento([two, 3, '\'', -, 5, '\'', 'exoribonucleases,', 'Caf1', and, 'Ccr4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([structural, studies, showing, that, the, 'N-terminal', arm, of, yeast, 'Not1', has, a, 'HEAT-repeat', structure, with, domains, related, to, the, 'MIF4G', fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 'MIF4G', domain, positioned, centrally, within, the, 'Not1', protein]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento(['Caf1,', which, in, turn, binds, the, 'LRR', domain, of, 'Ccr4', and, tethers, the, 'Ccr4', nuclease, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Small']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([and, nucleolar, 'RNAs', that, program, 'pre-mRNA', splicing, and, rRNA, processing, have, a, signature, 5, '\'', -, trimethylguanosine, '(', 'TMG)', cap])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', the, mechanism, of, 'TMG', synthesis, by, 'Tgs1', methyltransferase]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'elucidated,', we, know, little, about, whether, or, how, 'RNP', 'biogenesis,', structure, and, function, are, perturbed, when, 'TMG', caps, are, missing])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finer', analysis, revealed, stoichiometric, association, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['cap-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', subunits, 'Sto1', and, 'Cbc2', with, otherwise, intact, 'Mud1-', and, verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, mutating, the, 'cap-binding', pocket, of, 'Cbc2,', suggesting, that, ectopic, 'CBP', binding, to, the, exposed, 'U1', 'm(7)G', cap, in, 'tgs1Δ', cells, '(', not, lack, of, 'TMG', caps, per, 'se)', underlies, the, cs, phenotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', splicing, repressors, typically, interfere, with, transcript, recognition, by, spliceosomal, 'components,', the, yeast, protein, 'L30', blocks, spliceosomal, rearrangements]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, engagement, of, 'U2', snRNP, '(', small, ribonucleoprotein, 'particle)', to, its, own, transcript, 'RPL30'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', a, mutation, in, the, 'RPL30']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, that, disrupts, this, 'repression,', we, have, taken, a, genetic, approach, to, reveal, that, regulation, of, splicing, is, restored, in, this, mutant, by, deletion, of, the, 'cap-binding', complex, '(', 'CBC)', component, 'Cbp80'])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, initial, 5, '\'', splice, site, recognition, by, 'U1', 'and,', 'independently,', facilitates, 'U2', 'recruitment,', depending, on, sequences, located, in, the, vicinity, of, the, 5, '\'', splice, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, function, for, 'CBC', in, splicing, and, imply, that, these, molecular, events, can, be, the, target, of, a, splicing, regulator])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', understand, how, 'DEXD/H-box', proteins]), verbo([recognize]), complemento([and, interact, with, their, cellular, 'substrates,', we, have, been, studying, 'Prp28p,', a, 'DEXD/H-box', splicing, factor, required, for, switching, the, 'U1', snRNP, with, the, 'U6', snRNP, at, the, precursor, mRNA, '(', 'pre-mRNA)', 5, '\'', splice, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', previously, demonstrated, that, the, requirement, for, 'Prp28p', can, be, eliminated, by, mutations, that, alter, either, the, 'U1', snRNA, or, the, 'U1C', 'protein,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, both, are, targets, of, 'Prp28p'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Inspired', by, this, 'finding,', we, designed, a, bypass, genetic, screen, to, specifically, search, for, 'additional,', novel]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, 'Prp28p'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Ynl187p', acts, in, concert, with, 'U1C', and, 'Cbp80p', to, help, stabilize, the, 'U1', 'snRNP-5\'', splice, site, interaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', forward, genetic, screen, was, performed, to, identify, mutants, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([resistance, to, the, inhibitory, effects, of, high, levels, of, exogenous, sugars, on, early, 'Arabidopsis', seedling, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', positional, cloning, and, characterization, of, two, of, these, sugar, insensitive, '(', 'sis)', 'mutants,', both, of, which, are, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, abscisic, acid, '(', 'ABA)', biosynthesis, or, 'response,', are, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gene', expression, profiling, revealed, that, a, significant, number, of, genes, that, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, lower, levels, in, germinating, 'sis7-1/nced3-4/sto1-4', seeds, than, in, 'wild-type', seeds, are, implicated, in, auxin, biosynthesis, or, 'transport,', suggesting, 'cross-talk', between, 'ABA', and, auxin, response, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Potato', is, the, 'world\'s', fourth, largest, food, crop, yet, it, continues, to, endure, late, complemento([transcription, and, multiple, processing, steps])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, of, a, pair, of, evolutionarily, conserved, complemento([with, the, 'CT', complex, of, histone, 'mRNAs,', but, not, with, the, 'eIF4E-depedent', translation, '(', 'ET)', complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', lines, of, evidence, indicate, 'initiation,', expanding, the, repertoire, of, 'CT', as, a, step, for, determining, the, fate, of, histone, mRNAs])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mRNA, export, complex, 'TREX', '(', 'TREX)', is, known, to, contain, 'Aly,', 'UAP56,', 'Tex1', and, the, 'THO', 'complex,', among, which, 'UAP56', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'TREX', assembly])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Tex1', is, essentially, a, subunit, of, the, 'THO', complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['Aly,', 'THO', and, 'UAP56', are, all]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, assembly, of, with, the, 'pre-mRNA,']), verbo([requires]), complemento(['Aly', and, 'THO'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Aly', and, 'THO', require, each, other, to, associate, with, the, spliced, mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', we, propose, that, 'Aly,', 'THO', and, 'UAP56', form, a, highly, integrated, unit, to]), verbo([associate]), complemento([with, the, spliced, mRNA, and, function, in, mRNA, export])]). relacion([sujeto(['Long', intergenic, noncoding, 'RNAs', '(', 'lincRNAs)']), verbo([transcribed]), complemento([from, intergenic, regions, of, yeast, and, animal, genomes, play, important, roles, in, key, biological, processes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Yet,', plant, lincRNAs, remain, poorly, characterized, and, how, complemento([other, 'DUBm-independent', functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([associates]), complemento([with, 'Cbp80', component, of, the, 'cap-binding', complex, and, is, thereby, complemento([been, shown, to, be, preferentially, involved, in, 'CT', but, not, 'ET,', specifically, interacts, with, 'eIF3g,', a, component, of, the, eIF3, complex, involved, in, ribosome, round, to, subsequent, rounds, of, 'translation,', and, from, translational, competence, to, substrate, for, 'nonsense-mediated', mRNA, decay])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['cap-binding', complex, '(', 'CBC)', binds, the, 7, -, 'methyl-G(5\')ppp(5\')N', cap, structure, at, the, 5, '\'', end, of, 'pre-messenger', and, 'uracil-rich', small, nuclear, 'RNAs', in, the, nucleus])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([interaction, of, these, capped, 'RNAs', with, various, nuclear, machineries, involved, in, 'RNA', maturation, and, is, 'co-exported', with, them, to, the, cytoplasm])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', structure, of, human, 'CBC,', which, comprises, the, subunits, 'CBP20', and, 'CBP80,']), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, determined, in, a, mildly, trypsinated, form, which, can, no, longer, bind, the, cap])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', heterodimeric]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['cap-binding', complex, '(', 'CBC)', binds, to, the, 5, '\'', cap, structure, of, 'RNAs', in, the, nucleus, and, plays, a, central, role, in, their, diverse, maturation, steps])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', describe, the, crystal, structure, at, 2.1, 'A', resolution, of, human, 'CBC']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, an, 'm(7)GpppG', cap, analogue])]). relacion([sujeto(['Comparison', with, the, structure, of, uncomplexed, 'CBC', shows, that, cap]), verbo([binding]), complemento([induces, 'co-operative', folding, around, the, dinucleotide, of, some, 50, residues, from, the, 'N-', and, 'C-terminal', extensions, to, the, central, 'RNP', domain, of, the, small, subunit, 'CBP20'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, structure, is, very, different, from, that, of, other, known, 'cap-binding', 'proteins,', such, as, the, cytoplasmic, 'cap-binding', protein, 'eIF4E,', specificity, for, the, methylated, guanosine, again, is, achieved, by, 'homologue,', 'AtCBP20', contains, a, canonical, 'RNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, '(', 'RBD)', with, single, 'RNP2', and, 'RNP1', motifs])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, the, relacion([sujeto(['This', 'domain,', described, also, in, eIF4G, and, 'NMD2', 'proteins,', is, thought, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'protein-protein', and, also, in, 'protein--RNA', verbo([nuclear]), complemento([cap, binding, complex, '(', 'CBC)', binds, to, 5, '\'', -, capped, polymerase, 'II', transcripts])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, 'giant-cell', fate])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study, defines, a, novel, cellular, mechanism, for]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['Hand1', that, is, a, crucial, step, in, the, 'stem-cell', differentiation, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Descriptive', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, several, of, these, factors, are, also, expressed, in, the, human, 'placenta,', suggesting, that, the, molecular, mechanisms, governing, trophoblast, differentiation, could, be, similar, in, mice, and, men])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', an]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([number, of, putative, developmental, regulators, are, being, identified, in, the, human, 'placenta,', little, information, is, available, regarding, whether, the, particular, factors, controlling, their, transcription, could, also, be, involved, in, the, developmental, processes, of, the, placenta])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', studies, in, different, model, systems, revealed, complemento([in, human, trophoblast, function, and, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'I-mfa', domain, proteins, 'HIC', '(', also, known, as, 'MDFIC)', and, 'I-mfa', '(', also, known, as, 'MDFI)', are, candidate, tumor, suppressor, genes, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cellular, and, viral, transcriptional, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, transactivational, activity, by, altering, its, subcellular, distribution, and, stability])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'I-mfa', domain, proteins, 'I-mfa', and, 'HIC', are, considered, to, be, complemento([these, currents])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', cell, dialysis, with, a, monoclonal, antibody, specific, to, 'TRPC1', results, in, the, suppression, of, 'store-activated', conductance, and, 'HIC', 'p32,', which, is, clearly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, these, 'regulations,', shares, 77, '%', homology, with, the, 'carboxy-terminal', domain, of, 'I-mfa'])]). are, rapidly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, gonadotropin, in, the, immature, rat, 'ovary,', ovarian, genes, were, screened, by, a, subtraction, cloning, procedure])]). relacion([sujeto(['RNA', the, testis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, gene, expression, of, 'GIOT1', is, restricted, to, the, 'pituitary,', 'adrenal,', 'testis,', and, 'ovary,', while, 'GIOT2', gene, is]), complemento([with, the, rat, 'GIOT1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'GIOT1', may, function, as, a, novel, transcriptional, repressor, by, working, the, p40, 'N', terminus])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([find]), complemento([the, structural, motifs, required, for, nucleolar, localization, of, 'p40,', deletion, mutants, were, expressed, in, 'activity,', and, blocks, their, nuclear, import, and, binding, to, 'DNA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', situ, hybridization, analysis, demonstrated, that, mouse, 'I-mfa', was, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, extraembryonic, 'lineages,', in, the, 'sclerotome,', and, subsequently, within, mesenchymal, precursors, of, the, axial, and, appendicular, 'skeleton,', before, chondrogenesis, occurs])]). relacion([sujeto([5, ',']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, placental, defect, and, a, markedly, reduced, number, of, trophoblast, giant, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'I-mfa', in, rat, trophoblast, '(', 'Rcho-1)', stem, cells]), verbo([induced]), complemento([differentiation, into, trophoblast, giant, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['I-mfa']), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, the, bHLH, protein, 'Mash2,', a, negative, regulator, of, trophoblast, giant, cell, 'formation,', and, inhibited, its, transcriptional, activity, in, cell, culture])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'I-mfa', plays, an, important, role, in, trophoblast, and, chondrogenic, differentiation, by, negatively]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([a, subset, of, 'lineage-restricted', bHLH, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', these, approaches]), verbo([require]), complemento([the, use, of, sophisticated, and, expensive, 'serum-free', medium, supplemented, with, epithelial, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF),', 'Wnt', agonist, '(', 'R-spondin', 1, ')', ',', and, bone, morphogenetic, protein, inhibitor, '(', 'Noggin)', in, high, concentrations])]). relacion([sujeto(['They']), verbo([have]), complemento([the, appearance, of, empty, spheres, and, comprise, cells, expressing, cytokeratin, '(', an, epithelial, cell, 'marker),', villin, '(', a, marker, of, 'enterocytes),', and, 'Sox-9', '(', a, transcription, factor, characteristic, of, progenitors, and, stem, cells, of, intestinal, 'crypts)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['With', chicken, embryonic, tissue, as, a, source, of, 'organoids,', prostaglandin, 'E2', is, as, effective, as, 'R-spondin', 1, and, 'Noggin', in]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([sustained, growth, and, survival, of, epithelial, spheroids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Diamond', 'Blackfan', anemia, '(', 'DBA)', is, a, well, known, inherited, bone, marrow, failure, syndrome, mostly]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, ribosomal, protein, '(', 'RP)', genes, but, also, rarely, in, the, hematopoietic, transcription, factor, 'gene,', &, 'lt;i>GATA1</i>,', or, &, 'lt;i>TSR2</i>,', a, ribosomal, protein, '(', 'Rps26)', chaperone, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['About', 25, '%', of, patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([heterozygous, mutations, in, the, &, 'lt;i>RPS19</i>', 'gene,', which, leads, to, haploinsufficiency, of, 'Rps19', protein, in, most, cases])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', some, &, 'lt;i>RPS19</i>', missense, mutations, appear, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([in, a, dominant, negative, fashion])]). relacion([sujeto(['DBA', typically]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, hypoplastic, anemia, that, becomes, apparent, during, the, first, year, of, 'life,', and, standard, treatment, includes, steroids, or, red, blood, cell, 'transfusions,', each, modality, having, attendant, side, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['DBA-mutant', 'embryonic,']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['pluripotent,', and, hematopoietic, stem, cells, exhibit, growth, abnormalities, that, can, be, corrected, by, 'DNA', gene, 'transfer,', suggesting, the, possibility, of, ex, vivo, autologous, gene, therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, interested, in, the, application, of, 'Spliceosome', 'Mediated', mRNA, 'trans-splicing', '(', 'SMaRT)', technology, to, 'RNA', repair, of, 'DBA', stem, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compared', with, gene, replacement, or, other, 'RNA', 're-programming', 'approaches,', the, 'RNA', 'trans-splicing', technology, offers, several, 'advantages:', 1, ')', it, obviates, the, need, to, deliver, the, entire, cDNA, of, a, normal, 'gene,', which, significantly, reduces, the, transgene, size, for, packaging, and, 'delivery;', 2, ')', expression, of, the, corrected, gene, is, completely, dependent, on, expression, of, the, endogenous, mutant, 'gene,', and, genes, with, large, and, complex, transcriptional, elements, can, be, repaired, in, situ, while, keeping, gene, expression, under, the, control, of, endogenous, regulatory, 'elements;', 3, ')', 'RNA', 'trans-splicing', utilizes, the, endogenous, spliceosome, that, exists, and, functions, in, all, types, of, 'cells;', 4, ')', 'RNA', 'trans-splicing', converts, mutant, transcripts, into, therapeutically, useful, 'mRNA,', and, 'thus,', may, be, capable, of, treating, disorders]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, dominant, negative, mutations, such, as, in, 'DBA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, an, approach, for, directly, isolating, an, intact, 'multi-protein', chromatin, remodeling, complex, from, mammalian, cell, extracts, using, synthetic, peptide, affinity, reagent, 4])]). relacion([sujeto(['FOG1(1-15),', a, short, peptide, sequence, known, to]), verbo([target]), complemento([subunits, of, the, nucleosome, remodeling, and, deacetylase, '(', 'NuRD)', 'complex,', was, joined, via, a, 35, -, atom, hydrophilic, linker, to, the, 'StreptagII', peptide])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loading', this, peptide, onto, 'Streptactin', beads, enabled, capture, of, the, intact, 'NuRD', complex, from, 'MEL', cell]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extract])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', efficiency, of, 4, in, isolating, the, 'NuRD', complex, was, comparable, to, other]), verbo([reported]), complemento([methods, utilising, recombinantly, produced, 'GST-FOG1(1-45)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', construction, of, network, models, of, 'cis-regulatory', 'elements,', 'therefore,']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, potential, to, generate, fundamental, insights, into, cellular, fate, and, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Haematopoiesis']), verbo([has]), complemento([long, served, as, a, model, system, to, study, mammalian, 'differentiation,', yet, modelling, based, on, experimentally, informed, 'cis-regulatory', interactions, has, so, far, been, restricted, to, pairs, of, interacting, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, a, 'Boolean', network, model, based, on, detailed, 'cis-regulatory', functional, data, connecting, 11, haematopoietic, 'stem/progenitor', cell, '(', 'HSPC)', regulator, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, erythroid, master, regulators, 'GATA1', and, 'TAL1', act, cooperatively, within, active, enhancers, but, confer, little, predictive, value, for, stage, specificity])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, acetylated, 'HDAC1-containing', 'NuRD', 'complex,', which, has, no, deacetylase, 'activity,', for, gene, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Histone', deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)', play, important, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cell, proliferation, and, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'HDAC1-containing', 'NuRD', complex, is, generally, considered, as, a, corepressor, complex, and, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'GATA-1-mediated', repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', recent, studies, also, show, that, the, 'NuRD', complex, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'GATA-1-mediated', gene, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1-associated', deacetylase, activity, gradually, decreased, upon, induction, of, erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, earlier, that, acetylated, 'HDAC1', has, no, deacetylase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', overexpression, of, an, 'HDAC1', 'mutant,', which, mimics, acetylated, 'HDAC1,']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['GATA-1-mediated', transcription, and, erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', during, erythroid, 'differentiation,', acetylated, 'HDAC1', recruitment, is]), verbo([increased]), complemento([at, 'GATA-1-activated', 'genes,', whereas, it, is, significantly, decreased, at, 'GATA-1-repressed', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', deacetylase, activity, is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'Mi2', remodeling, 'activity,', suggesting, that, remodeling, activity, may, be, required, for, both, activation, and, repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'NuRD', can, function, as, a, coactivator, or, repressor, and, that, acetylated, 'HDAC1', converts, the, 'NuRD', complex, from, a, repressor, to, an, activator, during, 'GATA-1-directed', erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, on, a, genome, wide, scale, that, the, hematopoietic, 'GATA', factors, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2']), verbo([bind]), complemento([overlapping, sets, of, 'genes,', often, at, distinct, 'sites,', as, a, means, to, differentially, regulate, target, gene, expression, and, to, regulate, the, balance, between, proliferation, and, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, 'GATA', 'switch,', which, entails, a, chromatin, occupancy, exchange, between, 'GATA2', and, 'GATA1', in, the, course, of, 'differentiation,', operates, on, more, than, 'one-third', of, 'GATA1', bound, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', switch, is, equally, likely, to]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, transcriptional, activation, or, 'repression;', and, in, 'general,', 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', act, oppositely, on, switch, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', by, comparing, 'GATA1', occupancy, in, erythroid, cells, and, 'megakaryocytes,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, presence, of, 'ETS', factor, motifs, is, a, major, discriminator, of, megakaryocyte, versus, red, cell, specification])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, factors, that, control, lineage, specification, of, haematopoietic, stem, cells, '(', 'HSCs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, described, for, the, myeloid, and, lymphoid, 'lineages,', whereas, transcriptional, control, of, erythroid, '(', 'E)', and, megakaryocytic, '(', 'Mk)', fate, is, less, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', here, use, conditional, removal, of, the, 'GATA-1', and, 'FOG-1', transcription, factors, to, identify, 'FOG-1', as]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, formation, of, all, committed, 'Mk-', and, 'E-lineage', 'progenitors,', whereas, 'GATA-1', was, observed, to, be, specifically, required, for, 'E-lineage', commitment])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, identify, 'FOG-1', and, 'GATA-1', as]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, formation, of, bipotent, 'Mk/E', progenitors, and, their, 'E-lineage', 'commitment,', 'respectively,', and, show, that, 'FOG-1', mediates, transcriptional, 'Mk/E', programming, of, aberrant, 'A-P', patterning, and, severe, anemia, characterized, by]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([gata1, expression, in, the, posterior, lateral, mesoderm])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', identify, to, the, 'cdx4-hox', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto([1, /, 'Sfpi1', expression, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2,', a, related, factor, that, is, normally, expressed, at, earlier, stages, of, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'GATA', factors]), verbo([bind]), complemento([the, 'PU'])]). relacion([sujeto([1, /, 'Sfpi1', gene, at, 2, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([regions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, absence, of, 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([is, associated, with, an, undifferentiated, 'state,', intermediate, level, 'PU'])]). relacion([sujeto([1, /, 'Sfpi1', 'expression,', and, 'low-level', expression, of, its, downstream, myeloid]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])]).
