'present,', shRNA, knockdown, of, 'GATA-2']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['PU'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings, indicate, that, 'GATA', factors]), verbo([act]), complemento([sequentially, to, regulate, lineage, determination, during, 'hematopoiesis,', in, part, by, exerting, variable, repressive, effects, at, the, 'PU'])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', some, studies, show, that, highly, constrained, noncoding, regions]), verbo([act]), complemento([to, enhance, 'transcription,', other, studies, show, that, 'DNA', segments, with, biochemical, signatures, of, regulatory, 'regions,', such, as, occupancy, by, a, transcription, 'factor,', are, seemingly, unconstrained, across, mammalian, evolution])]). relacion([sujeto(['DNA', segments]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, 'GATA1', were, identified, by, hybridization, to, 'high-density', tiling, 'arrays,', validated, by, quantitative, 'PCR,', and, tested, for, gene, regulatory, activity, in, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', almost, all, of, the, occupied, segments, contain, canonical, 'WGATAR']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, motifs, for, 'GATA1,', in, only, 45, '%', of, the, cases, is, the, motif, deeply, preserved, '(', found, at, the, orthologous, position, in, placental, mammals, or, more, distant, 'species)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'GATA1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, that, regulate, gene, expression, during, erythroid, maturation, are, under, strong, selective, 'constraint,', while, nonconstrained, binding, may, have, only, a, limited, or, indirect, role, in, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'WGATAR', motif, is, a, common, nucleotide, sequence]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, transcriptional, regulatory, regions, of, numerous, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'vertebrates,', these, motifs, are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, one, of, six, factors, '(', 'GATA1', to, 'GATA6)', that, constitute, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcriptional, regulatory, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', originally, considered, for, their, roles, in, hematopoietic, cells, and, the, 'heart,', 'GATA', factors, are, now, known, to, be]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, wide, variety, of, tissues, where, they, act, as, critical, regulators, of, 'cell-specific', gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Insights', into, the, functional, roles, played, by, 'GATA', factors, in, adult, organ, systems]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, hampered, by, the, early, embryonic, lethality, associated, with, the, different, 'Gata-null', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'approaches,', together, with, the]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([number, of, human, 'GATA-related', pathologies, have, greatly, broadened, the, scope, of, 'GATA-dependent', genes, 'and,', 'importantly,', have, shown, that, 'GATA', action, is, not, necessarily, limited, to, early, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, particularly, evident, in, endocrine, organs, where, 'GATA', factors, appear, to, contribute, to, the, transcription, of, multiple, 'hormone-encoding', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review]), verbo([provides]), complemento([an, overview, of, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcription, factors, as, they, relate, to, endocrine, function, and, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Development', in, higher, eukaryotes]), verbo([involves]), complemento([programmed, gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Higher', eukaryotes]), verbo([have]), complemento([evolved, elegant, mechanisms, by, which, committed, 'gene-expression', states, are, transmitted, through, numerous, cell, divisions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, both, 'DNase', 'I-sensitive', sites, and, the, basal, transcription, factor, 'TFIID', remain, on, silenced, mitotic, 'chromosomes,', suggesting, that, certain, 'trans-factors', might, act, as, 'bookmarks,', maintaining, the, information, and, transmitting, it, to, the, next, generation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, imply, that, certain, kinds, of, specific, protein, factors, and, active, histone, modifications, function, as, cellular, memory, markers, for, both, competent, and, active, genes, during, 'mitosis,', and, serve, as, a]), verbo([reactivated]), complemento([core, for, the, resumption, of, transcription, when, the, cells, exit, mitosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, potentially, 'multi-step', decision, sequence, which, determines, the, fate, of, the, cells, and, their, successors])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, generally, accepted, that, lineage, specification, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, complex, system, of, interacting, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto([1, ',', both, known, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, key, regulators, and, potential, antagonists, in, the, erythroid, vs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([transcription, rates, are, sufficient, to, induce, differentiation, in, one, 'scenario,', an, additional, system, perturbation, '(', by, stochastic, fluctuations, or, directed, 'impulses)', of, transcription, factor, levels, is, required, in, the, other, case])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', and, friend, of, 'GATA', '(', 'FOG)', are, 'zinc-finger', transcription, factors, that, physically]), verbo([interact]), complemento([to, play, essential, roles, in, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', naturally, occurring, mutations, in, the, 'GATA-1', gene, that, alter, the, 'FOG-binding', domain]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mutations, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, familial, anemias, and, thrombocytopenias, of, differing, severity])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, molecular, basis, for, the, 'GATA-1/FOG', 'interaction,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, the, 'three-dimensional', structure, of, a, complex, comprising, the, interaction, domains, of, these, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', structure]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([how, zinc, fingers, can, act, as, protein, recognition, motifs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Details', of, the, architecture, of, the, contact, domains, and, their, physical, properties]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, molecular, explanation, for, how, the, 'GATA-1', mutations, contribute, to, distinct, but, related, genetic, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', 'Ski', was, shown, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([in, distinct, signaling, pathways, including, those, involving, nuclear, 'receptors,', transforming, growth, factor, 'beta,', and, tumor, suppressors])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', divergent, roles, of, 'Ski', are, probably, dependent, on, 'Ski\'s', capacity, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([multiple, partners, with, disparate, functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'particular,', 'Ski', alters, the, growth, and, differentiation, program, of, erythroid, progenitor, 'cells,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, malignant, leukemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, underlying, this, important, effect]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, elusive])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'Ski']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'GATA1,', a, transcription, factor, essential, in, erythropoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, repression, of, 'GATA1-mediated', transcription]), verbo([involves]), complemento(['Ski\'s', ability, to, block, 'DNA', binding, of, 'GATA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([is, in, marked, contrast, to, those, in, previous, reports, on, the, mechanism, of, repression, by, 'Ski,', which, have, described, a, model, involving, the, recruitment, of, corepressors, into, 'DNA-bound', transcription, complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', locus, control, region, of, the, 'beta-globin', gene, cluster]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, used, previously, to, direct, erythroid, expression, of, globin, genes, from, retroviral, vectors, for, the, purpose, of, gene, therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([functionally, studied, an, additional, 'GATA-1', 'enhancer,', 'HS1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['HS1']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, transcriptional, autoregulation, of, 'GATA-1', through, an, essential, 'GATA-binding', site, that, is, footprinted, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, work, we, identified, within, 'HS1', a, new, in, vivo, footprinted, 'region,', and, we, showed, that, this, sequence, indeed]), verbo([binds]), complemento([a, nuclear, protein, in, vitro])]). equal, to, that, of, the, wild, type, retroviral, 'LTR,', without, loss, of, erythroid, 'specificity,', suggesting, that, this, sequence, may, act, as, a, negative, regulatory, element])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, substantial, improvement, of, overall, expression, can, be, achieved, by, the, combination, of, multiple, changes, in, both, regulatory, elements, and, vectors])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', investigate, the, effect, of, the, human, 'A', 'gamma-globin', 'gene-173', 'T-->C', mutation, on, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, transacting, factors, to, the, promoter, and, the, activity, of, the, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'A', 'gamma-globin', 'gene-173', 'T-->C', mutation]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, affinity, of, 'GATA-1', to, the, mutant, promoter, fragment, '(', -, 201, '(', -, ')', -, 158, ')', 96, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', and, the, binding, of, 'Oct-1', to, the, same, 'DNA', fragment, 55, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Megakaryocytopoiesis']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, proliferation, and, differentiation, of, relacion([sujeto(['The', former, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([mainly, by, thrombopoietin, '(', 'TPO)', and, to, a, lesser, degree, by, other, cytokines, such, as, 'interleukin-1', '(', complemento([experiments, in, the, mouse, have, demonstrated, key, roles, for, the, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', transcription, factor, 'SCL', and, the, 'GATA-binding', protein, 'GATA-1', in, involved, in, specifying, hematopoietic, mesoderm])]). relacion([sujeto(['SCL', and, 'GATA-1']), verbo([interact]), complemento([in, a, transcriptional, complex, with, the, 'LIM', domain, protein, 'LMO-2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, the, 'Xenopus', homolog, of, 'LMO-2', and, show, that, it, is, expressed, in, a, similar, pattern, to, 'SCL', during, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['SCL', and, 'LMO-2']), verbo([act]), complemento([synergistically, to, expand, the, blood, island, when, overexpressed, in, whole, embryos])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'co-expression', of, 'GATA-1', with, 'SCL', and, 'LMO-2']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, embryos, that, are, ventralized, and, have, blood, throughout, the, 'dorsal-ventral', axis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', synergistic, effect, of, 'SCL,', 'LMO-2', and, 'GATA-1,', taken, together, with, the, findings, that, these, factors, can, form, a, complex, in, 'vitro,']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, this, complex, specifies, mesoderm, to, become, blood, during, embryogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, case, of, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GATA-2,', a, small, number, of, osteoclasts, were, generated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Experiments', using, specific, inhibitors, that, block, the, signaling, through, macrophage, than, these, cytokines])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', macrophage, 'colony-forming', units, were, not, severely, reduced, by, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GATA-2', compared, to, osteoclast, progenitors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Members', of, the, 'GATA', family, of, 'zinc-finger', transcription, factors]), verbo([have]), complemento([critical, roles, in, a, variety, of, cell, types])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1,', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, proliferation, and, differentiation, of, several, hematopoietic, 'lineages,', whereas, 'GATA-4,', 'GATA-5', and, 'GATA-6', activate, cardiac, and, endoderm, gene, expression, programs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', 'GATA', cofactors]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, identified])]). relacion([sujeto(['Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'GATA-1', and, is, expressed, principally, in, hematopoietic, 'lineages,', whereas, 'FOG-2', is, expressed, predominantly, in, heart, and, brain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([experiments, are, consistent, with, an, essential, role, for, 'FOG-1', as, an, activator, of, 'GATA-1', 'function,', reporter, assays, in, transfected, cells, indicate, that, 'FOG-1', and, 'FOG-2', can, act, as, repressors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, a, 'Xenopus', laevis, homologue, of, 'FOG', that, is, structurally, most, similar, to, 'FOG-1,', but, is, expressed, predominantly, in, heart, and, 'brain,', as, verbo([required]), complemento([for, 1, 'B', '(', -, 2031, /, +, 72, ')', promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', cells]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, 'PMA', in, early, 'S', phase, showed, cell, cycle, arrest, in, 'G2', phase])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, cells]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, 'PMA', in, early, 'G1', phase, showed, cell, cycle, the, cells, were, stimulated, in, early, 'S', 'phase,', and, was, also, induced, in, late, 'G1', phase, when, cells, were, stimulated, in, early, 'G1', phase])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', in, cells]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([in, early, 'S', phase, was, much, higher, than, that, in, controls, at, 'G2', phase])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', periods, corresponded, to, the, time, that, the, cell, cycle]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([and, 'gpIIb/IIIa', expression, were, induced, by, 'PMA'])]). 'alpha,', although, further, experiments, will, be, needed, to, exclude, the, role, of, 'C/EBP', beta, and, 'C/EBP', delta, in, receptor, gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, model, of, hematopoiesis, '(', 'Fig'])]). relacion([sujeto([2, ')', in, which, the, lineage, commitment, decisions, of, multipotential, cells, are, made, by, the, alternative, patterns, of, expression, of, certain, transcription, 'factors,', which, then]), verbo([activate]), complemento([growth, factor, receptors, which, allow, those, cells, to, respond, to, the, appropriate, growth, factor, to, proliferate, and, survive])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', 'example,', expression, of, 'GATA-1']), verbo([activates]), complemento([its, own, 'expression,', as, well, as, that, of, the, erythropoietin, 'receptor,', inducing, these, cells, to, be, capable, of, responding, to, erythropoietin])]). relacion([sujeto([1]), verbo([activates]), complemento([its, own, 'promoter,', and, turns, on, the, three, myeloid, 'CSF', receptors, '(', 'M,', 'GM,', and, 'G),', pushing, these, cells, along, the, pathway, of, myeloid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['C/EBP', 'proteins,', particularly, 'C/EBP', 'alpha,', are, also, critical, for, myeloid, receptor, promoter, 'function,', and, may, also]), verbo([act]), complemento([via, autoregulatory, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Murine', 'C/EBP', alpha]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, 'C/EBP', binding, site, in, its, own, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Human', 'C/EBP', alpha, autoregulates, its, own, expression, in, adipocytes, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento([the, 'USF', transcription, factor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Myeloid', genes]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([later, during, 'differentiation,', such, as, 'CD11b,', are, also, activated, by, 'PU'])]). relacion([sujeto([1, ',', which, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, highest, levels, in, mature, myeloid, 'cells,', but, not, by, 'C/EBP', 'alpha,', which, is, downregulated, in, a, differentiated, murine, myeloid, cell, line])]). relacion([sujeto([1, in, erythroid, cells, blocks, erythroid, 'differentiation,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, 'erythroleukemia,', and, overexpression, of, 'GATA-1', in, a, myeloid, line, blocks, myeloid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', these, findings]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, some, framework, for, understanding, myeloid, gene, 'regulation,', there, are, a, number, of, critical, questions, to, be, addressed, in, the, near, 'future:', 'What', is, the, pattern, of, expression, of, the, 'C/EBP', proteins, during, the, course, of, myeloid, differentiation, and, activation, of, human, 'CD34+', 'cells?', 'What', is, the, effect, of, targeted, disruption, and, other, mutations, of, the, 'C/EBP', and, 'AML1', proteins, on, myeloid, development, and, receptor, 'expression?', 'What', are, the, interactions, among, these, three, different, types, of, factors, '(', 'ets,', basic, 'region-zipper,', and, 'Runt', domain, 'proteins)', to, activate, the, 'promoters?', 'What', is, the, effect, of, 'translocations,', 'mutations,', and, alterations, in, expression, of, these, 'factors,', particularly, in, different, forms, of, 'AML?
To', elucidate, the, mechanisms, underlying, the, 'tissue-restricted', expression, of, 'GATA', factor, 'transcription,', we, have, isolated, and, analyzed, the, genomic, chicken, 'GATA-3', '(', 'cGATA-3)', locus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', 'trans-activating', domains, and, two, 'Zn', finger, domains, of, 'cGATA-3', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, encoded, separately, by, exons, 2, /, 3, and, 4, /, 5, ',', 'respectively,', indicating, that, each, functional, domain, of, 'GATA-3', is, encoded, by, a, discrete, exon])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, 1.7, kb, of, upstream, promoter, sequence, and, found, a, number, of, sequence, motifs, which, match, those, of, known, transcription, factor, binding, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', upstream, region, containing, the, 'GATA', and, 'CACCC', elements, in, close, proximity, '(', -, 1280, to, -, 1152, ')', appeared, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, negative, transcriptional, 'regulator,', whereas, the, region, -, 1151, to, -, 850, acts, as, a, positive, regulator])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, expression, of, 'cGATA-3', gene, is, under, complex, regulation, and, the, mode, of, regulation, of, 'cGATA-3', gene, expression, is]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, be, different, from, that, of, 'GATA-1', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1,', a, transcription, factor, of, the, '\'', 'zinc-finger\'', 'family,', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, development, of, mature, erythroid, cells, and, is, also, highly, expressed, in, the, megakaryocytic, and, mast, cell, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'helix-loop-helix', gene, 'SCL', '(', or, 'TAL)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, same, three, hematopoietic, lineages, as, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Enforced', expression, of, 'SCL', at, high, levels, did, not]), verbo([provoke]), complemento(['differentiation,', but, 'GATA-1', induced, the, appearance, of, megakaryocytes, as, assessed, by, 'morphology,', the, presence, of, acetylcholinesterase, and, a, polyploid, 'DNA', content])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'GATA-1', is, thought, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([its, own, transcription, in, 'erythrocytes,', expression, of, the, endogenous, gene, was, not, increased, in, the, megakaryocytic, 'lines;', hence, 'GATA-1', may, not, be, autoregulatory, in, this, lineage])]). relacion([sujeto(['Megakaryocytic', differentiation, was, accompanied, by, a, marked]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, myeloid, surface, marker, 'Mac-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', absence, of, mast, cell, or, erythroid, differentiation]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1', may, confirms, the, 'differentiation-dependent']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, shows, that, it, correlates, with, the, assembly, of, a, complex, also, containing, the, key, megakaryocyte, family, proteins, occur])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', analysis, of, 'megakaryopoiesis,', which, integrates, dynamic, gene, expression, data, with, protein, abundance, and, activity, 'assays,']), verbo([has]), complemento([identified, a, number, of, genes, and, pathways, that, may, help, govern, megakaryopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, the, transcriptional, cofactor, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', binds, to, the, zinc, finger, domain, of, 'GATA-1,', markedly, stimulates, the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'GATA-1,', and, is, required, for, erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'CBP,', but, not, 'p/CAF,', acetylates, 'GATA-1', at, two, highly, complemento(['GATA-1', acetylation, in, vivo, in, an, 'E1A-sensitive', 'manner,', thus, establishing, a, correlation, between, acetylation, and, transcriptional, activity, of, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Acetylation', in, vitro, did, not, alter, the, ability, of, 'GATA-1', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['DNA,', and, mutations, in, either, motif, did, not, affect, 'DNA', binding, of, 'GATA-1', expressed, in, mammalian, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', certain, functions, of, 'GATA-1', are, revealed, only, in, an, erythroid, 'environment,', 'GATA-1', constructs, were, complemento([acute, leukemia, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'leukemia-associated', fusion, protein, 'pro-myelocytic', 'leukemia/retinoic', verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, reduced, 'SFTPC', transcription, contributes, to, the, genetic, risk, for, neonatal, 'RDS', in, developmentally, susceptible, infants])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', critical, regulator, of, hematopoiesis, 'GATA-1']), verbo([recruits]), complemento([diverse, coregulators, to, 'chromatin,', which, mediate, transcriptional, activation, and, repression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', coregulators, include, the, 'cell-type-specific', 'multi-zinc', finger, protein, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1),', the, histone, acetyltransferase, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP),', and, the, key, component, of, the, 'Mediator', complex, 'Med1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', compared, the, capacity, of, 'GATA-1', to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento([and, utilize, 'FOG-1', and, 'Med1', at, activated, and, repressed, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similar', to, 'FOG-1,', 'GATA-1']), verbo([recruited]), complemento(['Med1', to, activated, 'genes,', and, the, kinetics, of, 'FOG-1', and, 'Med1', recruitment, were, similar])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([recruited]), complemento(['Med1', in, 'Fog1(-/-)', 'cells,', indicating, that, 'GATA-1-mediated', 'Med1', recruitment, is, 'FOG-1-independent'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', stages, of, mammalian, erythropoiesis, include, global, gene, 'inactivation,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['condensation,', and, enucleation, to, yield, circulating, 'erythrocytes,', and, some, of, the, genes, whose, expression, are, altered, by, 'GATA-1', complemento([in, erythroid, cells, and, that, activation, of, 'p53-responsive', promoters, in, an, erythroid, cell, line, can, be, inhibited, by, the, overexpression, of, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutational', analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1', inhibition, of, p53, minimally, requires, the, segment, of, the, 'GATA-1', 'DNA-binding', domain, that, interacts, with, p53TAD])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', inhibition, is, 'reciprocal,', as, the, activation, of, a, 'GATA-1-responsive', promoter, can, be]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'C/C'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', findings, demonstrate, that, a, -, 315, 'SNP', significantly, affects, human, 'FcepsilonRI', 'alpha-chain', promoter, activity, and, expression, level, of, 'FcepsilonRI', on, basophils, by]), verbo([binding]), complemento([different, transcription, factors, to, the, 'SNP', site])]). relacion([sujeto(['Classical', zinc, fingers, '(', 'ZFs)', are, traditionally, considered, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, 'sequence-specific', 'DNA-binding', domains])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', 'recently,', classical, 'ZFs']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, recognised, as, potential, 'RNA-binding', 'modules,', raising, the, intriguing, possibility, that, 'classical-ZF', transcription, factors, are, involved, in, 'post-transcriptional', gene, regulation, via, direct, 'RNA', binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', 'date,', 'however,', only, one, classical, 'ZF-RNA', 'complex,', that]), verbo([involving]), complemento(['TFIIIA,', has, been, structurally, characterised])]). relacion([sujeto(['Yin', 'Yang-1', '(', 'YY1)', is, a, 'multi-functional', transcription, factor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, many, regulatory, 'processes,', and, binds, 'DNA', via, four, classical, 'ZFs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'YY1', also, interacts, with, 'RNA,', but, the, molecular, nature, of, the, interaction, remains, unknown])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', we, directly, assess, the, ability, of, 'YY1', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['RNA', using, in, vitro, assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['Systematic', 'Evolution', of, 'Ligands', by, 'EXponential', enrichment, '(', 'SELEX)', was, used, to, identify, preferred, 'RNA', sequences]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, the, 'YY1', 'ZFs', from, a, randomised, library, over, multiple, rounds, of, selection])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', a, strong, motif, was, not, consistently, 'recovered,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, 'RNA', sequence, selectivity, of, these, domains, is, modest])]). relacion([sujeto(['YY1', 'ZF', residues]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, binding, to, 'single-stranded', 'RNA', were, identified, by, 'NMR', spectroscopy, and, found, to, be, largely, distinct, from, the, set, of, residues, involved, in, 'DNA', 'binding,', verbo([reports]), complemento([that, 'YY1', can, bind, to, 'RNA', in, a, 'low-specificity,', yet, physiologically, relevant, manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', is, an, urgent, need, to, investigate, the, potential]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapy, approach, for, 'triple-negative', breast, cancer, '(', 'TNBC)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', present, study]), verbo([reveals]), to, genomic, functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', using, 'site-specific', chromatin, 'immunopecipitations,', gel, 'shifts,', 'BIOBASE', 'data,', and, our, model, that, accurately, describes, the, relacion([sujeto(['AMP-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'AMPK)', is, currently, known, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, key, regulator, of, metabolic, homeostasis])]). complemento([compared, to, the, control, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'IL-1', elicited, the, phosphorylation, of, 'IκB,', which]), verbo([caused]), complemento([subsequent, significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, 'IL-1-stimulated', 'IL-6', synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compound', 'C', remarkably]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, 'IL-1-induced', methoxyphenols, and, resveratrol])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, 'NF-κB', was, measured, by]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, and, phosphorylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', potent, compounds, that]), verbo([act]), complemento([via, similar, mechanisms, may, have, therapeutic, potential, as, novel, 'anti-inflammatory', agents])]). relacion([sujeto(['YY1', is, a, ubiquitous, and, multifunctional, 'zinc-finger', transcription, factor, member, of, the, 'Polycomb', group, protein, 'family,', a, group, of, homeobox, gene, receptors, that, can]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, activators, or, repressors, of, transcriptional, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'YY1', can]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, redox, 'sensor,', adaptor, 'molecule,', and, chromatin, structure, and, function, regulator])]). relacion([sujeto(['YY1', also]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, undergo, chromatin, remodeling, via, interactions, with, histone, acetyl, transferase, and, histone, deacetylase, complexes])]). relacion([sujeto([miRNAs]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, potential, to, act, on, diverse, downstream, 'genes,', and, miRNA, signatures, of, 'HPV-infected', tissues, may, provide, insight, into, 'HPV-related', carcinogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'YY1', and, 'CDK6', were, both, positively, correlated, with, 'E6/E7', 'RNA', expression, and, targeted, by, 'tumour-suppressive', 'miR-29'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HPVs', have, oncogenic, properties, at, least, in, part, by, reshaping, the, milieu, of, cellular, miRNAs])]). relacion([sujeto(['miR-29', restrains, cell, cycle, progression, and]), verbo([induces]), complemento([apoptosis, via, 'YY1', and, 'CDK6', promoting, malignant, transformation, induced, by, 'HPV,', although, the, abnormality, of, 'miR-29', in, 'HPV-infected', cells, might, be, regulated, in, an, indirect, way])]). relacion([sujeto(['Evolutionarily']), verbo([conserved]), complemento([elements, in, imprinted, regions, differ, from, those, associated, with, autosomal, genes, in, various, ways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', for, maternally]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([genes, strong, divergence, of, 'protein-encoding', sequences, is, most, 'prominent,', paternally, expressed, genes, exhibit, substantial, conservation, of, coding, and, noncoding, sequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', paternally, and, maternally]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([genes, can, be, distinguished, by, differences, in, 'G+C', and, 'CpG', contents, that, might, be, associated, with, unusual, epigenetic, features])]). relacion([sujeto(['Especially', noncoding]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([elements, of, paternally, expressed, genes, are, exceptionally, 'G+C', and, 'CpG', rich])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, moderate, enrichment, of, 'YY1', and, 'CTCF', binding, sites, in, imprinted, regions, and, identified, several, short, sequence, motifs, in, highly, conserved, elements, that, might, act, as, additional, regulatory, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', monoclonal, antibody, rituximab, specifically]), verbo([targets]), complemento([the, 'CD20', antigen, and, sensitizes, 'B-cell', lymphoma, cells, to, standard, anticancer, drugs])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'investigation,', we, 'analyzed,', whether, a, combination, of, rituximab, and, artesunate, may]), verbo([act]), complemento([in, a, complementary, manner, and, eventually, synergize, in, tumor, cell, killing])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', rituximab, alone, was, minimally, 'cytotoxic,', rituximab]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cytotoxicity, to, artesunate, in, 'Ramos', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Artesunate']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['apoptosis,', induced, 'Fas/CD95', expression, and, the, formation, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', and, resulted, in, a, breakdown, of, mitochondrial, membrane, potential])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rituximab']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Fas/CD95', expression, and, 'ROS', formation, and, decreased, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, ultimately, leading, to, increased, apoptosis, induced, by, artesunate])]). relacion([sujeto(['YY1', and, 'Sp1', were, 'down-regulated', and, 'Fas/CD95', was, 'up-regulated', by, rituximab, and, artesunate, indicating, that, artesunate]), verbo([activated]), complemento([the, 'Fas/CD95', pathway, and, that, rituximab, increased, the, susceptibility, of, tumor, cells, to, 'artesunate-induced', apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', antibody]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['artesunate-induced', 'up-regulation', of, catalase, expression, and, increased, 'artesunate-induced', 'down-regulation', of, glutathione, 'S-transferase-phi', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', already, widely, 'studied,', 'Cyclooxygenase-2', '(', 'COX-2)', is, a, key, Induction', of, 'interleukin-6', '(', 'IL-6)', gene, expression, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, numerous, agents, involving, all, major, signal, transduction, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([compared, the, effects, of, prostaglandins, and, their, second, messenger, cyclic, 'AMP', '(', 'cAMP)', with, the, effect, of, lipopolysaccharide, '(', 'LPS)', on, 'IL-6', gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, secretion, of, 'IL-6', is]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, cAMP, in, murine, monocytic, 'PU5-1'])]). prostaglandin, 'E1,', whereas, alterations, of, four, additional, sites]), verbo([have]), complemento([no, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['LPS-induced', promoter, 'activity,', 'however,', is, almost, indicating, a, potential, role, for, this, factor, in, the, cAMP, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, cAMP, and, prostaglandins, act, through, 'multiple,', partially, redundant, regulatory, elements, to, induce, 'IL-6', expression, in, monocytic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'macrophage-derived', cytokine, 'interleukin-1', '(', 'pathway(s)']), verbo([involved]), complemento([remains, 'controversial,', with, protein, kinase, 'C', and, cyclic, 'AMP', '(', 'cAMP)', invoked, as, possible, second, messengers])]). complemento([by, 'IL-1', 'costimulation,', implying, that, 'IL-1', can, increase, the, rate, of, transcription, of, 'IL-2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', minimal, promoter, elements]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'iL-1', responsiveness, were, located, within, 321, bp, of, the, 'IL-2', 'RNA', cap, 'site,', and, further, upstream, sequences, to, -, 2800, did, not, modify, this, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['IL-1', costimulation, resulted, in]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([activity, of, both, an, inducible, 'NF-kappa', 'B-like', factor, and, one, of, two, were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([constitutively, in, the, 'EL4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', pluripotent, 'P19', embryo, carcinoma, cell, line, was, studied, to, determine, a, signaling, pathway]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['MeCP2', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['P19', cells, were]), verbo([induced]), complemento([to, differentiate, into, neurons, by, 'RA', and, express, &, 'beta;-III', tubulin, at, one, day, after, induction, and, synaptophysin, by, 7, days])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'Mecp2', e1, and, e2, mRNA, forms, progressively]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, differentiating, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['MeCP2', expression, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, tumor, necrosis, factor, '(', 'TNF)', in, early, differentiating, differentiating, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', protein, kinase, 'C', activator, phorbol, 12, -, myristate, 13, -, acetate, '(', 'PMA)']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['MeCP2', expression, in, 'naïve', 'P19', 'cells,', which, was, also, blocked, by, 'NFκB', inhibitors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'PMA']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['NFκB', reporter, gene, activity, in, 'naïve', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', 'PMA,', but, not, 'TNF,']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['IκBα', degradation, in, 'naïve', 'P19', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', complemento([the, genes, that, are, repressed, by, histone, deacetylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', investigation, demonstrates, that, treating, 'P3HR1', cells, with, trichostatin, 'A', '(', accumulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Activation', of, cells, in, the, presence, of, forskolin]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([the, maintenance, of, stable, 'protein-DNA', interactions, in, 'vivo,', relacion([sujeto(['Yin', 'Yang-1', '(', 'YY1),', a, widely, distributed, transcription, factor, that, belongs, to, the, 'GLI-Kruppel', class, of, zinc, finger, 'proteins,', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, a, direct, target, of, 'miR-34a', in, 'ESCC', cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rescue', experiments, indicated, that, the, suppressive, effect, of, 'miR-34a', on, invasion, and, migration, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, activating, 'YY1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Results', of, the, present, study, showed, that, 'miR-34a', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'ESCC', migration, and, provides, a, potential, therapeutic, and, diagnostic, target, for, 'ESCC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gene', transcription, is, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, different, levels, to, ensure, that, the, transcriptome, of, the, cell, is, appropriate, for, developmental, stage, and, cell, type])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', biochemical, purifications, of, such, complexes]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, a, substantial, diversity])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, one, 'hand,', complexes, that, were, thought, to, be, unique]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, revealed, to, be, part, of, large, complex, families])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', protein, subunits, that, were, thought, to, only, exist, in, separate, complexes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, coexist, in, novel, assemblies])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, review, we, discuss, our, current, knowledge, of, repressor, chromatin]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([protein, complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['YY1', expression, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'TNM', stage, and, lymph, node, complemento(['HO-1', expression, in, esophageal, cancer, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['YY1']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([biological, function, through, transcription, of, 'HO-1'])]). complemento([in, 'IIS', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, nutrition, signals, working, through, 'IIS', pathway, regulate, maturation, of, 'MAG', by, promoting, the, growth, of, 'MAG', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', gene, disruption, models, of, 'Gata1', and, 'Nfe2,', we, demonstrate, that, perturbing, essential, adult, 'MK', genes]), verbo([causes]), complemento([an, analogous, phenotype, in, the, early, embryo, before, the, onset, of, hematopoietic, 'stem/progenitor', 'cell-driven', '(', 'definitive)', hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we, present, the, surprising]), verbo([finding]), complemento([that, 'DPFC', and, 'MK', commitment, from, their, respective, precursors, is, 'MPL', independent, in, vivo, controls, organismal, 'development,', and, variation, in, regulatory, patterns]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, complex, traits])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', reproductive, homeobox, 'X-linked,', 'Rhox,', genes, encode, transcription, factors, that, are, selectively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, reproductive, tissues])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', there, are, 33, gene, products, crucial, for, germ, cell, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', other, 'Sertoli', 'markers,', 'Gata1', and, 'Rhox5,']), verbo([maintained]), complemento([normal, expression, 'patterns,', suggesting, that, the, knockdown, was, specific])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', male, 'RHOX8-knockdown', animals, showed, significantly, reduced, spermatogenic, 'output,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([germ, cell, 'apoptosis,', and, compromised, sperm, 'motility,', leading, to, impaired, fertility])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['GATA1', expression, was, associated, with, a, compensatory, increase, in, 'GATA2', levels, in, progenitors])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', were, subtle, in, 'erythroblasts,', which, showed]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['GATA1', binding, and, enhanced, accumulation, of, active, histone, marks, around, the, 1, 'st-intron', 'GATA', motif, of, the, &, 'Delta;dbGATA', locus])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, thus]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, role, of, the, dbGATA, motif, in, the, maintenance, of, 'Gata1', expression, in, hematopoietic, progenitors, and, a, functional, compensation, between, the, dbGATA, site, and, the, 1, 'st-intron', 'GATA', motif, in, erythroblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['KLF1', is, an, erythroid, specific, transcription, factor, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, regulatory, regions, of, erythroid, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Binding', sites, of, 'KLF1', are, often]), verbo([found]), complemento([near, binding, sites, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'TAL1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, &, 'beta;-globin', 'locus,', 'KLF1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, forming, active, chromatin, 'structure,', although, its, role, is, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', explore, the, role, of, 'KLF1', in]), verbo([transcribing]), complemento([the, human, &, 'gamma;-globin', 'genes,', we, stably, reduced, the, expression, of, 'KLF1', in, erythroid, 'K562', 'cells,', compromising, its, association, in, the, &, 'beta;-globin', locus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'GATA-1', and, 'TAL1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, reduced, in, the, &, 'beta;-globin', 'locus,', even, though, their, expressions, were, not, affected, by, 'KLF1', knockdown])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'KLF1-dependent', 'GATA-1', and, 'TAL1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, observed, in, the, adult, locus, transcribing, the, &, 'beta;-globin', gene, and, in, several, erythroid, 'genes,', where, 'GATA-1', occupancy, is, independent, from, 'TAL1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Morphologically,', erythroid, differentiation, proceeds, in, a, nearly, identical, fashion, between, humans, and, 'mice,', but, recent, evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, networks, of, gene, expression, governing, this, process, are, divergent, between, species])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', analyses]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, while, chromatin, structure, across, orthologous, promoters, is, strongly, 'conserved,', subtle, differences, are, associated, with, transcriptional, divergence, between, species])]). relacion([sujeto(['Many', transcription, factor, '(', 'TF)', occupancy, sites, were, poorly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([across, species, '(', &, 'sim;25%', for, 'GATA1,', 'TAL1,', and, 'NFE2)', but, were, more, conserved, between, proerythroblasts, and, cell, lines, derived, from, the, same, species])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, certain, 'cis-regulatory', modules, 'co-occupied', by, 'GATA1,', 'TAL1,', and, 'KLF1', are, under, strict, evolutionary, constraint, and, localize, to, genes, necessary, for, erythroid, cell, identity])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', 'generally,', we, show, that]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['TF', occupancy, sites, are, indicative, of, active, regulatory, regions, and, strong, gene, expression, that, is, sustained, during, maturation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, evolutionary, turnover, of, 'TF', binding, sites, associates, with, changes, in, the, underlying, chromatin, 'structure,', driving, transcriptional, divergence])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([examples, of, how, this, framework, can, be, applied, to, understand, epigenomic, variation, in, specific, regulatory, 'regions,', such, as, the, &, 'beta;-globin', gene, locus])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([have]), complemento([important, implications, for, understanding, epigenomic, changes, that, mediate, variation, in, cellular, differentiation, across, 'species,', while, also, providing, a, valuable, resource, for, studies, of, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Children', with, 'Down', syndrome, '(', 'DS)', and, acute, leukemias, acute]), complemento([to, protein, truncation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', another, family, a, likely, pathogenic, 'X-linked', mutation, affecting, a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([residue, was, complemento([in, two, unrelated, 'probands,', identifying, 'RPS28', as, a, novel, disease, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Each', of, the, pathogenic, variants, identified, is, predicted, to, impede, ribosome, 'biogenesis,', which, in, turn, could, result, in, altered, cell, growth, and, 'proliferation,']), verbo([causing]), complemento([abnormal, embryologic, 'development,', defective, erythropoiesis, and, reduced, growth])]). relacion([sujeto(['C/EBPα', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([preferentially, in, myeloid, compared, with, lymphoid, or, erythroid, cells, and, directs, myeloid, lineage, specification])]). relacion([sujeto(['C/EBPα', is, also]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, lower, levels, in, 'HSCs', and, in, several, nonhematopoietic, tissues])]). a, myeloid, cell, line])]). relacion([sujeto(['Herein,', we, characterize, transgenic, 'C57BL/6', 'mice,', in, which, the, 'Cebpa', enhancer, and, 845, -, bp, promoter]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, hCD4, reporter])]). relacion([sujeto(['FACS', 'analysis,', in, vitro, colony, 'assays,', and, in, vivo, competitive, and, secondary, transplantation, revealed, that, myeloid, but, not, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([emerged, during, the, path, from, single, loci, to, 'genome-wide', 'analyses,', specifically, in, the, context, of, hematopoietic, transcriptional, mechanisms])]). study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, posttranscriptional, regulatory, mechanism, by, which, 'RNA-binding', protein, 'Elavl1a', regulates, embryonic, erythropoiesis, by, maintaining, appropriate, levels, of, gata1, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, gene, 'RPSA,', which, encodes, ribosomal, protein, 'SA,']), verbo([cause]), complemento([more, than, half, of, the, cases, of, isolated, congenital, asplenia])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'disease-causing', mutations]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, haploinsufficiency, of, 'RPSA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Haploinsufficiency', of, genes, encoding, other, ribosomal, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, cause, other, developmental, defects, in, 'humans,', and, in, complemento([the, expression, of, specific, genes, during, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['P-TEFb', activation, classically, occurs, by, a, 'feedback-regulated', process, of, 'signal-induced,', cells, in, the, presence, of, erythropoietin, and, stem, cell, 'factor,', the, cells, produce, 'Gr-1-,', 'Mac1-,', 'B220-,', 'CD3e-', or, 'CD49b-positive', hematopoietic, cells, when, 'co-cultured', with, 'DAS104-8', feeder, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Somatic', mutations]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, exclusive, production, of, a, short, 'GATA1', isoform, '(', 'GATA1s)', occur, in, all, cases, of, 'DS-TMD', and, 'DS-AMKL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mice', engineered, to, exclusively, produce, 'GATA1s']), verbo([have]), complemento([marked, megakaryocytic, progenitor, '(', 'MkP)', hyperproliferation, during, early, fetal, liver, '(', 'FL)', 'hematopoiesis,', but, not, during, postnatal, 'BM', 'hematopoiesis,', mirroring, the, spontaneous, resolution, of, 'DS-TMD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, striking, upregulation, of, type, 'I', 'IFN-responsive', gene, expression, in, prospectively, isolated, mouse, 'BM-', versus, 'FL-derived', 'MkPs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', deletion, of, the, &, 'alpha;/β', 'IFN', receptor, 1, '(', 'Ifnar1)', gene, or, injection, of, neutralizing, 'IFN-α/β', antibodies]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, proliferation, of, 'BM-derived', 'MkPs', of, 'GATA1s', mice, beyond, the, initial, postnatal, period])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, these, differences, existed, in, human, 'FL', versus, 'BM', megakaryocytes, and, that, primary, 'DS-TMD', cells, expressed, type, 'I', 'IFN-responsive', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that]), verbo([increased]), complemento([type, 'I', 'IFN', signaling, contributes, to, the, developmental, 'stage-specific', effects, of, 'GATA1s', and, possibly, the, spontaneous, resolution, of, 'DS-TMD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', physiological, switch, in, expression, of, the, 'embryonic,', 'fetal,', and, adult, &, 'beta;-like', globin, genes]), verbo([has]), complemento([garnered, enormous, attention, from, investigators, interested, in, transcriptional, mechanisms, and, the, molecular, basis, of, hemoglobinopathies])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', efforts]), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, the, discovery, of, cell, 'type-specific', transcription, 'factors,', unprecedented, mechanisms, of, transcriptional, coregulator, 'function,', genome, biology, 'principles,', unique, contributions, of, nuclear, organization, to, transcription, and, cell, 'function,', and, promising, therapeutic, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['Given', the, vast, literature, accrued, on, this, 'topic,', this, article, will, focus, on, the, master, regulator, of, erythroid, cell, development, and, function, 'GATA-1,', its]), verbo([associated]), complemento(['proteins,', and, its, frontline, role, in, controlling, hemoglobin, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hypermethylation', of, the, promoter, regions, of, the, two, main, human, 'LTBP4', complemento([in, 'LTBP4', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythropoiesis', is, a, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([process, which, becomes, decoupled, from, its, normal, differentiation, proliferative, disorder])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, the, molecular, events, that, are, required, for, abnormally, developing, erythroid, cells, to, escape, dependence, on, normal, growth, 'signals,', we, performed, in, vitro, expansion, of, mature, erythroblasts, '(', 'ERY)', from, seven, normal, healthy, donors, and, from, seven, polycythemic, in, myeloproliferative, neoplasms, such, as, polycythemia, vera])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'IL-3', signaling, induces, phosphorylation, of, relacion([sujeto([scube1, '(', signal, 'peptide-CUB', '(', complement, protein, 'C1r/C1s,', 'Uegf,', and, 'Bmp1)-EGF', 'domain-containing', protein, 1, ')', ',', the, founding, member, of, a, novel, secreted, and, cell, surface, 'SCUBE', protein, 'family,', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([predominantly, in, various, developing, tissues, in, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whole-mount', in, situ, hybridization, revealed, that, zebrafish, scube1, mRNA, is, maternally]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([and, widely, distributed, during, early, embryonic, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knockdown', of, scube1, by, 'morpholino-oligonucleotide', 'down-regulated', the, expression, of, marker, genes]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, early, primitive, hematopoietic, precursors, '(', 'scl)', and, erythroid, '(', gata1, and, 'hbbe1),', as, well, as, early, '(', pu])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, scube1, is, critical, for, and, functions, at, the, top, of, the, regulatory, hierarchy, of, primitive, hematopoiesis, by, modulating, 'BMP', activity, during, zebrafish, embryogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Histone', deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([multiple, developmental, processes, and, cellular, functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', their, roles, in, blood, development]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, 'determined,', and, in, 'Xenopus', laevis, a, specific, function, for, 'HDACs', has, yet, to, be, identified])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, employed, the, class, 'I', selective, 'HDAC', 'inhibitor,', valproic, acid, '(', 'VPA),', to, show, that, 'HDAC', activity, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, primitive, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([an, important, role, for, class, 'I', 'HDACs', in, primitive, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', work, also, demonstrates, that, specific, developmental, defects]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, exposure, to, 'VPA,', a, significant, teratogen, in, 'humans,', arise, through, inhibition, of, class, 'I', 'HDACs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', defined, a, 170, -, bp, region, within, the, promoter, and, showed, that, it, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, repression, of, 'Ccna1', in, cultured, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Within', this, region, we, identified, known, 'cis-acting', transcription, factor]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['sequences,', later, stages, of, germ, cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, demonstrated, that, neither, factor, alone, was, sufficient, to, significantly, repress, expression, driven, by, the, 'Ccna1', 'promoter,', while, concurrent]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Sp1,', and, most, likely, 'GATA1', and, possibly, additional, factors, was, inhibitory])]). expression, of, 'Ccna1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 'myofibroblast-like', 'CAF', cell, line]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([high, levels, of, smooth, muscle, actin, was, compared, to, normal, consistent, with, their, distinct, patterns, of, 'TF', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'TF', activity, profiles, of, 'CAF', subtypes]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, overview, of, complemento([not, been, well, studied])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', even, though, primary, myelofibrosis, '(', 'PMF)']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, markedly, worse, prognosis, than, complemento([information, of, 119, 'transcription-related', factors, in, over, 450, distinct, experiments])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([the, 'combinatorial,', 'co-association', of, transcription, factors, to, be, highly, context, 'specific:', distinct, combinations, of, factors, bind, at, specific, genomic, locations])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'particular,', there, are, significant, differences, in, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proximal, and, distal, to, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', organized, all, the, transcription, factor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([into, a, hierarchy, and, integrated, it, with, other, genomic, information, '(', for, 'example,', microRNA, 'regulation),', forming, a, dense, 'meta-network'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Factors', at, different, levels]), verbo([have]), complemento([different, 'properties;', for, 'instance,', 'top-level', transcription, factors, more, strongly, influence, expression, and, 'middle-level', ones, 'co-regulate', targets, to, mitigate, 'information-flow', bottlenecks])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', more, connected, network, components, are, under, stronger, selection, and, exhibit, a, greater, degree, of, 'allele-specific', activity, '(', that, 'is,', differential]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, two, parental, 'alleles)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, erythroid, transcription, factors, 'GATA1', '(', 'GATA1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, ')', and, 'KLF1', '(', 'Kruppel-like', factor, 1, ')', cause, benign, and, disease, phenotypes, in, humans, '[', 'X-linked', 'Lu(a-b-)', 'phenotype,', 'In(Lu)', blood, group, 'phenotype,', hereditary, persistence, of, foetal, 'haemoglobin,', borderline, 'HbA(2),', and, congenital, dyserythropoietic, anaemia, '(', 'CDA)]'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'mammals,', hematopoietic, homeostasis, is]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([by, a, 'fine-tuned', 'chromatin,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'GATA1', functions, as, platform, for, their, postmitotic, recruitment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mitotic', 'GATA1']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, tend, to, reactivate, more, rapidly, upon, entry, into, 'G1', than, genes, from, which, 'GATA1', dissociates])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mitosis-specific', destruction, of, 'GATA1', of, mitotic, &, 'quot;bookmarking"', by, 'GATA1', for, the, faithful, propagation, of, 'cell-type-specific', transcription, programs, through, cell, division])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', to, chemotherapy, and, favorable, prognosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Because', little, research]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, focused, on, 'refractory/relapsed', '(', 'R/R)', 'cases,', we, conducted, a, retrospective, analysis, for, 'R/R', 'ML-DS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thirteen', of, the, 26, patients, achieved, complete, remission, with, various, kinds, of, reinduction, 'chemotherapies;', 2, of, 8, survived, without, further, recurrence, after, receiving, allogeneic, hematopoietic, stem, cell, 'transplantation,', and, 4, of, 5]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([complete, remissions, with, chemotherapy, alone])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', failures, mostly, were]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, disease, progression, rather, than, 'treatment-related', toxicities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Anemia', is, a, hematologic, disorder, with]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([number, of, erythrocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythropoiesis,', the, process, by, which, red, blood, cells, 'differentiate,', are]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, 'humans,', mice, and, zebrafish])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ginger', '(', 'Zingiber', 'officinale)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, widely, used, in, traditional, 'medicine;', 'however,', to, date, there, is, no, scientific, research, documenting, the, potential, of, ginger, to, stimulate, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, strong, foundation, to, further, evaluate, the, molecular, mechanism, of, ginger, and, its, bioactive, components, during, hematopoiesis, and, to, investigate, their, effects, in, adults])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, will]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, basis, for, future, research, into, the, effect, of, ginger, during, mammalian, hematopoiesis, to, develop, novel, erythropoiesis, promoting, agents])]). relacion([sujeto(['Increasing', evidence, points, to, endoglin, '(', 'Eng),', an, accessory, receptor, for, the, transforming, growth, 'factor-β', superfamily, commonly]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, endothelial, 'lineage,', as, an, important, regulator, of, the, hematopoietic, lineage])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, lack, of, 'Eng', results, in, reduced, numbers, of, primitive, erythroid, colonies, as, well, as, downregulation, of, key, hematopoietic, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrate, that, induction, of, 'Eng', during, embryoid, body, differentiation]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, significant, increase, in, the, frequency, of, hematopoietic, 'progenitors,', in, 'particular,', the, erythroid, 'lineage,', which, correlated, with, upregulation, of, 'Scl,', 'Gata1,', 'Runx1,', and, embryonic, globin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Eng-induced']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([erythroid, activity, was, accompanied, by, high, levels, of, 'Smad1', phosphorylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', the, 'BMPs,', 'BMP4', is, well, known, for, its, role, in, hematopoietic, specification, from, mesoderm, by]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([expression, of, several, hematopoietic, 'genes,', including, 'Scl'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Scl', expression, in, 'Eng-deficient', embryonic, stem, cells, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([erythroid, 'colony-forming', activity, and, upregulation, of, 'Gata1', and, 'Gata2,', positioning, 'Eng', upstream, of, 'Scl'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, findings, support, the, premise, that, 'Eng']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, hematopoietic, transcriptional, 'network,', most, likely, through, regulation, of, 'BMP4', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['They', identified, two, unrelated, pedigrees, in, which, the, disease, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, mutations, in, 'GATA1,', which, encodes, an, essential, hematopoietic, transcription, factor, with, no, known, mechanistic, links, to, ribosomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', erythroid, 'cells,', the, locus, control, region, progenitors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythroid', cell, proliferation, and, survival]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, related, to, activation, of, the, 'JAK-STAT', pathway])]). for, hematopoietic, cell, differentiation, toward, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['Three', functional, domains]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, microtubule, network])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'lentivirus-mediated', overexpression, of, 'HPIP', in, human, 'CD34(+)', cells]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([hematopoietic, colony, formation, in, 'vitro,', whereas, 'HPIP', knockdown, leads, to, a, reduction, in, the, number, of, such, colonies])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', forced, expression, of, 'HPIP', in, 'K562', 'cells,', a, multipotent, 'erythro-megakaryoblastic', leukemia, cell, 'line,']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, induction, of, erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['HPIP', overexpression, in, both, 'CD34(+)', and, 'K562', cells, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, activation, of, the, 'PI3K/AKT', 'pathway,', and, corresponding, treatment, with, a, 'PI3K-specific', 'inhibitor,', 'LY-294002,', caused, a, reduction, in, clonogenic, progenitor, number, in, 'HPIP-expressing', 'CD34(+)', cells, and, decreased, 'K562', cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Combined,', these, findings, point, to, an, important, role, of, the, 'PI3K/AKT', pathway, in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['HPIP-induced', effects, on, the, growth, and, differentiation, of, hematopoietic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'HPIP', gene, expression, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, induced, in, 'K562', cells, in, response, to, erythroid, differentiation, signals, such, as, 'DMSO', and, erythropoietin])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', erythroid, 'lineage-specific', transcription, factor, 'GATA1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'HPIP', promoter, and, activates, 'HPIP', gene, transcription, in, a, 'CCCTC-binding', factor, '(', 'CTCF)-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', this, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([evidence, that, 'HPIP', is, a, target, of, 'GATA1', and, 'CTCF', in, erythroid, cells, and, plays, an, important, role, in, erythroid, differentiation, by, modulating, the, 'PI3K/AKT', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', system, is, set, up, specifically, for, 'non-invasive', tracking, of, both, stationary, and, circulating, cells, in, adult, zebrafish, '(', 'casper)', that]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, engineered, to, be, optically, transparent])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, initial, testing, of, this, novel, instrument, by, imaging, complemento([in, 'cell-cycle', regulation, and, cellular, response, to, stresses])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', using, the, electrophoresis, mobility, shift, assay, and, chromatin, relacion([sujeto(['Lentivirus', shRNA, knockdown, of, the, 'GATA1', gene, in, the, 'DS', 'AMkL', cell, 'line,', 'CMK', '(', harbors, a, mutated, 'GATA1', gene, and, only]), verbo([expresses]), complemento(['GATA1s),', resulting, in, lower, 'GATA1s', protein, 'levels,', promoted, cell, differentiation, towards, the, megakaryocytic, lineage, and, repressed, cell, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', cytogenetic, studies, of, myeloid, and, acute, lymphoblastic, leukemias, in, children, with, 'Down', syndrome, '(', 'ML-DS', and, 'DS-ALL)']), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, significant, differences, in, abnormality, patterns, between, such, cases, and, acute, leukemias, in, general])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'ML-DS', 'cases,', a, total, of, 'RB1', '(', 12, '%', ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss', of, the, 'SERP2', and, 'INPP4B', 'genes,', encoding, the, 'stress-associated', endoplasmic, reticulum, protein, family, member, 2, and, the, inositol, polyphosphate, 4, -, 'phosphatase-II,', 'respectively,']), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, never, been, implicated, in, leukemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', deletions, of, the, other, genes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, associated, with, 'ALL,', the, high, frequency, of, 'BTG1', loss, is, a, novel, finding])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'ML-DS', and, 'DS-ALL', are, genetically, 'distinct,', with, mainly]), verbo([gains]), complemento([in, 'ML-DS', and, deletions, in, 'DS-ALL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'DS-ALL', is, characterized, by, several, recurrent, gene, 'deletions,', with, 'BTG1']), verbo([loss]), complemento([being, particularly, frequent])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, regeneration, of, hematopoietic, relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', both, 'SMAD1', and, 'TCF7L2', follow, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, predominant, lineage, regulator, during, differentiation, from, multipotent, regulators, to, control, the, gene, programs, defining, cellular, identity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Prx5', is, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, various, tissues, including, mitochondria, and, 'peroxisomes,', implying, that, 'Prx5', functions, as, a, regulator, of, the, cellular, oxidation, state])]). relacion([sujeto(['Prx5', plays, a, critical, role, in, protecting, complemento([that, 'Prx5', may, protect, cells, from, oxidative, 'stress-mediated', apoptosis, in, a, 'GATA1-regulated', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Understanding', platelet, biology]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, aided, by, studies, of, mice, with, mutations, in, key, megakaryocytic, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, defects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mice', that, are, homozygous, for, a, 'FOG1', point, mutation, '(', 'ki/ki),', which, ablates, 'FOG1-NuRD', 'interactions,']), verbo([have]), complemento([platelets, that, display, a, gray, platelet, syndrome, '(', 'GPS)-like', macrothrombocytopenia])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', platelets]), verbo([have]), complemento([few, &, 'alpha;-granules', and, an, increased, number, of, 'lysosomal-like', vacuoles, on, electron, 'microscopy,', reminiscent, of, the, platelet, in, patients, with, 'GATA1-related', 'X-linked', 'GPS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), complemento([that, this, transcriptional, complex, regulates, not, only, megakaryopoiesis, but, also, &, 'alpha;-granule', generation, and, signaling, pathways, required, for, granule, secretion])]). in, circulating, 'DCs', is]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, burn, patients, who, develop, sepsis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', our, 15, '%', 'TBSA', scald, burn, 'model,', we, demonstrate, a, relacion([sujeto(['Notch', signaling]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, linked, to, impaired, erythropoietic, and, megakaryopoietic, development, of, 'CD34+', progenitor, 'cells,', but, its, role, in, 'MDS', is, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'Notch', pathway, elements, and, its, association, with, the, key, of, 'GATA1', erythroid, promoter, 'CpG', dinucleotides, flanking, 'cis-regulatory', 'elements,', including, an, 'N-box', suppressor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, for, 'HES1', and, a, erythropoiesis, using, 'CD34+', bone, marrow, cells, from, healthy, donors, '(', n, =, 7, ')', and, patients, with, 'MDS', '(', low, 'risk:', 'RA/n', =, 6, ',', 'RARS/n', =, 3, ;, high, 'risk:', 'RAEB/n', =, 4, ',', 'RAEB-T/n', =, 2, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', the, 'Notch', pathway, 'elements,', no, conclusive, expression, differences, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([between, 'MDS', and, normal, erythropoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['But', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([steadily, 'up-regulated', 'RNA', expression, of, 'GATA1', and, of, 'BCLxl', during, late, normal, erythropoietic, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', during, 'MDS,', erythropoiesis, a]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, typical, 'up-regulation', of, 'GATA1', and, 'BCLxl', was, observed])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hypermethylation', of, 'CpG', dinucleotides, flanking, the, repressor, 'HES1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, within, the, 5, '\'', region, of, 'GATA1', was, detected, particularly, during, late, 'MDS', erythropoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', higher, residual, 5, '\'', -, 'GATA1', methylation, values, in, 'MDS', erythropoiesis, but, decremental]), verbo([loss]), complemento([thereof, in, normal, erythropoiesis, suggest, a, gene, dose, effect, for, 'GATA1', during, erythropoiesis, being, finely, tuned, by, 'CpG', methylation])]). relacion([sujeto([&, 'beta;-Lapachone']), verbo([has]), complemento([antitumor, and, wound, 'healing-promoting', activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', address, the, potential, influences, of, various, chemicals, on, heart, development, of, zebrafish, 'embryos,', we, previously, treated, zebrafish, embryos, with, chemicals, from, a, 'Sigma', 'LOPAC1280™', library, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([several, chemicals, including, &, 'beta;-lapachone', that, affected, heart, morphogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, induction, of, apoptosis, of, endocardium, and, erythrocytes, by, &, 'beta;-lapachone', is, mediated, through, an, 'NQO1-', and, 'calcium-dependent', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', previous, studies, addressing, this, issue]), verbo([have]), complemento([mainly, focused, on, cases, in, which, +, 21, was, part, of, a, complex, karyotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['Partial', uniparental, disomies, '(', 'UPDs)', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, five, 'cases;', two, recurrent, 'UPDs', were, 'identified,', namely, 'UPD4q', and, 'UPD7q'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'TET2', mutation, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, one, of, the, cases, with, 'UPD4q'])]). relacion([sujeto(['STAT1']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([response, to, interferons, and, regulates, 'immunity,', cell, 'proliferation,', 'apoptosis,', and, sensitivity, of, 'Fanconi', 'Anemia', cells, to, apoptosis, after, interferon, 'signaling;', the, roles, of, 'STAT1', in, 'embryos,', 'however,', are, not, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['Zebrafish', stat1a, encodes, all, five, domains, of, the, human, 'STAT1-alpha', splice, form, 'but,', like, the, human, 'STAT1-beta', splice, 'variant,', stat1b, lacks, a, complete, transactivation, 'domain;', 'thus,', two, unlinked, zebrafish, paralogs, encode, protein, forms]), verbo([translated]), complemento([from, two, splice, variants, of, a, single, human, 'gene,', as, expected, by, 'sub-functionalization', after, genome, duplication])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phylogenetic', and]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([synteny, studies, showed, that, stat1b, and, stat1a, arose, as, duplicates, in, the, teleost, genome, duplication, '(', 'TGD)', and, clarified, the, evolutionary, origin, of, 'STAT1,', 'STAT2,', 'STAT3,', 'STAT4,', 'STAT5A,', 'STAT5B', and, 'STAT6', by, tandem, and, genome, duplication])]). relacion([sujeto(['Morpholino', knockdown, of, 'stat1b,', but, not, 'stat1a,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, the, myeloid, and, granulocyte, markers, spi, and, mpo, and, increased, expression, of, the, hematopoietic, progenitor, marker, 'scl,', the, erythrocyte, marker, 'gata1,', and, hemoglobin])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, zebrafish, 'Stat1b', promotes, myeloid, development, at, the, expense, of, erythroid, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', correlated, these, results, with, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([distribution, of, 'EKLF,', 'RNA-Seq', analysis, of, the, 'transcriptome,', and, the, occupancy, of, other, erythroid, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', progenitor, 'cells,', 'EKLF', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([predominantly, at, the, periphery, of, the, 'nucleus,', where, 'EKLF', primarily, occupies, the, promoter, regions, of, genes, and, acts, as, a, transcriptional, activator])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', progenitor, 'cells,', 'EKLF']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([general, cell, growth, and, cell, cycle, regulatory, 'pathways,', whereas, in, erythroblasts, 'EKLF', is, associated, with, repression, of, these, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'EKLF', interactome, shows, very, little, overlap, with, the, interactomes, of, 'GATA1,', 'GATA2,', or, 'TAL1,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, a, model, in, which, 'EKLF', directs, programs, that, are, independent, of, those, regulated, by, the, 'GATA', factors, or, 'TAL1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Most', 'GATA1-regulated', events]), verbo([require]), complemento(['GATA1', to, bind, 'FOG1,', and, essentially, all, 'GATA1-activated', genes, are, cooccupied, by, a, 'TAL1/E2A/LMO2/LDB1', 'complex;', 'however,', it, is, not, known, whether, 'FOG1', and, 'TAL1/E2A/LMO2/LDB1', are, simultaneously, recruited, by, 'GATA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', structural, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, 'FOG1-binding', domain, of, 'GATA1,', the, 'N', 'finger,', can, also, directly, contact, 'LMO2', and, show, 'that,', despite, the, small, size, '(', &, 'lt; 50', 'residues)', of, the, 'GATA1', 'N', 'finger,', both, 'FOG1', and, 'LMO2', can, simultaneously, bind, this, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, structural, snapshot, of, multiprotein, complex, formation, at, 'GATA1-dependent', genes, and, support, a, model, in, which, 'FOG1', and, 'TAL1/E2A/LMO2/LDB1', can, cooccupy, 'E-box/WGATAR', sites, to, facilitate, 'GATA1-mediated', activation, of, gene, activation])]). through, mammalian, target, of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', and, elevated, levels, of, 'full-length', 'GATA-1', and, its, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['Blocking', of, mTOR, with, rapamycin]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, maturation, of, neonatal, 'MKs', without, affecting, 'ploidy,', in, contrast, to, the, synchronous, inhibition, of, polyploidization, and, cytoplasmic, maturation, in, adult, 'MKs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that, these, mechanisms, allow, 'fetuses/neonates', to, populate, their, rapidly, expanding, bone, marrow, and, intravascular, 'Down', 'syndrome-transient', myeloproliferative, disorder, and, the, thrombocytopenia, absent, radius, syndrome])]). relacion([sujeto(['IL-1R', antagonist, '(', 'IL-1Ra)', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, adequate, host, defense, in, invasive, pneumococcal, disease, '(', 'IPD)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', minor, allele, of, an, 'IL1RN', gene, '(', 'C/T)', promoter, polymorphism, and, megakaryocytic, gene, 'GPIX', were, increased])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', 'EDAG', functions, as, a, positive, regulator, of, 'erythroid/megakaryocytic', differentiation, in, 32, terminus])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', it, is, difficult, to, fractionate, living, eosinophils, by, flow, cytometry, because, these, granulocytes]), verbo([express]), complemento([multiple, cell, lines, that]), verbo([express]), complemento([fluorescent, proteins, under, control, of, the, 'Gata1', gene, hematopoietic, regulatory, region, '(', 'Gata1-HRD),', which, is, exclusively, active, in, 'Gata1-expressing', hematopoietic, 'cells,', including, eosinophils])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, these, 'eosinophil-specific', genes]), verbo([increased]), complemento([as, the, cells, differentiated])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'X-linked', 'Gata1(low)', mutation, in, mice]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['strain-restricted', myeloproliferative, disorders, characterized, 'spleen,', but, not, from, 'marrow,', of, 'Gata1(low)', mice]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['colony-forming', function, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', observation, indicates, that, investigated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', in, the, absence, of, the, 'spleen,', 'Gata1(low)', hematopoiesis, is, supported, by, the, liver]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, treatment, of, myelofibrosis, in, these, animals, requires, the, rescue, of, both, stem, cell, and, microenvironmental, functions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Children', with, 'Down', syndrome, '(', 'DS)']), we, used, bioinformatics, combined, with, transgenic, assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['DS', children]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, approximately, 10, -, to, 20, -, fold, higher, risk, for, 'membrane-linked', hemolytic, anemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', work]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, 'FOG1', recruits, two, 'multi-protein', 'complexes,', the, nucleosome, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', elucidate, mechanisms, that, might, differentially]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, association, of, 'FOG1,', as, well, as, 'GATA1,', with, these, two, 'complexes,', we, characterized, a, previously, unrecognized, translational, isoform, of, 'FOG1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, an, 'N-terminally', truncated, version, of, 'FOG1', is, produced, from, an, internal, 'ATG', and, that, this, 'isoform,', designated, 'FOG1S,', lacks, the, nucleosome, remodeling, 'domain-binding', 'domain,', altering, the, complexes, with, which, it, interacts])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', isoforms]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'C-terminal', binding, protein, 'complex,', which, we, show, also, contains, 'lysine-specific', demethylase, 1, '(', 'LSD1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([two, novel, mechanisms, for, the, regulation, of, 'GATA1', interaction, with, 'FOG1-dependent', protein, complexes, through, the, production, of, two, translational, isoforms, with, differential, interaction, profiles, and, independent, nuclear, localization, controls])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', anticancer, drugs, with, diverse, chemical, structures, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([differentiation, of, cancer, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'K562', cells, with, low, concentrations, of, the, tested, drugs]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['caspase-3', but, did, not, trigger, detectable, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Instead,', 'drug-induced', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'caspase-3', activity, significantly, reduced, the, ability, of, 'K562', cells, to]), verbo([execute]), complemento([the, differentiation, programme])]). relacion([sujeto(['Binding', activity, of, 'GATA-1,', transcription, factor, responsible, for, differentiation, and, cell, 'survival,', was, not, diminished, by]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([multiple, aspects, of, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'GATA-2', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, normal, megakaryocyte, complemento([almost, complete, loss, of, 'GFP', expression, in, the, 'BREP', 'fraction,', but, the, 'CREP', stage, expression, was, suppressed, only, 'partially,', indicating, the, critical, such, as, a, &, 'gt;200-fold', increase, in, 'Gata1', '(', ref])]). relacion([sujeto([10, ')', among, the, 'erythroid-prone', 'cells,', or, a, &, 'gt;15-fold']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['PU'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Comparison', of, normal, erythroblasts, and, erythroblasts, from, persons, with, the, rare, 'In(Lu)', type, of, 'Lu(a-b-)', blood, group, phenotype, showed]),
