including, 'ALAS2,', 'SLC4A1)', had, reduced, transcript, 'levels,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, phenotype, resulted, from, a, transcription, factor, abnormality])]). megakaryocyte, and, platelet, production])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'STAT1', expression, was, significantly, downregulated, in, 'Gata1-knockdown', complemento([effector, 'IRF-1,', rescued, multiple, defects, in, 'Gata1-deficient', megakaryopoiesis, in, 'mice,', inducing, polyploidization, and, expression, of, a, subset, of, subset, of, 'Flk1-positive', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, primitive, hematopoietic, cells, arise, from, 'EC', 'marker-positive', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'VE-cadherin,', 'PECAM-1,', 'CD34,', 'endoglin,', and, 'Tie2', are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([not, only, in, adult, and, embryonic, 'ECs', but, in, extraembryonic, 'Flk1-positive', cells, during, gastrulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', latter, cell, population, includes, progenitors, that, give, rise, to, primitive, hematopoietic, 'cells,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, primitive, and, definitive, hematopoietic, cells, in, the, mouse, embryo, arise, from, 'EC', 'marker-positive', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', identification, of, short, peptide, tags, that, are, efficiently, biotinylated, by, the, bacterial, 'BirA', biotin, ligase]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, an, approach, for, the, 'single-step', purification, of, transcription, factor, complexes, by, specific, in, vivo, biotinylation, tagging])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', direct]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, streptavidin, of, biotinylated, 'GATA-1', in, nuclear, extracts, resulted, in, the, 'single-step', capture, of, the, tagged, factor, and, associated, 'proteins,', which, were, eluted, and, identified, by, mass, spectrometry])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, characterization, of, several, distinct, 'GATA-1', complexes, with, other, transcription, factors, and, chromatin, remodeling, 'cofactors,', which, are, involved, in, activation, and, repression, of, gene, targets])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 5, '\'', -, 'HS4', chicken, 'beta-globin', insulator, functions, as, a, positional, enhancer, blocker, on, chromatinized, episomes, in, human, 'cells,', blocking, the, 'HS2', enhancer, of, the, human, 'beta-globin', locus, control, region, from]), verbo([activating]), complemento([a, downstream, 'epsilon-globin', gene])]). relacion([sujeto([5, '\'', -, 'HS4', interrupted, formation, of, a, domain, of, histone, 'H3', and, 'H4', acetylation, encompassing, the, 6, -, kb, minilocus, and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([transfer, of, 'RNA', polymerase, from, the, enhancer, to, the, gene, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, enhancer, blocking, phenotype, was, amplified, when, the, insulated, locus, contained, a, weakened, 'HS2', enhancer, in, which, clustered, point, mutations, eliminated, interaction, of, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nucleosome', depletion, at, 5, '\'', -, 'HS4', was, dependent, on, interaction, of, the, insulator, protein, 'CCCTC-binding', factor, '(', 'CTCF)', and, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, enhancer, blocking])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, a, domain, of, active, chromatin, is, formed, by, spreading, from, an, enhancer, to, a, target, gene, and, can, be, blocked, by, a, 'nucleosome-free', gap, in, an, insulator])]). relacion([sujeto(['Regulation', of, transcription]), verbo([requires]), complemento([mechanisms, to, both, activate, and, terminate, transcription, factor, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', is, a, key, haemopoietic, transcription, factor, whose, activity, is]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, acetylation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, here, that, acetylated, 'GATA-1', is]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([for, degradation, via, the, 'ubiquitin/proteasome', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Acetylation', positively, signals, 'ubiquitination,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, activation, by, acetylation, simultaneously, marks, 'GATA-1', for, degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Promoter-specific', 'MAPK', phosphorylation, then, cooperates, with, acetylation, to]), verbo([execute]), complemento([protein, loss])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', requirement, for, both, modifications, is, novel, and]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, way, by, which, degradation, of, the, active, protein, can, be, specifically, regulated, in, response, to, external, 'phosphorylation-mediated', signalling])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', many, transcription, factors, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'acetylation,', we, suggest, that, this, might, be, a, general, mechanism, to, control, transcription, factor, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cellular, uptake, of, methotrexate, and, reduced, 'folates,', was, studied, in, childhood, acute, lymphoblastic, leukemia, '(', 'ALL)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', hRFC, gene, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, six, noncoding, exons, '(', 'A1/A2', and, 'A', to, 'E)', and, multiple, promoters])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, and, gel, shift, 'assays,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, confirmed, for, 'USF1', and, 'GATA1', for, 'hRFC-A1/A2,', and, for, 'Sp1,', 'USF1,', and, 'Ikaros', for, 'hRFC-B'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Myb', 'proto-oncogene', encodes, a, transcription, factor, '(', 'c-Myb)', that, is, essential, for, normal, hematopoiesis, and, is, thought, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([hematopoietic, cell, proliferation, and, differentiation, by, regulating, expression, of, specific, target, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identify, the, mouse, 'erythroid-specific', carbonic, anhydrase, 'I', promoter, '(', 'CAIe)', as, a]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'c-Myb', activity, and, demonstrate, that, 'Myb', activity, is, critical, for, carbonic, anhydrase, 'I', promoter, and, both, transcription, factors]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'CAIe', promoter, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identify, a, novel, 20, bp, sequence, in, the, 'CAIe', verbo([interact]), complemento([with, this, 'DNA', sequence, suggesting, that, 'c-Myb', and, 'GATA-1', may, be, contained, in, a, complex, that, interacts, with, this, region, of, the, 'CAIe', ',', and, 310, together])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analysis', of, hematopoietic, progenitor, populations, during, ontogeny, and, into, adulthood, showed, a, moderate]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, erythroid, 'burst-forming', unit, '(', 'BFU-E)', and, erythroid, 'colony-forming', unit, '(', 'CFU-E)', numbers, only, in, the, adult, bone, marrow, of, the, triple, mutant])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, any, molecular, consequences, associated, with, loss, of, phosphorylation, at, residues, 72, ',', 142, ',', and, 310, can, be, compensated, for, in, the, in, vivo, environment])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', chromosomal, translocation, 't(8;21),', generating, the, 'AML1-ETO', fusion, 'protein,', is, frequently]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'French-American-British', '(', 'FAB)', type, 'M2', acute, myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'AML)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['AML1-ETO']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([normal, definitive, hematopoiesis, and, blocks, erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', mechanistic, models, for, the, role, of, 'AML1-ETO', in, leukemia, development]), verbo([have]), complemento([emerged, over, the, last, decade])]). relacion([sujeto(['Most', of, these, models]), verbo([have]), complemento([emphasized, the, capacity, of, the, fusion, protein, to, redirect, repressive, 'cofactors,', such, as, histone, deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)', and, 'DNA', methyltransferases, '(', 'DNMTs),', to, 'RUNX', target, 'genes,', thereby, reversing, the, hematopoietic, transcriptional, program, activated, by, 'wild-type', 'RUNX1a', phenomenon, referred, to, collectively, in, this, review, as, the, &, 'quot;classical"', corepressor, model])]). relacion([sujeto(['Alpha', 'hemoglobin-stabilizing', protein, '(', 'AHSP)', is, an, abundant, erythroid, protein, that, specifically]), verbo([binds]), complemento([free, 'alphaHb,', stabilizes, its, 'structure,', and, limits, its, ability, to, participate, in, chemical, reactions, that, generate, reactive, oxygen, species])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gene', ablation, studies, in, mice, demonstrate, that, 'AHSP', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, normal, erythropoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['AHSP']), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, 'G', and, 'H', helices, of, alphaHb, on, a, surface, that, largely, overlaps, with, the, 'alpha1-beta1', interface, of, 'HbA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Remarkably,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'AHSP', to, oxygenated, alphaHb, induces, dramatic, structure, limits, the, reactivity, of, heme, 'iron,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([a, mechanism, by, which, 'AHSP', stabilizes, alphaHb])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, biochemical, pathway, through, which, 'AHSP', might, participate, in, normal, 'Hb', synthesis, and, modulate, the, severity, of, thalassemias])]). of, red, blood, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1,', one, of, the, hematopoietically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['members,', is, required, for, normal, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Over', the, past, few, 'years,', mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, 'GATA-1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, linked, to, several, human, hematologic, 'disorders,', including, 'X-linked', dyserythropoietic, anemia, and, 'thrombocytopenia,', 'X-linked', thrombocytopenia, and, 'beta-thalassemia,', and, 'Down', syndrome, acute, megakaryoblastic, leukemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', murine, bipotent, 'erythroid/megakaryocytic', 'cells,', the, progenitor, '(', 'MEP)', and, precursor, '(', 'PEM)', 'cells,', recently]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, on, the, basis, of, the, phenotypes, of, 'linnegc-kitposSca-1neg', 'CD16/CD32lowCD34low', and, 'TER119pos4A5pos', or, 2, 'D5pos,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['MEP', 'cells,', but, not, 'PEM', 'cells,']), verbo([express]), complemento(['c-kit,', respond, to, stem, cell, factor, in, 'vitro,', and, form, spleen, colonies, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['PEM', cells]), verbo([increase]), complemento([10, -, to, 20, -, fold, under, acute, and, chronic, 'stress,', whereas, 'MEP', cell, increases, '(', 21, '%', -, 84, '%', ')', are, observed, only, in, acutely, stressed, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'MEP', and, 'PEM', cells, represent, distinct, cell, populations, that, may, exist, in, an, 'upstream-downstream', differentiation, relationship, under, conditions, of, stress])]). relacion([sujeto(['Whereas', the, dynamics, of, both, populations, are, altered, by, stress, 'induction,', the, differential, response, to, acute, and, chronic, stress]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([different, regulatory, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Platelet', factor, 4, '(', 'PF4)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([exclusively, in, megakaryocytes, and, platelets, and, serves, as, a, 'lineage-specific', marker, of, megakaryocytic, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, the, novel, regulatory, element, termed, &, 'quot;TME"', in, the, 'PF4', promoter, and, identified, a, group, of, binding, proteins, from, megakaryocytic, 'HEL', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', abnormal, megakaryocytopoiesis]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, idiopathic, myelofibrosis, '(', 'IM)', plays, a, role, in, its, pathogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclude, that, megakaryocytes, from, 'IM', patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([reduced, 'GATA-1', 'content,', possibly, contributing, to, disease, pathogenesis, as, in, the, 'GATA-1(low)', mice, and, also, representing, a, novel, 'IM-associated', marker])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', all, the, 'Gata1low', mice, developed, fibrosis, relacion([sujeto(['Instead,', 'DBA/2', 'mutants,', although, severely, 'anemic,']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([limited, fibrosis, and, osteosclerosis, and, did, not, present, 'tear-drop', complemento([by, 'Gata1low', mutants, of, different, strains, might, represent, a, model, to, study, the, variability, of, the, clinical, picture, of, the, human, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hematopoiesis', is, a, complex, process]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, nuclear, proteins, that, coordinate, 'lineage-specific', patterns, of, gene, expression])]). differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([two, zinc, fingers, essential, for, normal, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', finger]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([interaction, with, 'FOG-1,', a, cofactor, for, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, family, with, a, novel, single, base, mutation, that, results, in, an, amino, acid, substitution, '(', 'Gly208Arg)', within, the, highly, conserved, portion, of, the, 'GATA-1', 'N-terminal', finger, 'domain,', leading, to, dyserythropoietic, anemia, and, macrothrombocytopenia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Another', mutation, described, at, the, same, codon, '(', 208, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, be, associated, with, thrombocytopenia, only])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, many, genes, within, these, lineages, and, its, functionality, depends, upon, its, ability, to, bind, both, 'DNA', and, protein, partners])]). relacion([sujeto(['Disruption', of, either, of, these, functions]), verbo([causes]), complemento([severe, hematopoietic, dysfunction, and, results, in, blood, 'disorders,', such, as, thrombocytopenia, and, anemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', investigated, the, expression, of, proliferative, cell]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([antigen, '(', 'PCNA)', in, zebrafish, to, delineate, the, proliferative, hematopoietic, component, during, adult, and, embryonic, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Immunostaining', for, 'PCNA', and]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([green, fluorescence, protein, '(', 'eGFP)', was, performed, in, 'wild-type', and, 'fli1-eGFP', '(', endothelial, 'marker)', and, 'gata1-eGFP', '(', erythroid, cell, 'marker)', transgenic, fish])]). relacion([sujeto(['PCNA', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells, but, not, in, mature, 'neutrophils,', eosinophils, or, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Some', 'PCNA+', cells, are, scattered, in, the, hematopoietic, compartment, of, the, kidney, while, others, are, closely]), consistent, with, its, role, in, cell, proliferation, and, 'DNA', synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'embryos,', 'PCNA', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'brain,', spinal, cord, and, intermediate, cell, mass, '(', 'ICM)', at, 24, 'h-post', fertilization])]). relacion([sujeto(['Therefore,', 'PCNA', can, be, used, to, mark, cell, proliferation, in, zebrafish, hematopoietic, and, liver, of, adult, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['High', levels, of, 'alpha2B-AR', are, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([during, fetal, life, in, the, 'placenta,', liver, and, 'blood,', where, it, is, borne, by, cells, of, the, erythropoietic, lineage])]). relacion([sujeto(['EMSA', showed, specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GATA1', and, 'NF-E2', to, these, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, chromatin, environment, in, the, vicinity, of, these, boxes, plays, a, critical, role, for, 'alpha2B-AR', expression, during, fetal, life])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, interleukin, 3, -, dependent, hematopoietic, cell, line, 'Ba/F3,', inhibition, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase,', a, member, of, the, 'MAPK/c-Jun', 'N-terminal', 'kinase/stress-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, family, that, plays, an, important, role, in, cell, growth, and, death, 'control,', rapidly]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, severe, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento(['that,', upon, 'interleukin-3', stimulation, of, 'Ba/F3', 'cells,', the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', is, strongly, phosphorylated, at, residue, serine, 26, by, a, 'MAPK-dependent', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, 'GATA-1']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['GATA-1-mediated', transcription, of, the, 'E4bp4', survival, gene, without, significantly, changing, the, 'DNA-binding', affinity, of, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', characterization, of, 'GATA-1', phosphorylation, site, mutants, revealed, that, the, antiapoptotic, function, of, 'GATA-1', is, strongly, dependent, upon, its, verbo([lead]), complemento([to, abnormal, and, malignant, hematopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', authors]), verbo([report]), complemento([an, unusual, case, of, a, newborn, without, and, molecular, analysis]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, trisomy, 21, and, 'GATA1', mutation, restricted, to, leukemic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', 'loss-of-function', analysis, shows, that, gata1, is, necessary, for, terminal, erythroid, 'differentiation,', no, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([demonstrated, that, loss, of, gata1, alters, myeloid, differentiation, during, 'change,', expression, of, many, erythroid, genes, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, differentially, dependent, on, 'Gata1', 'alone,', on, both, 'Gata1', and, 'Gata2,', or, independent, of, phenotype])]). relacion([sujeto(['An', in, vivo, footprinting, assay, revealed, that, either, the, -, 175, mutation, or, the, -, 173, mutation, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), 'Cdc6', levels, are, maintained, in, megakaryoblastic, 'HEL', 'cells,', but, severely, downregulated, by, ectopic, expression, of, transcriptional, repressor, 'Drosophila', melanogaster, escargot])]). megakaryoblastic, cells, as, well, as, in, primary, megakaryocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, cdc6, expression, could, be, actively, maintained, during, megakaryocytic, differentiation, through, transcriptional, mechanisms, involving, specific, 'cis-', and, 'trans-regulatory', elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', proliferation, 'marker,', proliferating, cell]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([antigen, '(', 'PCNA),', a, 'Sertoli', cell, specific, transcription, 'factor,', 'GATA-1', and, the, male, germ, cell, 'specific,', verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'pre-Sertoli', and, germ, cells, on, the, day, of, birth])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', 'pre-meiotic', germ, cells, and, spermatocytes]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['RBM', throughout, postnatal, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['From', 42, days, 'onward,', there, was, a, dramatic]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'RBM', expression, in, individual, 'pre-meiotic', and, meiotic, germ, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([implicated, the, 'Lyn', tyrosine, kinase, in, erythropoietin, of, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', is]), verbo([phosphorylated]), complemento([in, vivo, on, seven, of, its, serine, 'residues;', the, regulation, and, function, of, 'GATA-1', 'phosphorylation,', 'however,', is, not, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, 'EGF-induced', 'MAPK', signalling, results, in, the, phosphorylation, of, ectopically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['GATA-1', in, 'COS', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', phosphorylation, can, be, positively, or, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, genetic, complemento([that, 'GATA-1', is, a, 'MAPK', substrate, with, 'MAPK', phosphorylation, occurring, primarily, on, 'Ser26', and, 'Ser178'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, show, that, 'GATA-1', is]), in, 'COS', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Patients', with, 3, q21q26, rearrangements, seem, to, share, similar, clinicopathologic, features, and, a, common, molecular, 'mechanism,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, myelodysplasia, or, acute, myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'AML)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', ectopic, expression, of, 'EVI1', '(', 3, 'q26)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, dysplasia, that, characterizes, this, subset, of, myeloid, neoplasias])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', lack, of, 'EVI1', expression]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, in, molecular, characterization, of, seven, patients, with, 'inv(3)(q21q26),', 't(3;3)(q21;q26)', or, related, abnormalities])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA2', '(', 3, 'q21)', was]), verbo([found]), unique, mechanism, is, not, likely, to, be, involved, in, 3, q21q26, rearrangements])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1', strongly, activates, transcription, of, complemento([cAMP, accumulation, in, yolk, sac, endothelial, 'cells,', these, results, suggest, a, new, mode, of, vascular, regulation, in, which, 'GATA-1', controls, 'NK-B', synthesis, in, erythroid, heterogeneous, in, 'CD45', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', previous, 'studies,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CD45', is, expressed, on, 75, '%', of, lung, 'SP', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', immunostaining, for, 'alpha-smooth', muscle, actin, and, 'cytokeratin,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([significant, differences, in, the, relative, expression, patterns, of, these, markers, in, lung, and, marrow, 'SP', cell, subtypes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, the, myeloid, transcription, factor, 'GATA1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, early, development, of, this, lineage])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, 'cis-elements']), verbo([required]), complemento([for, eosinophil, 'GATA1', expression, are, not, fully, characterized])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'eosinophils,', 'GATA1', and, 'CCAAT/enhancer']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, epsilon, '(', 'C/EBP', 'epsilon)', do, not, bind, 'HS', 1, but, bind, selectively, a, 'cis-element', in, the, first, 'GATA1', intron])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'HS', 1, is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, eosinophil, 'GATA1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Instead,', this, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, previously, unsuspected, role, for, the, 'GATA1', intron, element, for, this, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2', are, transcription, factors]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, differentiation, of, megakaryocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mice', deficient, in, these, factors]), verbo([have]), complemento([phenotypes, characterized, by, markedly, increased, numbers, of, immature, 'megakaryocytes,', a, concomitant, drastic, reduction, of, 'platelets,', and, a, striking, increased, bone, mass])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', similar, bone, phenotype, in, both, animal, models]), verbo([led]), complemento([us, to, explore, the, interaction, between, osteoblasts, and, megakaryocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', marked, 2, -, to, 3, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, trabecular, bone, volume, and, bone, formation, indices, were, observed, in, these, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 20, -, to, 150, -, fold]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, trabecular, bone, volume, was, measured, for, the, entire, femoral, medullary, canal])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([bone, mass, phenotype, in, these, animals, was, not, caused, by, osteoclast, 'defects,', because, osteoclast, number, and, function, were, not, compromised, in, vitro, or, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', wildtype, or, mutant, osteoblasts, were, cultured, with, megakaryocytes, from, 'GATA-1-', or, 'NF-E2-deficient', 'mice,', osteoblast, proliferation]), verbo([increased]), complemento([over, 3, -, to, 6, -, fold, by, a, mechanism, that, required, 'cell-to-cell', contact])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mechanism, of, 'IL-1beta', on, thrombocytosis, and, megakaryocytopoiesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, controversial])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', previous, 'reports,', we]), verbo([have]), domain, of, 'GATA-1,', a, random, phage, peptide, library, was, screened, with, recombinant, 'GATA-1', protein, and, the, sequence, of, a, selected, peptide, was, used, for, database, protein, sequence, retrieval])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, 'Nef']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['GATA-1', and, 'GATA-3', in, vitro, in, virtue, of, its, sequence, homology, with, pep5])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, 'GATA1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, in, acute, megakaryoblastic, leukaemia, in, 'Down\'s', syndrome])]). relacion([sujeto(['YY1', is, a, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([multifunctional, transcription, factor, that, is, involved, in, both, positive, and, negative, regulation, of, gene, expression, as, well, as, initiation, of, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', residues, 114, -, 193, ',', which, sequence, includes, a, portion, of, the, activation, region, and, most, of, the, 'Gly/Lys-rich', did, not, cause, further, decrease, of, the, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'N-terminus', of, the, activation, region, '(', 1, -, 78, /, 100, -, 106, ')', did, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([transactivation, activity, by, itself, as, well, as, synergistic, activity, with, an, erythroid, specific, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', complemento(['GATA-1', accumulates, and, cells, differentiate, into, erythrocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Additionally,', we, identified, two, 'GATA-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, within, the, 'c-myb', promoter, and, demonstrate, that, 'GATA-1', protein, binds, to, these, sites, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'GATA-1', represses, 'c-myb', expression, through, one, of, the, 'GATA-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, in, transient, transfection, experiments, and, this, requires, 'FOG-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', our, study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([evidence, for, a, direct, molecular, link, between, 'GATA-1', activity, and, 'c-myb', 'proto-oncogene', expression, during, terminal, red, cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', acquired, mutations, in, exon, 2, of, 'GATA1,', an, 'X-linked', gene, encoding, a, transcription, factor, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([megakaryocytic, 'differentiation,', were, described, in, 6, 'DS', patients, with, 'AMKL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mutations]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([the, synthesis, of, the, 'full-length', 'GATA1,', but, allow, the, synthesis, of, a, shorter, 'GATA1', protein, '(', 'GATA1s)', that, lacks, the, transactivation, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', test, whether, mutated, 'GATA1', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, initiation, of, clonal, megakaryoblastic, proliferation, or, in, the, progression, to, 'AMKL,', we, screened, 35, 'DS', patients, with, either, 'AMKL', or, 'TMD', and, 7, 'non-DS', children, with, 'AMKL', for, mutations, in, exon, 2, of, 'GATA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analysis', revealed, various, types, of, mutations, in, 'GATA1,', including, 'deletion/insertions,', splice, 'mutations,', and, nonsense, and, missense, point, 'mutations,', all, of, which]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([the, generation, of, 'full-length', 'GATA1,', but, preserve, the, translation, of, 'GATA1s'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, acquired, intrauterine, inactivating, mutations, in, 'GATA1', and, generation, of, 'GATA1s', cooperate, frequently, with, trisomy, 21, in, initiating, megakaryoblastic, 'proliferation,', but, are, insufficient, for, progression, to, 'AMKL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([reported, that, a, novel, 'c-Myc', binding, 'protein,', 'AMY-1,', stimulated, the, transcription, activity, of, 'c-Myc', and, was, translocated, from, the, cytoplasm, to, the, nucleus, in, a, 'c-Myc-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Sp1', in, both, cell, lines, and, 'GATA-1', only, in, 'K562', cells, were, identified, as, proteins]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, these, sites, by, a, mobility, shift, assay])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', it, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1', stimulated, 'AMY-1', expression, complemento([that, 'EDRF1', regulated, 'alpha-', and, 'gamma-globin', gene, synthesis, by, modulating, 'DNA-binding', activity, of, 'GATA-1', transcription, factor])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', sufficient, to, maintain, elliptical, cell, shape])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', a, threshold, 50, '%', or, less, of, the, normal, amount, of, 'beta1-tubulin', is]), verbo([required]), early, gonadal, development, and, sexual, 'differentiation,', and, 'FOG-1', at, later, fetal, 'stages,', while, 'GATA-1', executes, its, action, postnatally])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that,', in, contrast, to, the, hematopoietic, system, and, the, 'heart,', 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-4', do, not, use, 'FOG-1', and, 'FOG-2', respectively, as, their, only, cofactors, during, the, early, stages, of, testicular, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'N', finger]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([interaction, with, 'FOG-1,', a, cofactor, for, 'GATA-1,', and, also, modulates, 'DNA-binding', 'affinity,', notably, at, complex, or, palindromic, 'GATA', sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Strong', sequence, conservation, of, residues, facing, 'DNA']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, this, other, surface, may, also, have, an, important, role])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, a, syndrome, of, 'X-linked', thrombocytopenia, with, thalassemia, in, humans, is, caused, by, a, missense, mutation, '(', 'Arg216Gln)', in, the, 'GATA-1', 'N', finger])]). relacion([sujeto(['Compared', with, 'wild-type', 'GATA-1,', 'Arg216Gln', 'GATA-1', shows, comparable, affinity, to, single, 'GATA', sites, but]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([affinity, to, palindromic, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Arg216Gln', 'GATA-1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'FOG-1', similarly, with, 'wild-type', 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, residues, of, the, 'N', finger, of, 'GATA-1-facing', 'DNA', contribute, to, 'GATA-1', function, apart, from, interaction, with, the, cofactor, 'FOG-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is, also, the, first, example, of, 'beta-thalassemia', in, humans]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, a, mutation, in, an, erythroid, transcription, factor])]). reduction, of, all, blood, 'vessels,', while, the, complete]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, flt1, '(', 'VEGFR1)', leads, to, an, increased, number, of, hemangioblasts, and, a, disorganized, verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, formation, of, additional, vessels, only, in, sibling, 'larvae,', not, in, flk1, mutants])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, flk1, is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, proper, vasculogenesis, and, hematopoiesis, in, zebrafish, embryos])]). relacion([sujeto(['Children', with, 'Down', syndrome]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, 10, verbo([involved]), complemento([in, erythrocyte, and, megakaryocyte, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', sequencing, the, entire, coding, region, of, 'GATA-1,', a, 2, -, base, mutation, was, detected, that, results, in, a, single, amino, acid, substitution, '(', glycine, 208, to, 'serine)', within, a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([portion, of, the, 'N-terminal', zinc, finger, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'DNA', 'binding,', 'Gly208', of, 'GATA-1', is, involved, in, direct, interaction, with, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG),', a, cofactor, required, for, normal, megakaryocytic, and, erythroid, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, the, 'GATA-1-FOG', interaction, is, partially, disrupted, by, the, mutation, and, that, the, greatest, effect]), verbo([involves]), complemento([contact, with, the, 'FOG', zinc, finger, 9])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, help, describe, a, novel, mutation, of, 'GATA-1', in, humans, as, a]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'X-linked', 'thrombocytopenia,', and, they, confirm, the, vital, role, played, by, this, transcription, factor, during, in, vivo, megakaryocyte, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Patients', with, paroxysmal, nocturnal, hemoglobinuria, '(', 'PNH)']), verbo([have]), complemento([blood, cells, deficient, in, glycosyl, phosphatidylinositol, '(', 'GPI)-linked', proteins, owing, to, a, somatic, mutation, in, the, 'X-linked', 'PIGA', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([target]), complemento(['Piga', 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Breeding', of, 'GATA1-cre', '(', 'G)', transgenic, mice, with, mice, carrying, a, floxed, 'Piga', '(', 'L)', allele, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, high, embryonic, lethality])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GPI-linked', proteins, on, the, cell, surface, occurred, late, in, erythroid, 'differentiation,', causing, cells, deficient, in, 'GPI-linked', proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genetic', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, provided, rich, insights, into, the, molecular, and, transcriptional, regulation, of, megakaryocyte, differentiation, and, thrombopoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', putative, transcriptional]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, these, 'regulators,', including, the, rare, syndromes, of, inherited, thrombocytopenia, in, mice, and, man]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, refined, the, emerging, picture, of, megakaryocyte, maturation])]). 'hematopoiesis,', characterization, of, recurrent, chromosomal, translocations, in, human, leukemias]), verbo([provides]), complemento([an, added, dimension, to, the, molecular, underpinnings, of, megakaryocyte, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, previously, that, the, tyrosine, kinase, 'Lyn', is, involved, in, differentiation, signals, emanating, from, an, activated, erythropoietin, receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, 'Lyn']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, thyroid, hormone, 'receptor-interacting', protein, 1, '(', 'Trip-1),', a, transcriptional, regulator, associated, with, the, 'T(3)', 'receptor,', providing, a, link, between, the, 'Epo', and, 'T(3)', signaling, pathways])]). verbo([nuclear]), complemento([foci, shortly, after, 'Epo-induced', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'T(3)', stimulated, the, proliferation, relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', contains, two, zinc, 'fingers,', the, 'C-terminal', 'finger,', which, is, known, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['(', 'A/T)GATA(A/G)', motifs, in, 'DNA', and, the, 'N-finger,', which, is, important, for, interacting, with, 'co-regulatory', proteins, such, as, 'Friend', of, 'GATA', '(', 'FOG)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', now, show, 'that,', like, the, 'GATC', motifs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Experiments', with, mutant, 'GATA-1', proteins, confirm, the, importance, of, the, 'N-finger,', as, the, 'C-finger', is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, transactivation, from, 'GATC', sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently', four, naturally, occurring, mutations, in, 'GATA-1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, expression, and, may, participate, in, the, ontogenic, control, of, the, globin, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', a, combination, of, mouse, bacterial, artificial, chromosome, '(', 'BAC)', complemento([at, the, highest, levels, in, the, 'brain,', 'heart,', thymus, and, 'testicles,', whereas, low, levels, were, observed, in, the, 'kidney,', 'liver,', 'muscle,', and, lung])]). bisphosphate, and, also]), verbo([has]), complemento([lesser, activity, against, soluble, analogues, of, this, 'lipid,', inositol, 3, ',', 4, -, bisphosphate, and, inositol, 1, ',', 3, ',', 4, -, verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, absence, of, 4, -, 'Ptase', 'I', may, contribute, to, the, hyperproliferative, phenotype, of, 'GATA-1(-)', megakaryocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, 'NMR', spectroscopy, to, determine, the, first, structures, of, two, 'FOG', family, zinc, fingers, that, are, involved, in, 'protein-protein', 'interactions:', fingers, 1, and, 9, from, 'U-shaped'])]). relacion([sujeto(['[', 15, 'N,(1)H]-HSQC', titrations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, used, to, define, the, 'GATA', binding, surface, of, 'USH-F1,', and, comparison, with, other, 'FOG', family, proteins, indicates, that, the, recognition, mechanism, is, conserved, across, species])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', surface, of, 'FOG-type', fingers, that]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'GATA-1', overlaps, substantially, with, the, surface, through, which, classical, fingers, typically, recognize, 'DNA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, these, fingers, could, not, contact, both, 'GATA', and, 'DNA', simultaneously])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', results, from, 'NMR,', gel, 'filtration,', and, sedimentation, equilibrium, experiments]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, interactions, are, of, moderate, affinity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([via, its, 'KIX', domain, to, the, activation, domain, of, 'c-Myb', and, mediates, 'c-Myb-dependent', transcriptional, activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, the, 'C/H2', domain, of, 'CBP,', which, is, critical, for, the, acetyltransferase, 'activity,', also, directly]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, negative, regulatory, domain, '(', 'NRD)', of, 'c-Myb'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'CBP', acetylated, 'c-Myb', in, vivo, not, only, at, the, sites]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, this, study, but, also, at, the, 'p300-induced', acetylation, sites, reported, recently])]). relacion([sujeto(['Replacement', of, lysine, by, arginine, at, all, of, these, sites, dramatically]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, 'trans-activating', capacity, of, 'c-Myb'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, of, transcriptional, activation, assays, with, 'c-Myb', acetylation, site, mutants]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, acetylation, of, 'c-Myb', at, each, of, these, five, sites, synergistically, enhances, 'c-Myb', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', acetylation, of, 'c-Myb', by, 'CBP']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, 'trans-activating', capacity, of, 'c-Myb', by, enhancing, its, association, with, 'CBP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, 'PKLR', gene, responsible, for, pyruvate, kinase, '(', 'PK)-deficient', anaemia, are, mainly, located, in, the, coding, 'regions:', 11, are, in, the, splicing, sites, 'and,', 'recently,', three, mutations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, described, in, the, promoter, region])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', now]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, point, mutation, 'A-->G', on, nucleotide, 72, ',', upstream, from, the, initiation, codon, of, the, 'PKLR', 'gene,', in, four, 'Portuguese', 'PK-deficient', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mRNA, level, was, about, five, times, lower, than, in, normal, 'controls,', demonstrating, that, the, 'PKLR', gene, transcription, is, severely, 'affected,', most, probably, because, the, -, 72, 'A-->G', point, mutation, disables, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, erythroid, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', to, the, 'GATA-A', element])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'HEL', 'cells,', a, human, erythroleukemia, cell, 'line,']), verbo([express]), complemento([mainly, the, fetal, globin, gene, and, small, amount, of, the, embryonic, '(', 'epsilon)', globin, 'gene,', but, not, the, adult, '(', 'beta)', globin, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hydroxyurea,', a, small, organic, 'compound,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, successfully, used, to, treat, sickle, cell, anemia, and, 'beta-thalessaemia'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, demonstrated, that, the, growth, rate, of, 'HEL', cell, proliferation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, different, doses, of, hydroxyurea, '(', from, 50, 'mumol/L', to, 200, 'mumol/L)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', both, routine, 'RT-PCR', and, quantitative, 'PCR', 'analyses,', we, revealed, that, the, expression, of, 'beta-globin', gene, was, sharply]), verbo([activated]), complemento([and, 'alpha-globin', gene, was, almost, completely, silenced, when, 'HEL', cells, were, induced, for, 3, or, 5, days])]). relacion([sujeto(['Meanwhile,', 'gamma-globin', gene, was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([with, no, much, difference, between, induced, and, uninduced, 'HEL', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, demonstrated, that, the, expression, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E', 2, ',', which, were, two, of, the, most, important, transcription, factors, in, erythrocyte, 'development,', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([about, 3, folds, in, the, induced, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, induction, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E', 2, expression, by, hydroxyurea, might, lead, to, activation, of, the, adult, 'beta-globin', gene, through, some, pathways, of, signal, 'transduction,', 'therefore,', hydroxyurea, might, play, a, role, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', family, participates, in, the, initiation, of, megakaryocyte, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Pharmacologic', profiles, of, induction, and, inhibition, of, verbo([binding]), complemento([sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'aggregate,', the, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PKC-epsilon', specifically, participates, in, megakaryocytic, specifically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hematopoietic, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['Prior', gene, knockout, experiments, established, an, essential, role, for, 'GATA-1', in, red, recent, 'lineage-selective', gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([in, mice, that, establishes, critical, functions, for, 'GATA-1', in, controlling, megakaryocyte, growth, and, 'maturation,', and, complex])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', the, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1', bound, at, 5, a, is, a, 'strong,', proximal, repressor, of, 'HS2', enhancer, activity])]). 'DNA', independently])]). relacion([sujeto(['Solution', structure, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, the, 'DNA', is, bent, by, about, 15, degrees, in, the, complex, formed, with, 'G6'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'Notch', signal, transduction, pathway, is, a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([regulatory, system, that, controls, multiple, developmental, processes])]). from, the, 'Central', limit, theorem])]). relacion([sujeto(['Fli-1', is, a, 'proto-oncogene', which, is, rearranged, in, tumors]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, three, different, 'retroviruses,', relacion([sujeto(['Supershift', analysis, also, demonstrated, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, 'GATA-1', factor, to, the, 'GATA/EBS', dual, element])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Spi-1', and, 'GATA-1', might, play, a, key, role, in, the, regulation, of, 'Fli-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', production, of, red, blood, cells, activation, and, apoptosis, in, a, variety, of, cell, types])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, immature, erythroid, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([several, death, receptors, whose, ligands, are, produced, by, mature, erythroblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['Exposure', of, erythroid, progenitors, to, mature, erythroblasts, or, 'death-receptor', ligands, resulted, in, the]), verbo([triggering]), complemento([of, death, 'receptors,', indicating, that, there, is, regulatory, feedback, between, mature, and, immature, erythroblasts, through, 'caspase-mediated', 'caspase-inhibitory', proteins, or, 'caspase-resistant', 'GATA-1', in, erythroid, progenitors])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'GATA-2', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, relacion([sujeto(['However,', induction, of, 'GATA-2', activity, in, cells, cultured, in, 'IL-3', blocked, 'factor-dependent', 'self-renewal', but, not, 'factor-dependent', 'survival:', 'Cells', not]), verbo([require]), complemento([addition, of, exogenous, differentiation, growth, factors, such, as, 'G-CSF', or, 'GM-CSF', normally, required, to, induce, granulomonocytic, differentiation, of, could]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, -, 29, /, -, 24, 'GATA', motif, and, this, was, confirmed, by, the, observation, that, the, nuclear, protein, bound, to, the, motif, was, supershifted, an, important, role, in, the, induction, of, 'P4'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, in, erythroid, 'cells,', 'GATA-1', strongly, induces, the, expression, of, the, 'anti-apoptotic', protein, 'bcl-xL,', but, not, the, related, proteins, 'bcl-2', and, 'mcl-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Consistent', with, a, role, for, 'bcl-xL', in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['GATA-1-induced', erythroid, cell, 'survival,', in, 'vitro-differentiated', 'bcl-xL-/-', embryonic, stem, cells, fail, to, generate, viable, mature, definitive, erythroid, 'cells,', a, complemento([in, transcriptional, control, is, critical, to, establishing, which, proteins, mediate, 'cell-specific', gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', in, situ]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, these, sites, is, determined, by, the, accessibility, of, these, regulatory, regions, in, native, chromatin, and, the, availability, of, relevent, 'cell-specific', and, ubiquitous, 'factors,', in, vivo, footprinting, was, used, to, define, protein, 'DNA', interactions, in, human, globin, 'LCRs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', further]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, detection, of, protein, contacts, with, this, 'technique,', we, have, modified, the, dimethyl, 'sulfate-based', 'ligation-mediated', 'PCR', in, vivo, footprinting, procedure, to, permit, the, assessment, of, protein, binding, at, guanine, and, adenine, 'resides,', rather, than, exclusively, at, guanines])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'GA-LMPCR', in, vivo, footprinting]), verbo([provided]), complemento(['high-resolution', analysis, of, 'AP-1/NF-E2', elements, and, revealed, protein, contacts, at, sequences, that, are, not, coincident, with, previously, described, regulatory, motifs])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', comprehensive, discussion, of, this, modification, and, sample, illustrations, from, our, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, presented, to, demonstrate, the, enhanced, detection, and, resolution, obtained, with, this, procedure])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', reorganization]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, globin, locus, control, region, and, is, associated, with, normal, expression, of, the, 'beta-like', globin, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', determine, whether, it, is, possible, to, artificially]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, opening, of, the, chromatin, structure, of, a, minimal, 'beta-globin', 'promoter,', we, placed, a, 101, 'bp,', 'erythroid-specific', 'DNase', 1, hypersensitive, 'site-forming', element, '(', 'HSFE)', immediately, upstream, of, the, 'beta-globin', promoter, and, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', element, includes]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, 'NF-E2,', 'AP-1,', 'GATA-1', and, 'Sp-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'HSFE']), verbo([induced]), complemento([an, area, of, enhanced, 'DNase', 1, hypersensitivity, extending, from, the, transcriptional, start, site, to, -, 300, bp, of, the, artificial, promoter, and, significantly, increased, the, proportion, of, 'beta-globin', promoters, in, an, open, chromatin, configuration])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', remodeling, of, promoter, chromatin, structure, resulted, in, 3, -, fold]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'beta-globin', gene, transcription, and, 'induction,', and, inhibited, 'long-term', 'beta-globin', gene, silencing])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, a, relatively, small, 'cis-acting', element, is, able, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([remodeling, of, promoter, chromatin, structure, resulting, in, increased, 'beta-globin', gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Vertebrate', embryonic, hematopoiesis, is, a, complex, process, that]), verbo([involves]), complemento([a, number, of, cellular, 'interactions,', notably, those, occurring, between, endothelial, and, blood, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cell', transplantation, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, that, the, endocardial, defect, in, cloche, is, 'cell-autonomous:', 'wild-type', cells, can, form, endocardium, in, mutant, 'hosts,', but, mutant, cells, never, contribute, to, the, endocardium, in, 'wild-type', or, mutant, hosts])]). relacion([sujeto(['Alternatively,', cloche, could, be]), verbo([required]), complemento(['cell-autonomously', in, the, blood, cells, themselves])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, transplanted, 'wild-type', cells, were, much, more, likely, than, mutant, cells, to, contribute, to, circulating, blood, in, a, 'wild-type', host])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, cloche, is]), verbo([required]), complemento(['cell-autonomously', in, blood, cells, for, their, differentiation, 'and/or', proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', we, assessed, early, expression, of, the, erythropoietic, gene, 'gata-1', in, transplant, 'recipients,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, mutant, blastomeres, were, as, likely, as, 'wild-type', blastomeres, to, give, rise, to, 'gata-1-expressing', cells, in, a, 'wild-type', host])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together,', these, two, sets, of, data, argue, that, cloche, is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento(['cell-autonomously', for, the, differentiation, of, red, blood, 'cells,', as, assayed, by, 'gata-1', 'expression,', but, rather, for, their, proliferation, 'and/or', 'survival,', as, assayed, by, their, contribution, to, circulating, blood])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, transplanted, 'wild-type', cells, were, less, likely, to, express, 'gata-1', in, a, mutant, environment, than, in, a, 'wild-type', 'one,', suggesting, that, cloche, also, acts, 'non-autonomously', in, red, blood, cell, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', cloche, appears, to, be]), verbo([required]), complemento([in, erythropoiesis, cell, 'non-autonomously', at, a, step, prior, to, 'gata-1', 'expression,', and, 'cell-autonomously', subsequently])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', replaced, enhancer, is, propagated, to, the, 5, '\'', 'LTR', upon, integration, into, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([cell, genome])]). relacion([sujeto(['Packaging', of, viral, 'particles,', integration, into, the]), an, effective, strategy, to]), verbo([target]), complemento([expression, of, a, retroviral, transgene, to, a, specific, progeny, of, transduced, hematopoietic, stem, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', a, number, of, recent]), verbo([reports]), complemento([have, implicated, particular, 'ZnFs', in, the, mediation, of, 'protein-protein', interactions])]). by, electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assay, '(', 'EMSA)', the, level, of, 'GATA-1', 'DNA-binding', activity, in, nuclear, extracts, prepared, from, the, human, erythroleukaemic, cell, 'line,', complemento([but, not, uninduced, 'K562', extracts, with, phosphatase, prior, to, 'EMSA', weakened, the, binding, 'activity,', suggesting, that, the, increase, in, 'GATA-1', binding, following, 'EMSA', of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([extracts, prepared, from, 'K562', and, 'MEL', cells, untreated, or, incubated, with, okadaic, 'acid,', a, phosphatase, 'inhibitor,', 'GATA-1', binding, was, seen, to, increase, with, 'K562', 'cells,', whereas, with, 'MEL', cells, there, was, no, change, in, 'GATA-1', binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overall', the, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, level, of, 'GATA-1', phosphorylation, increases, after, the, induction, of, 'K562,', but, not, 'MEL', 'cells,', where, 'GATA-1', is, already, highly, phosphorylated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', phosphorylation]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, binding, affinity, of, 'GATA-1', for, a, canonical, binding, site])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', is, a, transcription, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, development, of, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, identification, of, distinct, the, notochord])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', unique, 'A/T-rich', sequence, '(', 5, '\'', -, 'AAAAAGTAAAAA-GTAAAAAAGTAAAAAG-3),', referred, to, as, the, 'AGTA', 'repeat,', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, silencer, region, of, the, pumpkin, ascorbate, oxidase, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', cDNA, for, protein, '(', 'AOBP)', that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'AGTA', retardation, analysis, indicated, that, 'AOBP']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'AGTA', repeat, through, the, 'Dof/MOA', domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Metal', 'chelators,', 1, ',', 10, -, phenanthroline, and, 'EDTA,', specifically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'DNA', binding, of, 'AOBP,', indicating, that, metal, coordination, plays, an, important, role, in, 'DNA', binding, of, 'AOBP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, 'Dof/MOA', domain]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, 'zinc/DNA-binding', domain, in, 'AOBP'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Gel', retardation, analysis, understanding, in, unique, and, unexpected, ways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, importance, of, 'GATA-1', in, both, primitive, and, definitive, hematopoietic, lineages]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, in, 'vivo,', the, precise, roles, played, by, 'GATA-1', during, definitive, hematopoiesis, have, not, yet, been, clarified])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, complemento([introduced, a, method, that, separates, hematopoietic, progenitors, and, differentiated, cells, produced, in, this, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['Closer', examination, showed, that, the, complemento([isolated, and, characterized, a, human, glutathione, transferase, 'A4', '(', 'hGSTA4)', subunit, gene, from, a, yeast, artificial, chromosome, containing, several, other, glutathione, in, all, the, tissues, 'tested,', although, in, low, 'amounts,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, this, subunit, may, be, ubiquitously, expressed])]). relacion([sujeto(['Zinc', fingers, are]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, small, protein, domains, that, bind, to, specific, 'DNA', sequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently', 'however,', zinc, fingers, from, a, number, of, 'proteins,', in, particular, the, 'GATA', family, of, transcription, 'factors,']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, implicated, in, specific, 'protein-protein', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', erythroid, protein, 'GATA-1', contains, two, zinc, 'fingers:', the, 'C-finger,', which, is, sufficient, for, 'sequence-specific', 'DNA-binding,', and, the, 'N-finger,', which, appears, both, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento(['DNA-binding', and, to, interact, with, other, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([expressed, and, purified, the, 'N-finger', domain, and, investigated, its, involvement, in, the, 'self-association', of, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, this, domain, does, not, homodimerize, but, instead, makes, intermolecular, contacts, with, the, 'C-finger,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'GATA', dimers, are, maintained, by, reciprocal, 'N-finger-C-finger', contacts])]). studies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanisms', of, platelet, production, and]), verbo([release]), complemento([by, mammalian, megakaryocytes, are, poorly, understood])]). these, structures]), verbo([have]), complemento([largely, been, recognized, in, cultured, cells, and, there, has, been, no, correlation, between, thrombocytopoiesis, in, vivo, and, proplatelet, produce, proplatelets, very, rarely])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings, establish, a, significant, correlation, between, thrombocytopoiesis, and, proplatelet, formation, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, latter, represents, a, physiologic, mechanism, of, platelet, release])]). relacion([sujeto(['Transcriptional', initiation, in, fibroblasts, is]), verbo([regulated]), a, 'receptor-like', 'membrane-anchored', protein, and, a, secreted, protein, consisting, only, of, the, ectodomain])]). relacion([sujeto(['c-Fos', and, a, 'T1', 'enhancer,', which]), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, been, identified, to, be, essential, for, 'T1', expression, in, 'fibroblasts,', were, not, required, for, calcium, 'ionophore-mediated', 'T1', gene, upregulation])]). finger, 'DNA-binding', domain, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'Cys', residue, uniquely, conserved, in, the, putative, loop, might, negatively, regulate, the, binding, to, 'DNA'])]). other, less, differentiated, erythroid, progenitor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Leukemic', cells, stain, positively, with, an, 'erythroid-associated']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([transcription, factor, '(', 'GATA-1)'])]). relacion([sujeto([ras, transgene, expression, 'is,', 'however,', detected, only, in, normal, bone, marrow, and, leukemic, tissues, of, transgenic, 'mice,', and, 5, '\'', development]), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, shown, to, depend, upon, the, expression, of, the, 'lineage-restricted', 'trans-acting', factor, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', predicted, roles, for, this, factor, during, early, 'development,', 'GATA-1-deficient', cells, in, chimeric, mice, and, embryonic, stem, cell, cultures, mature, to, a, late, proerythroblast, stage, and]), verbo([express]), complemento([at, least, certain, genes, that, normally, are, thought, to, be, regulated, by, 'GATA-1', '(', including, erythroid, 'Krüppel-like', factor, '[', 'EKLF]', and, the, erythropoietin, '[', 'Epo]', 'receptor)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', in, an, alternate, approach, to, test, the, function, of, 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, expressed, together, with, the, 'Epo', receptor, in, myeloid, 'FDCW2', cells, and, the, resulting, effects, on, 'cytokine-dependent', proliferation, and, erythroid, gene, expression, have, been, assessed])]). relacion([sujeto(['Upon', expression, of, 'GATA-1', at]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['levels,', proliferation, in, response, to, 'Epo,', 'interleukin-3', '(', 'IL-3),', and, stem, cell, factor, was, attenuated, and, endogenous, 'GATA-1,', 'EKLF', and, 'betamaj-globin', gene, expression, was, activated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', in, 'FDCW2', ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, showed, that, cells, with, a, high, expression, level, of, 'WT1', tended, to, develop, into, leukemia, and, that, 'WT1', contributed, to, leukemogenesis, 'mesoderm,', from, which, blood, islands, are, derived])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([utilized, 'Aspergillus', nidulans, as, a, model, system, for, the, characterization, of, the, major, vertebrate, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, achieved, both, by, analysing, the, function, of, murine, 'GATA-1', directly, and, by, using, direct, gene, replacement, to, introduce, chimaeric, 'areA::GATA-1', derivatives, at, the, areA, 'locus,', which, encodes, a, 'GATA', factor, involved, in, regulating, nitrogen, metabolism, in, 'A'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'GATA-1', shows, only, limited, function, when]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'A'])]). relacion([sujeto(['nidulans,', the, 'C-terminal', 'GATA', 'DNA-binding', domain, can, replace, the, native, 'GATA', domain, of, 'AREA', and]), verbo([retain]), complemento([near, 'wild-type', function])]). constructs, in, 'vivo,', leading, to, a, general, loss, of, activation])]). relacion([sujeto([nidulans, as, a, model, system, for, the, molecular, and, genetic, characterization, of, heterologous, 'GATA', factors, while, also]), verbo([providing]), complemento([insights, into, native, 'Aspergillus', regulatory, components])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, regulatory, mechanisms, underlying, the, erythroid, gene, 'regulation,', it, is, essential, to, understand, how, individual, transcription, factors, contribute, to, the, regulation, of, specific]), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', and, how, these, erythroid, transcription, factor, genes, are, regulated, in, turn])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', key, issues, of, mammalian, development]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, addressed, by, examining, the, activities, controlling, the, prototype, transcription, 'factor,', 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcriptional, regulation, of, 'GATA-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, intensively, 'investigated,', thereby, leading, to, the, identification, of, its, developmental, 'stage-specific', regulatory, sequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['Loss-of-function', mutant, 'animals,', combined, with, specific, marking, of, the, primitive, and, definitive, erythroid, lineages]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, shed, new, insight, into, how, 'GATA-1', activity, is, required, in, vivo, at, specific, developmental, stages])]). relacion([sujeto(['Procedures']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, developed, for, complemento([set, out, to, test, a, model, for, 'tissue-specific', gene, expression, that, relies, on, the, early, replication, of, expressed, genes, to, sequester, limiting, activating, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', an, erythroid, cell, 'line,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([tested, the, changes, in, the, 'DNA', binding, activity, of, the, 'lineage-restricted', transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', through, the, cell, cycle])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1', activity, is, low, in, 'G1,', peaks, in, 'mid-S', 'phase,', and, then, decreases, in, 'G2/M'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([activities, of, two, ubiquitous, transcription, 'factors,', 'Oct1', and, 'Sp1,', remain, high, in, 'G2/M'])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', protein, and, mRNA, vary, in, a, similar, manner, through, the, cell, 'cycle,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, expression, of, the, gene, or, the, stability, of, its, message, is, regulated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', a, number, of, transcription, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, control, of, the, cell, cycle, or, 'DNA', replication, have, been, shown, to, peak, in, 'S', 'phase,', this, is, the, first, example, of, a, 'lineage-restricted', transcription, factor, displaying, 'S', 'phase-specific', 'DNA', binding, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', interpretation, of, these, data]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, model, in, which, the, peak, in, 'GATA-1', 'DNA', binding, amplifies, the, effect, of, early, replication, on, the, activation, of, 'erythroid-specific', genes, at, the, same, time, as, preventing, activation, of, 'non-erythroid', genes, containing, 'GATA-responsive', elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['During', 15, days, of, treatment, of, 'K562', cells, with, sodium, 'phenylacetate,', we, observed, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, cellular, hemoglobin, concentration, with, a, similar, increase, in, the, expression, of, 'gamma-globin', mRNA])]). relacion([sujeto(['Likewise,', the, level, of, expression, of, the, erythroid, transcription, factors, 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2,', 'NF-E2,', 'SCL', and, 'RBTN2,', all]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, untreated, 'K562', 'cells,', did, not, increase, during, sodium, phenylacetate, induced, erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factors, 'Evi-1', and, 'c-myb,', known, to, inhibit, erythroid, 'differentiation,', did, not, decrease])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', conclude, that, sodium, phenylacetate, treatment, of, 'K562', cells]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['gamma-globin', mRNA, and, induces, cell, maturation, as, judged, by, morphology, without, affecting, the, expression, of, the, erythroid, transcription, 'factors,', some, of, which, are, known, to, be, involved, in, the, regulation, of, 'beta-like', globin, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Acute', megakaryoblastic, leukemia, '(', 'AML-M7)', and, transient, myeloproliferative, disorder, in, 'Down\'s', syndrome, '(', 'TMD)', are, characterized, by, rapid, growth, of, abnormal, blast, cells, which]), verbo([express]), complemento([megakaryocytic, markers])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', blast, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento(['lineage-specific', transcription, factors, such, as, 'GATA-1', common, to, these, lineages, and, frequently, express, 'erythroid-specific', mRNAs, such, as, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['Much', of, our, understanding, of, the, process, by, which, enhancers]), verbo([activate]), complemento([transcription, has, been, gained, from, 'transient-transfection', studies, in, which, the, 'DNA', is, not, assembled, with, histones, and, other, chromatin, proteins, as, it, is, in, the, cell, nucleus])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', minichromosomes, replicate, and, are]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, stable, copy, number, in, human, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, the, minichromosomal, 'epsilon-globin', gene]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, presence, of, 'beta-globin', 'LCR', elements, in, 'cis,', as, is, the, case, for, the, chromosomal, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', minichromosomes, with, a, '(', 'mu)LCR', or, 'DNase', 'I-hypersensitive', site, 2, '(', 'HS2)', which, actively]), verbo([transcribe]), complemento([the, 'epsilon-globin', 'gene,', the, nucleosome, 'remodeling,', as, well, as, formation, of, the, 'HS2', structure, 'itself,', depended, on, the, presence, of, the, 'NF-E2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([motif, in, 'HS2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', simple, availability, of, erythroid, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([recognize]), complemento([these, motifs, is, insufficient, to, allow, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', observations, are, consistent, with, the, idea, that, one, role, of, the, 'beta-globin', 'LCR', is, to]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([promoters, free, of, nucleosomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', restricted, structural, change, observed, upon, transcriptional, activation, may, indicate, that, the, 'LCR', need, only, make, a, specific, contact, with, the, proximal, gene, promoter, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'X-linked', mouse, mutant, 'phenotype,', tattered, '(', 'Td),', is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, prenatal, lethality, of, males, and, has, been, mapped, previously, to, the, proximal, region, of, the, mouse, 'X', chromosome])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, a, refined, position, for, 'Td', and, demonstrate, that, it, lies, in, the, approximately, 0.9, -, cM, interval, between, 'DXMit55', and, 'Xkh'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Histological', analysis, of, dorsal, skin, taken, from, 5, -, 'day-old', heterozygous, animals, revealed, that, the, mutation, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, patches, of, hyperkeratinzation, in, the, epidermis, and, in, the, hair, 'follicles,', accompanied, by, a, mild, inflammatory, infiltrate, in, the, underlying, dermis])]). relacion([sujeto(['DNase', 'I', hypersensitive, sites, are, thought, to, represent, 'nucleosome-free', regions, of, 'DNA', which, are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, 'trans-acting', factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Of', the, four, hypersensitive, sites, only, 'HS2']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, transcriptional, enhancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, examine, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, an, erythroid, protein, to, its, site, within, 'HS2', in, chromatin, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['NF-E2']), verbo([binds]), complemento([two, tandem, 'AP1-like', sites, in, 'HS2', which, form, the, core, of, its, enhancer, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, that, when]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, in, 'vitro-reconstituted', 'chromatin,', 'NF-E2', forms, a, 'DNase', 'I', hypersensitive, site, at, 'HS2', similar, to, the, site, observed, in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'NF-E2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([in, vitro, results, in, a, disruption, of, nucleosome, structure, which, can, be, detected, 200, bp, away])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, hematopoietic, 'cell-specific', 'subunit,', 'p45,', is, necessary, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, chromatin, but, not, to, naked, 'DNA'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interaction', of, 'NF-E2', with, its, site, in, 'chromatin-reconstituted', 'HS2', allows, a, second, erythroid, 'factor,', 'GATA-1,', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([its, nearby, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Lastly,', nucleosome, disruption, by, 'NF-E2', is, an, 'ATP-dependent', 'process,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, involvement, of, 'energy-dependent', nucleosome, remodeling, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'myb-ets-containing', 'ME26', virus]), verbo([causes]), complemento([erythroleukemia, in, mice, by, a, novel, mechanism, involving, the, inappropriate, activation, of, 'erythroid-specific', genes, in, hematopoietic, precursor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, the, 'ME26', viral, protein, can, transactivate, the, 'GATA-1', promoter, in, transient, transactivation, assays, carried, out, in, mouse, fibroblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mouse, 'GATA-1', 'promoter,', whose, activity, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, the, adult, globin]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([cells, displayed, more, extensive, footprints, than, the, fetal, globin, expressing, cells, in, the, 3, '\'', regulatory, sequences, of, both, the, complemento([that, the, bulk, of, 'protein-DNA', interactions, that, underlies, the, developmental, control, of, globin, genes, takes, place, in, the, 'gamma-', and, 'beta-globin', gene, 'promoters,', 'trans-acting', factors, in, 'vitro,', including, 'GATA-1', and, members, of, the, 'Ets', family])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([with, low, affinity, to, a, unique, 'GATA', motif, at, -, 70, in, the, 'MPL', 'promoter,', and, destruction, of, this, site, yields, only, a, modest, decrease, in, expression, level, in, 'HEL', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ets', proteins, also]), verbo([bind]), complemento([with, low, affinity, to, two, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', comprehensive, physical, contig, of, yeast, artificial, chromosomes, '(', 'YACs)', and, templates])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1,', mainly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, erythroid, 'differentiation,', has, been, shown, to, regulate, the, genes, specifically, expressed, in, complemento([but, their, 'S', phase, was, greatly, elongated, and, their, 'G1', and, 'G2/M', phases, were, 'reduced,', impairing, substantially, their, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1-expressing', fibroblasts]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['D1,', 'A,', and, 'B1', cyclin, mRNAs, under, conditions, of, serum, starvation, or, at, 'confluence,', whereas, '(', 'DOX)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Subsequent', stimulation, of, heme, and, globin, synthesis]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, differential, quantitative, expression, of, hemoglobins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', 'ACLA', and, 'DOX']), verbo([increased]), complemento([both, the, expression, of, 'gamma-globin', and, porphobilinogen, deaminase, 'mRNAs,', striking, differences, were, regulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', 'ACLA']), verbo([induces]), complemento([an, increase, either, in, the, binding, capacity, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2', or, in, the, accumulation, of,
