erythroid, genes, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([only, with, 'ACLA', 'treatment,', and, 2])]). relacion([sujeto([although, cytotoxicity, of, both, 'ACLA', and, 'DOX', is, certainly, dependent, on, 'DNA', 'intercalation,', regulation, of, differentiation, processes, by, these, two, drugs]), verbo([involves]), complemento([distinct, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', 'Drosophila', 'S2', 'cells,', the, actions, of, 'GATA1,', 'Sp1,', and, erythroid, 'Kruppel-like', factor, '(', 'EKLF)', at, these, elements, within, model, erythroid, promoters]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, assessed])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', each, promoter, studied, '(', erythroid, pyruvate, 'kinase,', glycophorin, 'B,', and, a, murine, betamaj, 'globin-derived', 'construct,', 'GCT)', 'Sp1', and, 'EKLF', each]), verbo([activated]), complemento([transcription, despite, differences, in, 'CACC', element, 'sequence,', 'orientation,', and, positioning])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 'GATA1']), verbo([acted]), complemento([in, apparent, cooperativity, with, 'Sp1', at, the, pyruvate, kinase, 'promoter;', with, 'EKLF', at, the, betamaj, 'globin-derived', 'GCT', 'promoter;', and, with, either, 'Sp1', or, 'EKLF', at, the, glycophorin, 'B', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'GATA1', may, functionally]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, each, of, these, 'Krüppel-like', factors, depending, on, promoter, 'context;', and, at, the, 'GCT', 'promoter,', transcriptional, activation, by, 'GATA1', and, 'EKLF', was, &, 'gt;', or, =, 10, -, fold, higher, than, levels, attributable, to, additive, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', possibility, that, interactions, between, these, activators, may, be, direct, was, supported, by, the, specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'baculoviral-expressed', 'EKLF', to, 'GATA1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([underlines, the, likelihood, that, discrete, roles, exist, for, 'Sp1', and, 'EKLF', in, erythroid, gene, 'activation,', and, supports, a, mechanism, of, direct, cooperativity, for, 'EKLF', and, 'GATA1', as, coregulators])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', regions, are, hypersensitive, to, 'DNase', 'I', in, nuclei, of, cells, that]), verbo([express]), complemento(['MPL:', the, promoter, and, a, portion, of, intron, 6])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', fragment, can]), verbo([bind]), complemento([several, transacting, factors, in, 'vitro,', including, 'GATA-1', and, members, of, the, 'Ets', family])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([with, low, affinity, to, a, unique, 'GATA', motif, at, -, 70, in, the, 'MPL', 'promoter,', and, destruction, of, this, site, yields, only, a, modest, decrease, in, expression, level, in, human, erythroleukemia, '(', 'HEL)', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ets', proteins, also]), verbo([bind]), complemento([with, low, affinity, to, two, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', we, describe, other]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, binding, sites, that, may, be, involved, in, the, 'cell-type-specific', expression, of, 'MPL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', present, study, examines, genetic, 'mechanism(s)', possibly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, observed, 3, '\'', -, 'azido-3\'-deoxythymidine', '(', 'AZT)-induced', inhibition, of, globin, gene, transcription, by, evaluating, the, direct, phenotypic, erythroid, effects, of, 'AZT', on, 'erythroid-specific', transcription, factors, which, regulate, globin, gene, promoters])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GATA-1', or, 'NFE-2', to, its, consensus, sequence, was, decreased, in, the, presence, of, 'AZT', reaching, a, maximum, inhibition, as, early, as, 24, h, after, 'AZT', treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', extracts, from, butyric, 'acid-induced', 'K562', cells, treated, with, an, 'IC50', concentration, of, 'AZT', exhibited, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'GATA-1', and, 'NFE-2', binding, by, approximately, 30, '%', and, 35, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 2, '\'', ',', 3, '\'', -, dideoxycytidine, which]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([cell, growth, without, affecting, hemoglobin, 'synthesis,', had, no, effect, on, binding, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'NFE-2', factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Northern', blot, analysis, revealed, a, 25, '%']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([by, 'AZT', in, 'GATA-1', mRNA, 'steady-state', levels, at, 24, h, and, this, inhibitory, effect, was, maintained, until, 72, h, after, drug, addition])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', similar]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'NFE-2', mRNA, 'steady-state', levels, was, observed, at, 72, h, after, 'AZT', treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'AZT', inhibition, of, erythroid, differentiation, is, subsequent, to, a, decrease, of, nuclear, factors, gene, expression, which, affect, their, 'DNA', binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Differentiation', of, murine, erythroleukemia, '(', 'MEL)', cells]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, hexamethylene, bisacetamide, '(', 'HMBA)', and, 'DMSO', was, inhibited, by, several, structurally, unrelated, nitric, oxide, '(', 'NO)-releasing', agents, and, two, 'membrane-permeable', cGMP, analogues])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', the, effect, of, the, 'NO-releasing', agents, was, augmented, by, a, cGMP, phosphodiesterase, 'inhibitor,', at, least, some, of, their, effect, appeared, to, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, activation, of, cytosolic, guanylate, cyclase])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'HMBA-treated', 'cells,', the, 'NO-releasing', agents, and, cGMP, analogues, reduced, 'beta-globin', and, 'delta-aminolevulinate', synthetase, mRNA, expression, and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, late, 'down-regulation', of, 'c-myb', mRNA, that, is, required, for, 'HMBA-induced', differentiation, of, 'MEL', 'cells;', the, regulation, of, 'c-myc', mRNA, was, not, changed, by, the, drugs])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', 'run-off', analyses, showed, that, the, drugs]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'HMBA-induced', changes, in, 'beta-globin', and, 'c-myb', transcription, 'rates,', and, transient, transfection, of, a, reporter, gene, construct, demonstrated, that, the, drugs, inhibited, 'HMBA-inducible', enhancer, function, of, the, 'alpha-globin', control, 'region,', which, contains, binding, sites, for, the, erythroid, transcription, factors, 'NF-E2', and, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'NO-releasing', agents, and, cGMP, analogues, largely]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['HMBA-induced', increases, in, 'DNA', binding, of, 'NF-E2,', whereas, 'DNA', binding, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'SP-1', was, not, affected])]). relacion([sujeto(['Retrovirus-mediated', gene, transfer, was, used, to, study, the, effects, of, dysregulated, expression, of, the, 'zinc-finger', transcription, 'factor,', 'GATA-1,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, required, for, erythropoiesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['At', 16, weeks, 'posttransplant,', animals, that, received, cells, transduced, by, the, 'GATA-1', virus]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([a, lower, white, blood, cell, '(', 'WBC)', count, and, absolute, neutrophil, count, '(', 'ANC)', and, a, higher, red, blood, cell, '(', 'RBC)', count, than, control, animals, that, received, cells, transduced, with, a, virus, containing, a, neor, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythropoiesis', was]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([in, 'GATA-1', and, control, animals, by, phlebotomy])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', animals]), verbo([required]), complemento([more, extensive, phlebotomy, to, reach, a, hematocrit, less, than, 25, and, their, hematocrit, returned, to, normal, levels, sooner, than, control, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, dysregulated, expression, of, 'GATA-1', in, primitive, hematopoietic, cells, enlarges, the, pool, of, 'epo-responsive', erythroid, progenitor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', major, subpopulations, were, 'identified:', '(', 1, ')', 'CD33+CD42b+', cells, with, platelet, peroxidase, 'activity,', the, commitment, of, which, to, megakaryocytic, lineage, was, supported, by, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'GATA-1', 'mRNA;', '(', 2, ')', 'CD33+CD34+CD7+CD4+', cells, with, immature, 'ultrastructure,', which, could, be, either, immature, megakaryocytic, or, myeloid, cells, with, aberrant, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mixed', colonies, containing, megakaryocytes, and, 'monocyte/macrophages', in, the, peripheral, blood]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([the, presence, of, progenitors, common, to, these, subpopulations])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'GATA-1']), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([a, consensus, motif, present, in, regulatory, regions, of, numerous, 'erythroid-expressed', genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, differentiation, of, 'GATA-1-', embryonic, stem, cells, gives, rise, to, a, population, of, committed, erythroid, precursors, that, exhibit, developmental]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([and, death])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', process, occurs, despite, normal, expression, of, all, known, 'GATA']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, 'examined,', including, the, erythropoietin, 'receptor,', and, independent, of, detectable, accumulation, of, the, tumor, suppressor, protein, p53])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', in, addition, to, its, established, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([genes, that, define, the, erythroid, 'phenotype,', 'GATA-1', also, supports, the, viability, of, red, cell, precursors, by, suppressing, apoptosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, illustrate, the, multifunctional, nature, of, 'GATA-1', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, mechanism, by, which, other, hematopoietic, transcription, factors, may, ensure, the, development, of, specific, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, binding, of, the, nuclear, protein, 'HMG-I', to, the, human, 'gamma-globin', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'HMG-I', binds, preferentially, to, the, more, 3, '\'', of, a, pair, of, 'GATA', motifs, in, the, verbo([bound]), complemento([by, 'HMG-I', results, in, overexpression, of, 'gamma-globin', in, adult, red, blood, cells, '(', 'HPFH)', and, 'up-regulation', of, the, 'gamma-globin', promoter, in, in, complemento([in, the, formation, of, multiprotein, complexes, that, regulate, globin, gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', mouse, 'WASP', 'gene,', the, homolog, of, the, gene, mutated, in, 379, ',', two, overlapping, motifs, for, 'YY1', and, 'GATA', around, -, 269, and, a, 'GATA', motif, around, -, 208, and, we, have, analyzed, their, function, during, development, by, studying, relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', multiple, 'proteins,', including, 'GATA-1,']), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, the, formation, of, the, epsilon, gene, repressor, complex, that, may, disrupt, the, verbo([require]), complemento([the, upstream, locus, control, region, '(', 'LCR)', for, proper, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, 5, '\'', 'HS4', as, a, model, to, study, the, formation, of, these, 'HSs'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previously,', we, identified, a, 101, bp, element, that, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, formation, of, this, 'HS'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', element]), verbo([binds]), complemento([six, proteins, in, vitro])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', now]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, mutational, analysis, of, the, 'HS4', 'HS-forming', element, '(', 'HSFE)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', analysis, indicates, that]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, the, hematopoietic, transcription, factors, 'NF-E2', and, 'GATA-1', are, required, for, the, formation, of, the, characteristic, chromatin, structure, of, the, 'HS', following, stable, transfection, into, murine, erythroleukemia, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Similarly', arranged, 'NF-E2', and, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, are, present, in, the, other, 'HSs', of, the, human, 'LCR,', as, well, as, in, the, homologous, mouse, and, goat, sequences, and, the, chicken, 'beta-globin', enhancer])]). relacion([sujeto([2, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, in, cases, of, papillary, renal, cell, tumors, arising, in, males])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, study, two, cell, lines, derived, from, this, tumor, type]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, used, to, indicate, the, breakpoint, region, on, the, 'X', chromosome])]). relacion([sujeto(['Both', cell, lines]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, translocation, in, addition, to, other, rearrangements, and, one, is, derived, from, the, first, female, case, to, be, reported, with, the, 't(X;1)(p11'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Fluorescence', in, situ, hybridization, '(', 'FISH)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, used, to, position, 'YACs', belonging, to, contigs, in, the, 'Xp11'])]). relacion([sujeto([2, region, the, position, of, the, breakpoint, in, both, cell, lines, was]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([as, 'follows:', 'Xpter-->Xp11'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([isolated, and, characterized, the, 5, '\'', -, flanking, region, of, the, gene, for, human, ferrochelatase, '(', 'HFC),', the, last, enzyme, of, the, heme, biosynthetic, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recognition', sites, for, the, ubiquitous, 'Sp1', family, of, transcription, 'factors,', as, well, as, for, the, 'erythroid-specific', 'trans-acting', factors, 'NF-E2', and, 'GATA-1', were, 'found,', and]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, regulatory, proteins, to, these, elements, was, analyzed, by, in, vitro, 'DNase', 'I', protection, assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', elimination, of, a, repressor, sequence, lying, between, the, minimal, promoter, and, the, 'erythroid-specific', elements, resulted, in, high, levels, of, expression, in, human, erythroleukemic, 'K562', cells, only, when, the, cis, elements]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2', were, 'present,', suggesting, that, the, activity, of, these, factors, is, regulated, by, a, downstream, repressor, in, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'DNA-binding', domain, of, the, erythroid, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', consists, of, two, closely, 'related,', but, distinct, 'zinc-fingers', which, are, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([among, the, members, of, the, growing, family, of, 'GATA-like', factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'DNA-binding', domain, of, the, human, 'GATA-1', '(', 'F1F2)', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([as, a, 'histidine-tagged', fusion, protein, in, 'Escherichia', coli])]). relacion([sujeto(['F1F2', displayed, 'GATA-1', specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([activity, toward, its, 'DNA', recognition, sequences, within, the, hypersensitive, site, 3, of, the, human, locus, control, region, and, the, human, 'gamma-globin', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'GATA-1', protein, purified, from, 'K562', 'nuclei,', the, recombinant, 'F1F2']), verbo([bound]), complemento([also, the, 'CCAAT-box', region, of, the, human, 'gamma-globin', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', we, demonstrated, that, a, 'DNA-binding', 'protein(s)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, transcriptional, repression, of, the, rat, serine, dehydratase, gene, in, fetal, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, a, 'GAT(A/T)', motif, is, the, target, sequence, for, the, 'DNA-binding', protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['Rat', 'GATA-1']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([as, a, 'GST-fusion', protein, in, 'E'])]). relacion([sujeto([coli]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'GAT(A/T)', motif, in, the, serine, dehydratase, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Northern', analysis, show, that, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-4', mRNAs, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, fetal, hepatocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, normal, development, of, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', is, also]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, other, hemopoietic, 'cells,', suggesting, that, it, might, be, initially, activated, in, a, multipotent, progenitor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Epo', dependent, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento(['hemoglobin,', high, levels, of, 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2', and, 'NF-E2', p45, 'mRNAs,', and, are, positive, for, stem, cell, antigen, 2, '(', 'Sca-2)', and, the, early, myeloid, marker, 'ER-MP12'])]). relacion([sujeto(['IL-3', dependent, cells, can, be, derived, from, 'Epo', dependent, 'lines,', and, are, 'hemoglobin-,', 'Sca-2-', and, 'ER-MP12-negative,']), verbo([have]), complemento([low, 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2', p45, mRNA, 'levels,', and, express, myeloid, markers, 'Mac-1,', 'F4/80', and, 'Gr-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Brief', treatment, of, 'Epo', dependent, cells, with, myeloid, growth, factors, '(', plus, 'Epo)']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, induction, of, 'Mac-1,', 'F4/80', and, 'Gr-1,', concomitant, with, the, disappearance, from, most, cells, of, 'Sca-2,', 'ER-MP12', and, 'GATA-1', driven, 'T', antigen, nuclear, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, immortalized, 'Epo', dependent, cells]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, property, of, a, progenitor, capable, of, differentiation, towards, either, the, erythroid, or, myeloid, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', cells, initiate, transcription, of, a, proportion, of, 'GATA-1', 'RNA', molecules, at, an, upstream, 'promoter,', previously, known, to, be]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([only, in, testis, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'tal-1', 'gene,', which, is, frequently]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, human, 'T', cell, acute, leukemias, '(', 'T-ALLs),', codes, for, a, protein, of, the, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', family, '(', 'b-HLH)', and, potentially, a, transcription, factor])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', human, and, murine, hematopoiesis, 'tal-1', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, the, differentiation, of, the, 'erythroid,', megakaryocytic, and, mastocytic, cell, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, 'tal-1', appears, to, be, comodulated, with, that, of, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', 'gene,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, 'GATA-1', protein, may, regulate, the, 'tal-1', gene, activity, in, these, hematopoietic, lineages])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', get, further, insights, into, the, molecular, mechanisms, that, control, 'tal-1', 'expression,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([isolated, 5, '\'', sequences, of, the, murine, gene, and, compared, them, to, their, human, counterparts])]). relacion([sujeto([gene, segment, -, 122, to, +, 1, ')', contains, two, 'GATA-motifs', '(', at, -, 65, and, -, 33, ')', and, one, 'SP-1', consensus]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, '(', -, 59, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mobility', shift, assays, demonstrate, that, 'GATA', proteins, are, able, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, both, 'GATA-motifs', in, a, sequence, specific, 'fashion,', but, with, different, efficiencies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover', transfection, studies, show, that, the, 'GATA-1', protein, directly]), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['tal-1', transcription, by, interacting, with, the, -, 122, /, +, 1, 'fragment,', defined, as, a, minimal, promoter, in, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutagenesis', of, the, promoter, establishes, that, the, -, 33, 'GATA-binding', site, present, in, this, fragment, is, critical, for, 'tal-1', expression, in, erythroid, 'cells,', but, by, itself, does, not]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, full, promoter, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Indeed,', further, mutations, show, that, the, second, -, 65, 'GATA-binding', site, and, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([motif, for, 'SP1', '(', -, 59, ')', significantly, contribute, to, the, overall, activity, of, the, proximal, 'tal-1', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altogether,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, 'GATA-1', cooperates, with, the, transcription, factor, 'SP1', to, mediate, the, 'erythroid-specific', expression, of, the, 'tal-1', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', order, to, elucidate, the, role, of, 'c-myb', gene, in, erythroid, differentiation, of, 'K562', cell]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, hemin, '(', 'Hm)', and, erythropoietin, '(', 'Epo),', we, constructed, recombinant, plasmid, that, could, produce, antisense, myb, 'RNA', after, induction, with, dexamethasone])]). relacion([sujeto(['During', treatment, with, 'Hm,', 'K562', cells, constitutively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['c-myb', 'mRNA,', and, 50, '%', of, them, began, to, synthesize, hemoglobin, '(', 'Hb)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, antisense, myb, 'RNA', reduced, the, amount, of, 'c-myb', 'mRNA,', and, the, percentage, of, 'Hb-synthesizing', cells, was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([to, 20, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, constitutive, expression, of, 'c-myb', mRNA, is, necessary, for, 'Hm-induced', 'differentiation,', and, that, a, decrease, in, the, amount, of, 'c-myb', mRNA, induced, by, antisense, myb, 'RNA', expression, suppresses, 'Hm-induced', differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', amount, of, 'c-myb', mRNA, in, 'K562', cells, was, reduced, during, the, differentiation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'Epo'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, 'GATA-1', mRNA, was, almost, constant, during, 'Hm-induced', 'differentiation,', but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([during, 'Epo', treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', is, an, essential, factor, for, the, transcriptional, activation, of, 'erythroid-specific', 'genes,', and, is, also, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, discrete, subset, of, cells, bordering, the, seminiferous, epithelium, in, tubules, of, the, murine, testis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', examining, normal, and, 'germ-line', defective, mutant, 'mice,', we, show, here, that, 'GATA-1', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([only, in, the, 'Sertoli', cell, lineage, in, mouse, testis])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1', expression, in, 'Sertoli', cells, is]), verbo([induced]), complemento([concomitantly, with, the, first, wave, of, 'spermatogenesis,', and, 'GATA-1-positive', cells, are, uniformly, distributed, among, all, tubules, during, prepubertal, testis, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, number, of, 'GATA-1-positive', cells, declines, thereafter, and, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([only, in, the, peripheral, zone, of, seminiferous, tubules, in, stages, 'VII,', 'VIII', and, 'IX', of, spermatogenesis, in, the, adult, mouse, testis])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', virtually, every, 'Sertoli', cell, in, mutant, 'W/Wv,', 'jsd/jsd', or, cryptorchid, mice, '(', all, of, which, lack, significant, numbers, of, germ, 'cells)']), verbo([expresses]), complemento(['GATA-1,', thus, showing, that, the, expression, of, this, transcription, factor, is, negatively, controlled, by, the, maturing, germ, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', is, a, developmental, 'stage-', and, spermatogenic, 'cycle-specific', regulator, of, gene, expression, in, 'Sertoli', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythroid', 'Kruppel-like', factor, '(', 'EKLF)', is, an, 'erythroid-specific', transcription, factor, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([a, 'CACCC', motif, found, in, the, human, 'beta-globin', gene, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, the, promoter, of, the, 'EKLF', gene, and, identified, binding, sites, for, the, transcription, factors, 'GATA-1', and, 'CCAAT-binding', 'Protein', 1, '(', 'CP1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, both, types, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, are, required, for, full, 'activity,', and, that, the, 'GATA', motif, at, -, 60, is, essential])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'EKLF', promoter, can, be, directly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, nonerythroid, cells, in, cotransfection, experiments, by, forced, expression, of, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'EKLF', is, dependent, on, 'GATA-1', for, its, expression, and, lies, downstream, 'of,', or, coincident, 'with,', 'GATA-1', in, a, regulatory, hierarchy, in, erythroid, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', element, is, localized, 26, kb, upstream, of, the, mouse, embryonic, globin, gene, '(', 'Hba-x)', and, is, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([at, the, protein, binding, sites])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', three, of, four, 'CACC', boxes, and, one, 'GATA-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['site,', identified, in, the, human, 'alpha-LCR,', are, not, conserved, in, the, mouse])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', we, identified, a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([putative, transcription, factor, binding, sequence, '(', 'AAAGG)', that, may, play, an, important, role, in, 'LCR', function])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', human, 'beta-globin', 'Locus', 'Control', 'Region', '(', 'LCR)']), verbo([has]), complemento([two, important, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', experiments, demonstrated, that, a, 1.9, kb, fragment, containing, the, 5, '\'', 'HS', 2, site]), verbo([confers]), complemento(['position-independent', expression, in, transgenic, mice, and, enhances, human, 'beta-globin', gene, expression, 100, -, fold])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further', analysis, of, this, region, demonstrates, that, multiple, sequences, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, maximal, enhancer, 'activity;', deletion, of, 'SP1,', 'NF-E2,', 'GATA-1', or, 'USF', binding, sites, significantly, decrease, 'beta-globin', gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', no, single, site, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'position-independent', transgene, 'expression;', all, mice, with, 'site-specific', mutations, in, 5, '\'', 'HS', 2, express, human, 'beta-globin', mRNA, regardless, of, the, site, of, transgene, integration])]). relacion([sujeto(['Apparently,', multiple, combinations, of, protein]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, in, 5, '\'', 'HS', 2, are, sufficient, to, prevent, chromosomal, position, effects, that, inhibit, transgene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', a, series, of, 5, '\'', flanking, restriction, fragments, linked, to, a, reporter, 'gene,', a, 83, -, bp, fragment, that, includes]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, the, transcription, factors, 'GATA-1', and, 'Sp-1', gave, low, levels, of, 'erythroid-specific', 'activity,', and, a, 256, -, bp, fragment, that, 'includes,', in, 'addition,', two, sites, for, the, putative, 'CACCC-binding', protein, gave, the, highest, level, of, 'erythroid-specific', transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['DNase', 'I', footprinting, showed]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, a, constitutive, factor, to, the, proximal, 'CACCC-binding', 'site,', and, deletion, or, mutation, of, this, site, significantly, reduced, the, overall, expression, while, maintaining, 'tissue-specificity'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', 0.8, -, kb, restriction, fragment, spanning, the, distal, site]), verbo([caused]), complemento([approximately, a, 'four-fold', rise, in, transcription, from, the, endogenous, or, a, heterologous, promoter, in, 'MEL', cells, independent, of, its, orientation, and, up, to, 1.5, -, fold, rise, in, 'CB-5', 'cells,', but, it, was, inactive, in, 'COS-1', cells, that, were, cotransfected, with, an, expression, plasmid, encoding, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, show, that, '(', 1, ')', basal, activity, as, well, as, tissue, specificity, of, the, 'EpoR', promoter, can, be, accounted, for, by, its, interaction, with, 'GATA-1,', and, '(', 2, ')', upstream, sites]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, strength, of, the, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, the, distal, 'DNase', 'I', hypersensitive, site, and, the, corresponding, enhancer, activity, in, 'MEL', cells]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, role, for, this, element, in, 'stage-specific', transcriptional, control])]). relacion([sujeto(['All-trans', retinoic, acid, '(', 'RA)', is, an, important, morphogen, in, vertebrate, 'development,', a, normal, constituent, in, human, adult, blood, and, is, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, control, of, cell, growth, and, differentiation, in, acute, promyelocytic, leukemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, effects, of, 'RA', on, normal, hematopoiesis, by, using, early, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells, '(', 'HPC)', stringently, purified, from, adult, peripheral, blood])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', clonogenetic, fetal, calf, 'serum-supplemented', '(', 'FCS+)', or, -, nonsupplemented, '(', 'FCS-)', culture, treated, with, saturating, levels, of, 'interleukin-3', '(', 'IL-3)', 'granulocyte-macrophage', 'colony-stimulating', factor, '(', 'GM-CSF)', and, erythropoietin, '(', 'Ep)', '(', combined, with, 'c-kit', ligand, in, 'FCS(-)-culture', 'conditions),', 'RA']), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, dramatic, 'dose-dependent', shift, from, erythroid, to, granulomonocytic, colony, 'formation,', the, latter, colonies, being, essentially, represented, by, granulocytic, clones])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', shift, is, apparently, not]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, a, recruitment, 'phenomenon,', because, in, 'FCS+', 'culture,', the, total, number, of, colonies, is, not, significantly, modified, by, 'RA', addition])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'FCS-', 'liquid-suspension', culture, supplemented, with, saturating, 'Ep', level, and, 'low-dose', 'IL-3/GM-CSF,', adult, 'HPC', undergo, unilineage, erythropoietic, 'differentiation:', 'Here', 'again,', treatment, with, 'high-dose', 'RA']), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, shift, from, the, erythroid, to, granulocytic, differentiation, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', then, analyzed, the, expression, of, the, master, 'GATA1', 'gene,', which, encodes, a, finger, transcription, factor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, normal, erythroid, 'development;', addition, of, 'RA', to, 'HPC', stimulated, into, unilineage, erythropoietic, differentiation, in, liquid, culture, caused, a, virtually, complete, inhibition, of, 'GATA1', mRNA, induction])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'RA', directly]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, erythroid, differentiation, program, at, the, level, of, early, adult, 'HPC,', and, may, lead, to, a, shift, from, the, erythroid, to, granulocytic, differentiation, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two']), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['loci,', 'DXHX674h', and, 'DXHX679h,', which, map, to, 'Xp11'])]). relacion([sujeto([21, on, the, human, 'X', chromosome, short, 'arm,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, positioned, between, the, loci, for, proteolipid, protein, '(', 'Plp)', and, the, 'E1a', subunit, of, pyruvate, dehydrogenase, '(', 'Pdha1)', in, the, distal, region, of, the, mouse, 'X', chromosome, using, 'Mus', musculus, x, 'Mus', spretus, interspecific, backcrosses])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', 'data,', together, with, previous, comparative, mapping, studies, on, another]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([locus, '(', 'DXF34)', and, the, locus, that, encodes, the, erythroid, transcription, factor, '(', 'GATA1),', reveal, that, loci, that, map, to, the, proximal, region, of, the, human, 'X', chromosome, short, arm, lie, in, four, different, regions, of, the, mouse, 'X', chromosome, and, that, the, human, and, mouse, 'X', chromosomes, contain, a, minimum, of, eight, conserved, segments])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythropoietin', '(', 'Epo)', is, a, cytokine, which, specifically]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([differentiation, and, proliferation, of, erythroid, progenitor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, 'Epo', receptor, expressed, in, interleukin, 3, -, dependent, lymphoid, 'Ba/F3', cells, transmits, both, differentiation, and, growth, signals])]). relacion([sujeto(['Epo', stimulation, of, these, cells]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, activation, of, transcription, 'and/or', translation, of, the, 'erythroid-specific', transcription, factors, 'GATA-1', and, 'SCL,', followed, by, the, accumulation, of, both, 'alpha-', and, 'beta-globin', chains])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, expression, and, activation, of, the, 'Epo', receptor, regulates, 'erythroid-specific', gene, expression, and, might, play, a, role, in, determining, a, cell, lineage, in, vivo, and, that, 'GATA-1', and, 'SCL', may, exert, their, effects, after, 'Epo', binds, to, its, receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', was, further]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, chimeric, receptors, composed, of, extracellular, domains, of, 'Epo', receptor, and, cytoplasmic, domains, of, interleukin, 2, or, interleukin, 3, receptors, could, also, induce, 'erythroid-specific', gene, expression, in, 'Ba/F3', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Four', distinct, factors, in, extracts, from, murine, erythroleukemia, '(', 'MEL)', cells]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, the, human, 'beta-globin', gene, promoter, 'CAAT', 'box:', 'CP1,', 'GATA-1,', and, two, novel, 'factors,', denoted, a, and, 'b,', one, of, which, is, highly, inducible, in, the, 'MEL', system])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'CAAT', element, was, very, unstable, '(', 'half-life', &, 'lt;', 1, 'min),', whereas, bindings, of, 'a,', 'b,', and, 'CP1', were, comparatively, 'stable,', with, 'half-lives', of, 18, ',', 19, ',', and, 3.5, 'min,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['Stable', transfections, of, 'MEL', cells, showed, that, in, the, presence, of, the, 'beta-globin', locus, control, region, '(', 'LCR),', the, 'wild-type', 'CAAT', 'box,', a, mutant, which]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'GATA-1', with, increased, stability, over, the, normal, 'sequences,', and, a, mutant, which, bound, 'a,', 'b,', and, 'CP1', specifically, could, all, stimulate, transcription, greater, than, ninefold, over, that, induced, by, a, null, 'CAAT', mutation, in, both, uninduced, and, terminally, differentiated, 'MEL', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', mutant, which]), verbo([bound]), complemento([the, a, and, b, factors, specifically, gave, only, a, twofold, stimulation, of, promoter, 'activity,', and, this, lower, activity, correlated, with, a, decrease, in, the, stability, of, binding, of, the, b, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'CP1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([alone, did, not, stimulate, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, in, the, context, of, the, 'wild-type', 'beta-globin', 'CAAT', element, the, b, factor, stimulates, transcription, directed, by, the, 'LCR', in, 'MEL', 'cells,', although, the, 'LCR', can, also, function, through, more, stable, 'GATA-1-binding', sequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', in, 'K562', 'cells,', the, 'wild-type', 'beta-globin', 'CAAT', box, alone, was, unable, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([gene, expression, directed, by, the, 'LCR', and, high, levels, of, transcription, were, obtained, only, upon, inclusion, of, more, upstream, 'beta-globin', promoter, sequences])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', use, of, recombinant, 'adeno-associated', virus, '(', 'rAAV)', vectors]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, new, strategy, to, investigate, the, role, of, specific, regulatory, elements, and, 'trans-acting', factors, in, globin, gene, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', vector, also, contains, the, phosphotransferase, gene, that]), verbo([confers]), complemento([resistance, to, neomycin, '(', 'NeoR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['HS2', region, mutations, within, the, 'NF-E2', motifs]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['NF-E2', binding, while, preserving, 'AP-1', binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Another', set, in, the, 'GATA-1', motif]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([binding, of, the, factor])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', uninduced, 'K562', 'cells,', 'mut-NFE2', clones]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['A', 'gamma*', mRNA, at, the, same, level, as, the, 'WT', 'clones,', compared, with, a, lack, of, 'A', 'gamma*', signal, in, the, '(', -, ')', 'HS2', clones])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', hemin, induction, of, 'mut-NFE2', clones, did, not, result, in, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, 'A', 'gamma*', signal, above, the, level, seen, in, uninduced, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mut-GATA1', clones]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([the, 'A', 'gamma*', mRNA, at, the, same, level, as, 'WT', clones, in, both, uninduced, and, induced, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'GATA-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, this, site, does, not, appear, to, be, required, for, the, enhancing, function, of, 'HS2', in, this, context])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, formation, of, terminally, differentiated, erythroid, cells]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, require, the, presence, of, a, functional, 'GATA-1', gene, in, 'vivo,', the, role, of, this, transcription, factor, and, other, members, of, the, 'GATA', family, at, earlier, stages, of, erythroid, differentiation, is, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', the, expression, of, 'GATA-1,', 'GATA-2,', and, 'GATA-3']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, examined, in, enriched, peripheral, blood, progenitors, before, and, after, culture, in, a, 'well-characterized', liquid, culture, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['Erythroleukemic', cell, lines]), verbo([express]), complemento([little, or, no, 'GATA-3,', but, high, levels, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['When', they, are]), verbo([induced]), complemento([to, display, the, terminal, erythroid, 'phenotype,', little, change, in, the, level, of, 'GATA-1', is, detected, but, a, significant, decline, in, the, levels, of, 'GATA-2', is, observed, commensurate, with, the, degree, of, maturation, achieved, by, the, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Enrichment', of, erythroid, progenitors, from, peripheral, blood]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, selection, of, cells, that, express, both, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'GATA-1', upregulation, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, both, the, initiation, and, the, maintenance, of, the, erythroid, 'program,', but, that, these, two, processes, appear, to, be, under, separate, regulatory, control])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, dynamic, influence, the, progression, to, specific, hematopoietic, pathways])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ets', family, proteins]), verbo([activate]), complemento([transcription, via, binding, to, the, 'GGAA', core, sequence, located, in, the, 'promoter/enhancer', elements, of, many, cellular, and, viral, genes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', promoter, of, the, chicken, 'GATA-1', gene, contains, multiple, ets]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, '(', 'EBS),', two, of, them, are, present, in, palindromic, form])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'GATA-1', promoter]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, activated, by, the, 'E26', virus])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([analysed, whether, the, palidromic, 'EBS', of, the, chicken, 'GATA-1', promoter, is, a, target, for, binding, and, activation, by, members, of, the, cellular, ets, gene, family, products])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', results, herein, indicate, that, both, 'EBS', in, the, palindrome, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'DNA-binding', because, mutations, in, either, site, reduces, the, activity, by, at, least, 95, '%'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'ETS1', to, the, 'EBS', palindrome, is, dramatically, stabilized, in, the, presence, of, a, specific, monoclonal, antibody, whose, epitope, maps, between, amino, acid, positions, 240, -, 260])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', each, of, the, single, sites, 'bind,', the, efficiency, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento([is, extremely, low])]). 'ABF-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([established, the, essential, nature, of, 'GATA-1', during, both, primitive, and, definitive, erythropoiesis])]). complemento([not, been, possible, heretofore])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, assay]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, dramatic, loss, of, red, cell, 'production,', it, should, be, of, human, 'T', acute, lymphoblastic, leukemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Tal-1', gene, encodes, a, putative, transcription, factor, with, a, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', domain, and, is, known, to, be, control, elements])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', mutation, of, 'T', to, 'C', at, position, -, 175, in, the, 'gamma-globin', promoter, 'GATA', 'site,']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, relacion([sujeto(['Increasing', the, level, of, 'SCL', expression, in, two, independent, 'MEL', lines, '(', 'F4-6', and, 'C19,', a, 745, 'derivative)', and, 'K562', cells]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, rate, of, spontaneous, '(', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,']), verbo([induced]), complemento([differentiation, was, inhibited, in, 'MEL', transfectants, expressing, either, antisense, 'SCL', cDNA, or, a, mutant, 'SCL', lacking, the, basic, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', experiments]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'SCL', gene, can, be, a, target, for, the, erythroid, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', and, that, the, 'SCL', gene, product, serves, as, a, positive, regulator, of, erythroid, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'CACCC', region, and, the, region, containing, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, protein, 'GATA-1', behaved, as, activator, domains])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', studies, on, the, regulation, of, this, gene, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([helpful, information, on, the, mechanisms, controlling, cell, specificity, and, differentiation, in, this, lineage])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', region, extending, from, nucleotides, -, 414, to, -, 554, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, extremely, important, for, the, promoter, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['Deletion', of, this, region, results, in, a, 70, '%']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([of, the, promoter, 'activity,', as, measured, in, 'CAT', assays])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', region]), verbo([has]), complemento([the, properties, of, an, enhancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['It', is, able, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([a, heterologous, 'promoter,', in, a, 'distance-', and, 'orientation-independent', 'manner,', in, both, megakaryocytic, and, erythroid, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', enhancer, contains]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, nuclear, factors, and, mutation, of, these, 'sites,', individually, or, 'together,', abolish, the, enhancer, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['These']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factors, are, present, in, megakaryocytic, and, erythroid, cell, 'lineages,', but, they, are, absent, in, the, other, tested, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['One', of, the, 'sites,', named, domain, 'D,', contains, a, 'TTATC', motif, that, may]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA1,', active, in, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Development', of, definitive, '(', fetal, 'liver-derived)', red, cells, is, blocked, by, a]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([mutation, in, the, gene, encoding, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', used, in, vitro, differentiation, of, analysis, of]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, mutations, in, the, whole, animal])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', principal, regulator, of, erythropoiesis, is, the, glycoprotein, within, its, promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, isolated, promoter, retains, cell, specificity, exhibited, by, the, intact, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Full', promoter, activity]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, presence, of, proximal, 'CACCC', box, sequences, and, an, 'upstream,', double, 'GATA', motif, that, binds, a, single, 'GATA-1', molecule, in, an, asymmetric, fashion])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', in, vivo, footprinting, of, mouse, erythroleukemic, cells, we, detect, protein]), verbo([binding]), complemento([in, vivo, to, both, 'cis-elements'])]). relacion([sujeto(['On', the, basis, of, these, findings, we, propose, that, a, positive, feedback, loop]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, 'GATA-1', serves, two, complementary, 'functions:', maintenance, of, the, differentiated, state, by, locking, the, promoter, into, an, &, 'quot;on"', 'state,', and, programming, the, progressive, 'T', alpha, 1, -, 'T', alpha, 4])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this]), verbo([report]), complemento([we, describe, the, identification, and, characterization, of, a, novel, human, 'cDNA,', 'hGATA-3', that, binds, to, the, 'T', alpha, 3, element, of, the, human, 'TCR', alpha, enhancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['hGATA-3', contains, a, zinc, finger, domain, that, is, highly, related, to, the, relacion([sujeto(['We', identified, 14, 'anti-RelA-serum-enriched', genomic, regions, that, correlated, with, 17, 'TNF-inducible', 'genes,', such, as, 'COX2,', 'Egr-1,', 'Jun,', 'IκBα', and, 'IL6,', largely, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Yin', 'Yang1', '(', 'YY1),', a, target, gene, for, 'NF-κB,', is, hyperexpressed, in, most, 'MM', tumor, cells, obtained, from, human, 'patients,', exhibits, constitutive, nuclear, 'localization,', and, is, essential, for, survival, of, 'MM', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanistically,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, novel, 'YY1-RelA', complex, 'formation,', which, is, essential, to, transcriptionally, repress, a, proapoptotic, gene, 'Bim'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', both, xenograft, models, for, human, myeloma])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', a, novel, 'RelA-YY1', transcriptional, repression, complex, is, an, attractive, drug]), verbo([target]), complemento([in, 'MM'])]). relacion([sujeto(['STZ-induced', 'fat-1', mice, did, not, develop, hyperglycemia, compared, with, 'wild-type', 'mice,', and, &, 'beta;-cell', destruction, was]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([as, evidenced, by, lack, of, histological, pancreatic, damage, or, reduced, insulin, level])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', prevention, of, &, 'beta;-cell', destruction, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, no, proinflammatory, cytokine, induction, '(', tumor, necrosis, 'factor-α,', 'interleukin-1β,', inducible, nitric, oxide, 'synthase)', in, the, 'pancreas,', a, decreased, 'NF-κB,', and, increased, 'IκB', pancreatic, protein, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'fat-1-treated', 'mice,', proinflammatory, 'arachidonic-derived', mediators, as, prostaglandin, 'E₂', and, 12, -, hydroxyeicosatetraenoic, acid, were]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([and, the, 'anti-inflammatory', lipoxin, 'A₄', was, detected])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ubiquitin', 'carboxyl-terminal', hydrolase, 'L1', '(', 'UCH-L1)', is, a, deubiquitinating, enzyme, that, plays, a, regulatory, role, in]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([proteins, for, proteasomal, degradation])]). relacion([sujeto(['UCH-L1', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, neurons, and, has, been, demonstrated, to, promote, cell, viability, and, maintain, neuronal, integrity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Reduced', 'UCH-L1', levels]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, observed, in, various, neurodegenerative, 'diseases,', and, expression, of, 'UCH-L1', can, rescue, synaptic, dysfunction, and, memory, deficits, in, 'Alzheimer\'s', 'Disease', model, mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['UCH-L1', expression, have, not, been, determined])]). relacion([sujeto(['Expression', of, 'NF-κB']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['UCH-L1', gene, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', activation, of, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', 'NF-κB', is, an, important, signaling, module, in, inflammatory, 'response,', our, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, possibility, that, inflammation, might, compromise, neuronal, functions, via, the, interaction, of, 'NF-κB', and, 'UCH-L1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', better, understanding, of, the, 'NF-κB-regulated', 'UCH-L1', transcription, will]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, to, the, role, of, inflammatory, responses, in, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, and, 'Parkinson\'s', disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Analysis', of, the, microarray, data, indicated, that, copper]), verbo([modulates]), complemento([multiple, signal, transduction, 'pathways,', including, those, mediated, by, 'NF-kappaB'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Luciferase', 'assays,', quantitative, reverse, transcription, 'real-time', 'PCR,', and, chemical, inhibition, in, 'HepG2', cells, validated, the, microarray, results, and, confirmed, that, 'NF-kappaB', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'stress-inducible', concentrations, of, copper])]). relacion([sujeto(['Quercetin,', 'apigenin,', and, luteolin]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([cytotoxicity, in, 'RIN', cells, and, attenuated, the, decrease, of, 'glucose-stimulated', insulin, secretion, in, islets, by, 'IL-1beta', and, 'IFN-gamma'])]). relacion([sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, these, 'mechanisms,', gene, expression, profiling, was, examined, in, 'C2C12', myoblasts, devoid, of, 'NF-kappaB', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', even, in, proliferating, 'myoblasts,', the, absence, of, 'NF-kappaB']), verbo([caused]), complemento([the, pronounced, induction, of, several, myofibrillar, 'genes,', suggesting, that, 'NF-kappaB', functions, as, a, negative, regulator, of, 'late-stage', muscle, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', several, myofibrillar, promoters, contain, predicted, 'NF-kappaB']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['sites,', functional, analysis, using, the, 'troponin-I2', gene, as, a, model, revealed, that, 'NF-kappaB-mediated', repression, does, not, occur, through, direct, 'DNA', binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', inducers, of, 'NF-kappaB']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['YY1', expression, in, multiple, cell, 'types,', genetic, ablation, of, the, 'RelA/p65', subunit, of, 'NF-kappaB', in, both, cultured, cells, and, adult, skeletal, muscle, correlated, with, reduced, 'YY1', transcripts, and, protein])]). relacion([sujeto(['NF-kappaB', regulation, of, 'YY1', occurred, at, the, transcriptional, 'level,']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, direct, binding, of, the, 'p50/p65', heterodimer, complex, to, a, new, mechanism, by, which, 'NF-kappaB', functions, in, myoblasts, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([skeletal, muscle, differentiation])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([thyrotrope, hypertrophy, and, hyperplasia, and, develop, thyrotrope, adenoma])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, cell, proliferation, is, 'increased,', but, the, expression, of, most, stem, cell, markers, is, unchanged])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', &, 'alpha;-subunit', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, secretion, of, the, glycoprotein, hormone, &, 'beta;-subunits,', and, mutants, exhibit, elevated, expression, of, many, genes, involved, in, the, unfolded, protein, 'response,', consistent, with, dilation, and, stress, of, the, endoplasmic, 'Islet', 1, ',', and, those, that, stimulate, 'proliferation,', including, 'Nupr1,', 'E2f1,', and, 'Etv5'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Stable', expression, of, 'Tceal5', in, a, pituitary, progenitor, cell, 86, such, putative, promoters, in, the, 'Xenopus', genome])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, five, of, these, sites, are, 'A-form', in, 'solution,', bind, to, complemento(['receptor-specific', coactivator])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', negative, feedback, mechanism, of, 'thyroid-stimulating', hormone, '(', 'TSH,', or, 'thyrotropin)', expression, in, the, are, switched, on, in, the, presence, of, a, ligand])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', 'recently,', 'cell-based', assays]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, the, 'Zn-finger', region, of, 'GATA2', '(', 'GATA2-Zf)', has, an, important, role, in, 'down-regulation', of, the, thyrotropin, gene, '(', 'TSHβ)', by, liganded, thyroid, hormone, receptor, '(', 'TR)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', to, the, erythroid, 'commitment,', differentiation, and, the, development, of, 'AEL'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', vitro, studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Gata2', modulates, adipocyte, differentiation, and, mesenchymal, stem, cell, '(', 'MSC)', proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', systematically, determine, the, in, vivo, functions, of, 'Gata2', in, the, 'MSC', lineage, commitment, and, 'development,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, three, mouse, models, in, which, 'Gata2', is, specifically, deleted, in, 'MSCs,', 'adipocytes,', or, osteoblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['During', the, 'MSC', expansion, 'stage,', 'Gata2']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([proliferation, and, attenuates, 'differentiation;', thereby, 'Gata2', loss, in, 'MSCs', results, in, enhanced, differentiation, of, both, adipocytes, and, osteoblasts])]). relacion([sujeto(['During', the, differentiation, 'stage,', 'Gata2', also, plays, 'MSC-independent', roles, to, impede, lineage, 'commitment;', 'hence,', 'Gata2']), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, adipocyte, or, osteoblast, lineages, also, augments, adipogenesis, and, 'osteoblastogenesis,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento(['Gata2', as, a, crucial, rheostat, of, 'MSC', fate, to, control, osteoblast, and, adipocyte, lineage, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['Heterozygous', germline, mutations, in, the, zinc, finger, transcription, factor, 'GATA2']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, shown, to, underlie, a, range, of, clinical, 'phenotypes,', including, 'Emberger', 'syndrome,', a, disorder, characterized, by, lymphedema, and, predisposition, to, myelodysplastic, 'syndrome/acute', myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'MDS/AML)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', 'well-defined', roles, in, 'hematopoiesis,', the, functions, of, 'GATA2', in, the, lymphatic, vasculature, and, the, mechanisms, by, which, 'GATA2', mutations, result, in, lymphedema]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, characterized])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, a, molecular, explanation, for, lymphedema, predisposition, in, a, subset, of, patients, with, germline, 'GATA2', mutations])]). relacion([sujeto(['Specifically,', we, demonstrated, that, 'Emberger-associated', 'GATA2', missense, mutations, result, in, complete]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GATA2', 'function,', with, respect, to, the, capacity, to, regulate, the, transcription, of, genes, that, are, important, for, lymphatic, vessel, valve, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', identified, a, putative, enhancer, element, upstream, of, the, key, lymphatic, transcriptional, regulator, 'PROX1', that, is]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, 'GATA2,', and, the, transcription, factors, 'FOXC2', and, 'NFATC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Emberger', 'GATA2', missense, mutants, had, a, profoundly, reduced, capacity, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([this, element])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conditional', 'Gata2', deletion, in, mice, revealed, that, 'GATA2', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, both, development, and, maintenance, of, lymphovenous, and, lymphatic, vessel, valves])]). relacion([sujeto(['Heterozygous', familial, or, sporadic, 'GATA2', mutations]), verbo([cause]), complemento([a, multifaceted, 'disorder,', encompassing, susceptibility, to, 'infection,', pulmonary, 'dysfunction,', 'autoimmunity,', lymphoedema, and, malignancy])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', often, healthy, in, 'childhood,', carriers, of, defective, 'GATA2', alleles, develop, progressive]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, mononuclear, cells, '(', dendritic, 'cells,', 'monocytes,', 'B', and, 'Natural', 'Killer', 'lymphocytes),', elevated, 'FLT3', 'ligand,', and, a, 90, '%', risk, of, clinical, 'complications,', including, progression, to, myelodysplastic, syndrome, '(', 'MDS)', by, 60, years, of, age])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', appear, to]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['haplo-insufficiency,', which, is, known, to, impair, haematopoietic, stem, cell, survival, in, animal, models])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'CXXC5', gene, encodes, a, transcriptional, activator, with, a, 'zinc-finger', 'domain,', and, high, expression, in, human, acute, myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'AML)', cells, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, adverse, prognosis])]). relacion([sujeto(['High', 'CXXC5', expression, was, also]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, high, mRNA, expression, of, several, relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', 'CXXC5', knockdown, in, human, 'AML', cell, lines]), verbo([caused]), complemento([significantly, increased, expression, of, the, potential, tumor, suppressor, gene, 'TSC22', and, genes, encoding, the, growth, factor, receptor, 'KIT,', the, cytokine, 'Angiopoietin', 1, and, the, 'selenium-containing', glycoprotein, 'Selenoprotein', 'P'])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA2', mutations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, in, up, to, 10, '%', of, those, with, congenital, neutropenia, 'and/or', aplastic, anemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Heterozygous', mutations, appear, to]), verbo([cause]), complemento([haploinsufficiency, due, to, either, protein, dysfunction, or, uniallelic, reduced, transcription])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bone', marrow, transplantation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, successful, for, both, hematopoietic, and, pulmonary, alveolar, proteinosis, repair])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recently,', mutations, of, the, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 2, '(', 'GATA2)', gene, were, identified, in, acute, myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'AML)', patients, with, 'CEBPA', double, mutations, '(', 'CEBPA', '(', 'double-mut)),', but, the, interaction, of, this, mutation, with, other, genetic, alterations, and, its, dynamic, changes, during, disease, progression, remain, to, be, determined])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', 14, different, missense, 'GATA2', 'mutations,', which, were, all, clustered, in, the, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['N-terminal', zinc, finger, 1, 'domain,', were, identified, in, 27.4, ',', 6.7, ',', and, 1, &, 'nbsp;%', of, patients, with, 'CEBPA', '(', 'double-mut),', 'CEBPA', '(', 'single-mut),', and, 'CEBPA', wild, 'type,', respectively])]). relacion([sujeto(['GATA2', mutations, were, closely]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, younger, 'age,', 'FAB', 'M1', 'subtype,', expression]), verbo([increased]), complemento([markedly, '(', 'P<0'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, protein, expression, of, 'ERK1/2,', 'p-ERK,', 'Akt', and, 'p-Akt']), verbo([increased]), complemento([significantly, in, calcification, group])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, presence, of, integrin, &, 'alpha;vβ3/ERK', blocker, '(', 'PD98059)', 'and/or', 'PI3K/Akt', antagonist, '(', 'LY294002),', 'T3', was, still, able, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, 'calcification,', and, this, effect, was, similar, to, that, after, treatment, with, inhibitors, alone])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'SphK1', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'SK-NEP-1', and, 'G401', 'cells,', and, through, annexin, 'V/propidium', iodide, apoptosis, of, 'SK-NEP-1', and, 'G401', cells, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', 'SKI-5C', treatment]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, growth, of, 'SK-NEP-1', xenograft, tumors, in, nude, 'mice,', with, few, side, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', microarray, analysis, revealed, that, 'SKI-5C-treated', 'SK-NEP-1', cells, mostly, downregulated, 'PRKACA', and, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'ERK1/2', and, 'NF-κB', p65])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results, imply, that, 'SKI-5C']), verbo([induces]), complemento([apoptosis, of, 'SK-NEP-1', cells, through, the, 'PRKACA/MAPK/NF-κB', pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['While,', further, research, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, determine, the, for, 'Wilms\'', tumor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Greater,']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([efforts, are, needed, to, identify, 'at-risk', elderly, people, living, in, the, community])]). combined, effectively, in, colonic, 'resections,', and, may]), verbo([act]), complemento([synergistically, to, reduce, postoperative, pain, and, improve, outcomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Long', 'anti-lung', cancer, therapeutics])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', oncogenic, transcription, factor, 'MYC', and, its]), verbo([binding]), complemento([partner, 'MAX', regulate, gene, expression, by, binding, to, 'DNA', at, 'enhancer-box', '(', 'E-box)', elements, 5, '\'', -, 'CACGTG-3\''])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', mammalian, 'genomes,', the, central, 'E-box', 'CpG']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, potential, to, be, methylated, at, the, 5, -, position, of, cytosine, '(', 5, 'mC),', or, to, undergo, further, oxidation, to, the, 5, -, hydroxymethyl, '(', 5, 'hmC),', 5, -, formyl, '(', 5, 'fC),', or, 5, -, carboxyl, '(', 5, 'caC)', forms])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'MAX', exhibits, the, greatest, affinity, for, a, 5, caC, or, unmodified, 'C-containing', 'E-box,', and, much, reduced, affinities, for, the, corresponding, 5, 'mC,', 5, hmC, or, 5, fC, forms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Crystallization', of, 'MAX', with, a, 5, caC, 'E-box'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Together', these, data, indicate, that, 'MAX', can]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, direct, epigenetic, sensor, of, 'E-box', cytosine, modification, states, and, for, membrane, potential, and, cellular, activities])]). relacion([sujeto(['Increasing', use, of, engineered, nanoparticles]), verbo([has]), complemento([led, to, extensive, research, into, their, complemento([inside, holocrine, cells, with, disrupted, membranes])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, dopamine, neuron, 'firing,', cholinergic, interneurons, '(', 'ChIs)']), verbo([regulate]), relacion([sujeto(['They', also]), verbo([have]), complemento([profound, effects, on, airway, structural, cells, to, reverse, the, effects, of, disease, on, their, function])]). relacion([sujeto(['Glucorticosteroids']), verbo([act]), complemento([via, specific, 'receptors-the', glucocorticosteroid, receptor, '(', 'GR)-which', are, a, member, of, the, nuclear, receptor, iNOS, and, 'COX-2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mechanism', studies]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'SG', 'down-regulated', phosphorylated, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinases, '(', 'MAPKs),', expression, via, nuclear, translocation, of, nuclear, factor, 'E2-related', factor, 2, '(', 'Nrf2)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'SG']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, cytotoxicity, of, conditioned, medium, prepared, by, 'LPS-activated', 'BV2', microglia, to, neuronal, 'PC12', cells, and, improved, cell, viability])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hence,', only, selenite, can]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, an, 'oxidant,', particularly, in, the, reaction, with, free, 'and/or', 'protein-bound', sulhydryl, '(', 'SH)', groups])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', 'example,', selenite, was, shown, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, hydroxyl, 'radical-induced', reduction, and, scrambled, reoxidation, of, disulfides, in, human, fibrinogen, thus, preventing, the, formation, of, highly, hydrophobic, 'polymer,', termed, parafibrin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Such', a, 'polymer,', when, deposited, within, peripheral, 'and/or', cerebral, 'circulation,', may]), verbo([cause]), complemento([irreversible, damage, resulting, in, the, development, of, 'cardiovascular,', neurological, and, other, degenerative, diseases])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([on, the, mechanism, by, which, 'HSCs', attain, cycling, quiescence, by, addressing, a, role, for, inducible, cyclic, 'AMP', early, repressor, '(', 'ICER)'])]). verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, balance, between, 'ICER', and, 'p-CREM', in, 'HSC'])]). relacion([sujeto(['ICER', seems, to, be, responsible, for]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'G1', 'transition,', based, on, reduced, 'Cdk4', 'protein,', decreased, proliferation, and, functional, studies, with, propidium, iodide])]). relacion([sujeto(['There', were, no, marked, changes, in, the, hematological, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cognitive', control, processes, enable, us, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([flexibly, in, a, world, posing, 'ever-changing', demands, on, our, cognitive, system])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', study, cognitive, 'control,', conflict, tasks, and, especially, congruency, sequence, effects]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, regarded, as, a, fruitful, tool])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', for, the, last, decade, a, dispute]), verbo([has]), complemento([arisen, whether, or, not, congruency, sequence, effects, are, indeed, a, valid, measure, of, cognitive, control, processes])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', debate]), verbo([has]), complemento([led, to, the, development, of, increasingly, complex, paradigms, involving, 'numerous,', and, binds, 'MAVS,', leading, to, the, production, of, type, 'I', 'IFN'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Upon', 'activation,', we, show, that, 'TRIM25', is, redistributed, into, cytoplasmic, dots]), 'MAVS', competes, with, 'TRIM25', for, 'RIG-I', 'binding,', and, this]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, upon, 'TRIM25', mediated, activation, of, 'RIG-I,', 'RIG-I', moves, away, from, 'TRIM25', to, interact, with, 'MAVS', at, the, mitochondria])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', the, influenza, 'A', virus, '(', 'IAV)', 'NS1', protein]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'RIG-I', and, 'TRIM25', in, specific, areas, in, the, cell, 'cytoplasm,', and, inhibits, the, formation, of, 'TRIM25', 'homocomplexes,', but, not, of, 'RIG-I/TRIM25', 'heterocomplexes,', preventing, the, formation, of, 'RIG-I/MAVS', complexes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([localized, spatially, in, the, cell, different, complexes, formed, between, 'RIG-I,', 'TRIM25', and, 'MAVS,', in, the, presence, and, absence, of, two, viral, 'IFN', antagonistic, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Neutrophils']), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, first, line, of, defense, against, bacterial, and, fungal, 'infections,', but, they, are, also, important, effectors, of, acute, and, chronic, inflammation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genome-wide', association, studies]), migration, during, 'organogenesis,', immune, responses, and, also, metastatic, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, the, &, 'beta;-arrestin1/STAM1', 'complex,', initially, patients, often]), verbo([report]), complemento(['PM', failures, and, there, is, growing, evidence, of, 'PM', deficits, among, this, population])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'low-', and, in, elevated, 'CO2', correlated, with, altered, expression, of, stomatal, patterning, genes, between, spring, and, control, plants, for, three, loci, '(', 'YODA,', 'CDKB1;1', and, 'SCRM2)', and, cancer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Among', 'smokers,', invasive, carcinoma, subtype, incidence]), verbo([increased]), complemento([with, intensity, and, duration, of, smoking, '(', all, 'Ptrend', &, genotype, was]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, increased, risk, of, breast, cancer, '(', 'OR', =, 7.12, '(', 1.98, -, 25.59, ')', ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', number, of, different, 'C-terminal', 'Proline', 'Rich', 'Domain', destabilizes, fibrils, and, enhances, oligomer, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', in, neurons, both, domains]), verbo([act]),
